Description: Sidda in his childhood days decides to take on gram panchayat president Bacchegowda, who has been unanimously elected several times. His mother, on the other hand, wants her son to be responsible and get married, but finding a girl for him becomes though as he is jobless. She, therefore, meets marriage broker Shamanna to search for a girl but he doesn't get a right match. Finally, cupid strikes, when he finally falls in love with Nandini and the love story takes a twist when the broker gets to know that he is in a relationship with his own daughter.

Name: Divangatha Manjunathana Geleyaru
Description: Things turn upside down for a group of friends who meet at a police station after a long time as they suspicious incidents surrounding a murder mystery slowly uncovers.

Name: Life Jothe Ondu Selfie
Description: After three friends separate to find solutions to their own problems, fate brings them together once again in Goa.

Name: Onthara Bannagalu
Description: Onthara Bannagalu is a Kannada Feature Film about the emotional journey of 5 characters; the way characters react to situations and circumstances they encounter.

Name: Puttaraju Lover of Shashikala
Description: It is an innocent love story of two school students, who study at a government high school in Malenadu.

Name: Vaasu Naan Pakka Commercial
Description: Vaasu, a happy-go-lucky youngster lands up at a police station, where he asks the inspector to write an FIR that he will kill his girlfriend, Mahalakshmi. When questioned why one gets to listen to his love story.

Name: Katheyondu Shuruvagide
Description: Tarun, a young resort owner while dealing with the struggles of his life develops a unique bond with Tanya, a resort guest.

Name: Sankashta Kara Ganapathi
Description: A cartoonist with a neurological disorder tries to achieve his goal and also goes on to impress the girl he loves.

Name: Prayanikara Gamanakke
Description: A bus driver Shankra, along with his conductor Dharma, assembles a transport facility from Hyderabad to Bangalore city. On their way, they face various problems to reach the destiny. Together they must overcome them to drop the passenger to their intended destination.

Name: Double Engine
Description: Three boys set out to make enough money by using numerous shortcuts possible which lands them into a series of interesting yet funny incidents.

Name: Aa Karaala Ratri
Description: A fortune teller tells a poverty-stricken family that their fate will change overnight when a mysterious traveler visits there home to stay overnight.

Name: Trunk
Description: With a strong inhuman presence around him, Rahul sets out to fight the supernatural force but will he succeed?

Name: 6ne Maili
Description: The sudden disappearance of a group of people in the forest of Dhavalgir hovers at the 6th mile of the trekking zone.

Name: Kelavu Dinagala Nanthara
Description: A realistic take on the innocent mistakes committed by the modern day youngsters.

Name: Vedanti
Description: Detective Harish Vedanti is on a hunt to crack down a new murder case which seems to be complex. His perceptions on usage of technology is at stake. Is he going to adapt at the cost of solving a murder case? Who holds the key in solving it?

Name: Amma I love you
Description: On the advice of a saint, a rich man crosses all boundaries to restore his mother's health as she is on her deathbed. For that, must turn into a beggar for 48 hours.

Name: Kattu Kathe
Description: Ram is hearing-impaired after a large explosion in a factory that he owns, but he doesn't want people around him to know about his impairment. On the advice of doctor, Ram, with his friend Bharath, stays at a farm house in Himagiri, before getting operated upon, where he meets his dream girl, Aadhya. Ram falls in love with Aadhya at first sight, but doesn't want her to know about his hearing impairment, worried that she may reject him. He tries several tricks to woo Aadhya. On the other hand, a gang tries to abduct Aadhya and her friends, and series of murders keeps taking place.In the second half, the movie gathers pace after a diligent police officer, Rajesh, takes over the case to solve the murder mystery. Is there a ghost, a gang or a person behind series of murders?

Name: Shathaya Gathaya
Description: Based on true events, Shathaya Gathaya revolves around the series of murders that happened in Hirisave village as part of a revenge plan.

Name: Anukta
Description: With a proper blend of psychological aspects of human emotions in the form of dreams and crime investigation of an intelligent COP behind a murder mystery Anukta will be a new experience to watch.

Name: Vanilla
Description: Avinash and Swati, childhood friends part ways as kids only to meet each other after a long time as adults. When Swati goes missing again after a mysterious murder of a girl, Therefore, he decides to take up the case into his own hands and begin to search Swati.

Name: 2nd half
Description: A constable who is assigned with the job of CCTV operation develops a bond with the personalities who appear in the CCTV and soon finds herself caught between solving a case and exposing a corrupt cop who ignores all her allegations.

Name: Raambo2
Description: Three individuals on a road journey fearing a vehicle following constantly and honking at them try to escape and a thrilling chase ensues.

Name: Kumari 21F
Description: Male lead , a chef, falls in love with Kumari, a struggling model from Mumbai. However, he begins to doubt her fidelity as his friends tell him that she has many other boyfriends.

Name: Kichchu
Description: A speech and hearing impaired ecologist, is devoted to preventing deforestation.

Name: Kannadakkagi Ondannu Otti
Description: Two friends meet each other accidently after a very long time and see Their past is interwined with a girl.

Name: Hebbet Ramakka
Description: Ramakka an illiterate is forced to take part in the district council election from a constituency which is reserved for women.

Name: Dhwaja
Description: Two twin brothers having contrasting personalities find themselves living the life of the other due to circumstances.

Name: Buckasura
Description: Arya, aka Money, is a lawyer who will do anything for money. When he gets an offer that he cannot refuse, he has to make a lot of choices to lead the live he wants. Will Arya get to lead a happily ever after with a wealthy future?

Name: ATM: Attempt to murder
Description: Story based on the true ATM incident (attempt to murder) that frightened Bangalore city. The search of the criminal is completely fictional from the Director's eye.

Name: Krishnatulasi
Description: Krishna is a blind young man who works as a guide amidst the beautiful monuments of Madikeri. He gets a new job as an archaeological museum incharge at Manasa Gangothri, Mysore. During the bus ride Krishna meets Tulasi and they find themselves drawn to each other. As love blossoms fate and circumstances intervene, throwing a curveball at them. What happens to Krishna and Tulasi?

Name: Dalapathi
Description: Ram fights to save his love Vaidehi and to bring justice to her troubled family.

Name: Huccha 2
Description: A son's over-compulsive adoration towards his mother causes trouble for both of them.

Name: Gultoo
Description: Struggling to find a foot in the start-up scene, two aspiring entrepreneurs are entangled in a vicious loop of investigative trials following an unprecedented crime.

Name: Johnny Johnny Yes Papa
Description: Johnny and his father run a website but his work gets affected when Priya enters his life and creates a difficult situation for him.

Name: Rajaratha
Description: It's a story of a Bus traveling from Rigalore(an imaginary place in malnad region of karnataka) to Chennai via Bengaluru. The journey has the hero and heroine occupying it and well accompanied by fellow passengers. The love between the hero and heroine starts blossoming with the present happenings and the memories of past with a few hiccups in the journey. There's another dimension to the story which takes shape after about 70% of the movie and that can only be watched in the theatre. Overall it's a proper romantic comedy movie which looks very fresh with a additional message.

Name: Heegondu Dina
Description: A girl must travel and make it to her destination in an hour's time to be able to fulfill her dreams.

Name: Dandupalya 3
Description: It tells the tale of the Dandupalya gang from the point of view of the police.

Name: Tagaru
Description: Duniya Soori's Tagaru takes us on a bloody ride through the dark underbelly of the underworld and their clash against the police.

Name: Samhaara
Description: A blind man who is cheated by the girl he loves finds himself trapped in a murder case. While searching the real culprit, he comes across with many thrilling situations.

Name: Prema Baraha
Description: Two journalists, both working for two different news channels don't really like each other, but the equation between them changes when fate puts the two of them together in the warring backdrop of Kargil.

Name: The Bangle Seller
Description: Kempanna, a bangle seller struggles to understand what is really wrong with their marriage. For behind every frustration there seem to lurk burning desires.

Name: Churikatte
Description: Set in Malnad, the story talks about the timber mafia, and how people's lives change with decisions made in a minute, out of anger.

Name: Raju Kannada Medium
Description: Raju, a village boy goes to Bangalore in search for a job and finds different meanings to life while dealing with hurdles that the city puts him through.

Name: 3 Gante 30 Dina 30 Second
Description: A reality game that takes place between the hero and the heroine for 3 hours, leads them into facing complications for 30 days, but in the end, gets solved in 30 seconds.

Name: Humble Politician Nograj
Description: Danish plays the title character of Nograj, a narcissistic crazy politician who exploits a city and its resources. The film is about Nograj's aspirations to becoming the MLA in the upcoming elections and the opposition he faces.

Name: Brihaspathi
Description: An underemployed graduate successfully overcomes various obstacles before and after finding employment.

Name: Chamak
Description: Kush, a gynaecologist and a playboy refuses his family's wishes to marry because his freedom will be curtailed if he marries. He later marries Khushi, an innocent girl while acting as if he is also an innocent guy in front of her family.

Name: Aavahayami
Description: A mystery thriller cum Love story, where the protagonist working in an MNC frustrated of work load in the office plans for the weekend trip with is other 7 friends. When traveling for the destination of the weekend trip, they miss their road and their vehicles gets in problem and doesn't start, so their plans to stay their in a nearby lonely farmhouse. In that house they face many difficult situations and few of their friends die, and one of his friend get away from that farmhouse, and how they come out of this situation is the plot of the story.

Name: Tora Tora
Description: A gang of seven college students accidentally come across a time machine and they decide to use it, to change their past. However, later they find out that changing the past could cause total chaos and annihilation.

Name: Anjaniputra
Description: Anjaniputra is a Kannada movie starring Puneeth Rajkumar and Rashmika Mandanna, an action romance genre with elements of family sentiment. This family entertainer is directed by well known choreographer-turned-director Harsha A.

Name: Mufti
Description: An undercover cop goes into the big bad world (Ronapura), an place taken over by a don, where his safety may be compromised.

Name: Gowdru Hotel
Description: A remake of the Malayalam hit 'Ustad Hotel', the film sees an aspiring chef forced to work in a restaurant owned and run by his grandfather, to make ends meet, much against the wishes of his father.

Name: Mantram
Description: A newly married couple move into an old house, with a ghost haunting the premises, unbeknownst to them, causing trouble for them and their family.

Name: Uppu Huli Khara
Description: Three youngsters are caught in the middle of an ongoing bank robbery investigation. The interest of the public in the case, snowballs it into bigger proportions, making the investigating officer wonder if the three are innocent or not.

Name: Athiratha
Description: The story of Athiratha revolves around an aspiring journalist who helps the innocent and talented young students get a fair chance by uncovering the huge racket of question paper leaks and fake certification prevalent in the country.

Name: Upendra Matte Baa
Description: After the death of a flirtatious zamindar named Bangarraju, Yama sends his soul back to earth to fix the quarrels of his family.

Name: Kempirve
Description: A story of a middle class man 'Venkatesh Murthy'.

Name: College Kumar
Description: Unable to cope with the pressure at home, Kumar rebels against his father's dreams. When debarred for cheating in the exams, Kumar and his father switch roles, trying to fulfill their dreams and aspirations.

Name: Samyuktha 2
Description: Every year, on a particular date, a medical student goes missing from the institution named Samyuktha. As the mystery and dread surrounding this strange phenomenon grow by the day, a student sets out to investigate the disappearances. All the clues lead to an abandoned bungalow, but mortal danger awaits in the shadows for those who come there seeking answers.

Name: Tiger Galli
Description: Vishnu is a happy-go-lucky guy, who leads a life with his mother and friends. The area he lives in is a haven for the mafia. What happens when his carefree existence crosses the path of these dangerous men, who are set to torture his mother and her dairy business?

Name: Dayavittu Gamanisi
Description: A middle-aged bachelor, A thief, A young spiritual guru and a frustrated techie wade through a journey of self discovery that aligns them together in it's penultimate phase.

Name: Kataka
Description: A hard-working school teacher returns to his hometown to pursue his long awaited dream of opening a school to educate the less fortunate children, until he faces several obstacles that prevent him from achieving his goals.

Name: Kariya 2
Description: The story of Kariya 2 revolves around Kariya, a small-time local goon who is employed by an influential underworld don. All is well with Kariya until he falls in love with Janaki, which leads to several unfortunate events that change their life completely.

Name: Huliraya
Description: An innocent lad who has grown up in the forests, finds himself falling in love with a woman which takes him to the city where he must learn to adapt to the different surroundings.

Name: Tarak
Description: A story about Tarak, an orphan, who falls in love with Meera, a woman who seeks the happiness of others before herself.

Name: Raitha Sanghada Puttannaiah: Puttannaiah of Raitha Sangha
Description: K.S. Puttannaiah was one of the most eminent voices of farmers' activism in India. He represented his organization Karnataka Rajya Raitha Sangha. He eventually died on Feb 18, 2018.

Name: Bharjari
Description: Romantic action drama about the life of an easygoing youngster named Surya, whose life take some unexpected turns thanks to the three women he meets along the way.

Name: Krack
Description: The movie portrays a thrilling story about a cop who travels from one place to another to KRACK a murder mystery.

Name: Darpana
Description: Vijayanth Naik, a German-based neuro biologist with an aim to win the Noble Award tries to achieve the impossible; he conducts various experiments on stem cell research and organ transplantation to make a man live forever and conquer death. All goes well for the Vijayanth until he finds himself in a precarious situation when he has to perform an organ transplantation surgery on his own son Gautham to save him from death. Whilst Vijayanth succeeds and goes on to win the Noble prize, he also faces repercussions as his experiment backfires and hell breaks loose. The movie gives a clear message that God's universal unchangeable laws of life and death can't be completely manipulated by science or scientists.

Name: Ayana
Description: An ambitious software entrepreneur puts everything he has in line to perceive his dreams.

Name: Mugulu Nage
Description: Pulakeshi chooses to smile through his pain and refuses to emote for tough situations, until three different women enter into his life at different phases to teach him the true meaning of love and life.

Name: Saheba
Description: An ordinary book shop owner Manu, helps Nandhini to enter film industry, without coming into the picture.

Name: Kaafi Thota
Description: A top notch lawyer who has everything in life going for him professionally and personally, ends up meeting a mendicant at Kashi to seek salvation where his life journey begins.

Name: Mass Leader
Description: The movie starts with the issue of Bangladeshi infiltrators thriving in Bengaluru with the help of the politicians who practice vote-bank politics. Shivraj and his two associates drive out Bangladeshi infiltrators by spreading rumors. He also locks horns with the corrupt CM and takes actions against drug mafia. An underworld don from Mangaluru is tasked to kill Shivraj, but he later turns a loyalist. In the second half, a flashback happens in which Shivraj is a patriotic Indian Army captain in Kashmir with a loving wife and child and his parents and siblings. The happy family is slayed by a terror plot, leaving his child handicapped. The rest of the story is how he avenges the deaths of his family by finishing off the terrorist.

Name: Jani
Description: A thief with a golden heart, Jani becomes the trusted confidante of an MLA after helping him during a dangerous situation. He becomes fond of Jani to the extent of lending his daughter's hand in marriage to him until the day he unfortunately dies much to the surprise of Jani and his daughter. Jani is already in love with another woman and now finds himself in a messy situation to fulfill the late MLA's wish to marry his grief stricken daughter or marry the woman he actually loves.

Name: Mojo
Description: " MOJO " is a precognitive thriller, weaving elements of the mystic nature of human mind, and the story that unfolds myriad dimensions around an apparent murder.

Name: Aa Eradu Varshagalu
Description: A couple who struggle to keep their relationship under wraps are forced to deal with situations where their bond gets exposed and changes are bound to occur.

Name: Operation Alamelamma
Description: Purmy's life takes a drastic turn when he is threatened to pay the ransom for rescuing his school-going son and gets unjustly arrested for the same.

Name: Dhairyam
Description: A state-level ranker who comes from an under-privileged family faces major hardships in life when he struggles to come up with money to rescue his family and his love life.

Name: Dandupalya 2
Description: The dreaded Dandupalya gang is behind bars and are all set to face their death sentence. A sequel to 2012 thriller 'Dandupalya' that chronicled the life and exploitations of the scandalous D-gang.

Name: Ondu Motteya Kathe
Description: Janardhan a 28 year old Kannada Lecturer from Mangalore who is quite an introvert comes to know from an astrologer that he would attain sanyasa (embrace asceticism) if he doesn't get married within a year. Hearing this Janardhan is now in a situation of trouble & desperation as he has never had a decent conversation with females until now in his life & all the proposals his family has seen also has gone in vain as he doesn't look great,physically. Janardhan continues his search for a beautiful bride. In this journey he faces various situations & conflicts which in turn gives him a chance to revisit his inner core & experience his self discovery. Does Janardhan find his bride or does he attain spiritual path? forms the rest of the story.

Name: Hombanna
Description: Its good movie ,Worth to watch great acting by actor DhanuGowda and varsha,they never seems to be debutant actors...

Name: Aake
Description: A ghost named Maya becomes the common link between Arjun, an artist in London, and Sharmila, a single mom and struggling actress from Bengaluru.

Name: Naa Panta Kano
Description: Arjun (Anup Revanna) and his two friends make a living out of conning people for a few thousands and are quite good at it. When Arjun falls for a girl, he agrees to his friend's plan of stepping up to nail a big con job so that he can help her financially. The con job sets off a chain of events that lead to a riveting cat-and-mouse game with a heist at its fulcrum.

Name: Tiger
Description: Tiger is an action packed thriller film led by Pradeep who dreams to become a police officer which is against the wish of his father played by the well known actor and also a very famous Ex IAS officer K Shivram.

Name: Noorondu Nenapu
Description: Set in 1980, Shreyas is a new boy in college, who finds his gang in the most notorious bunch in college. It is here that he also meets his first love in the form of Shruti Urs, a medical student. With love, heartbreak, friendships and sacrifice, these wonder years prove to be filled with life lessons.

Name: Pataki
Description: A corrupt IPS officer misuses his power and resorts to illegal practices to gain monetary benefits, as he joins hands with the local MP to overthrow his father.

Name: BB5
Description: A famous film-maker inspires and motivates an aspiring writer, with an idea of manipulating him into creating a brilliant script for his upcoming feature.

Name: Bangara s/o Bangarada Manushya
Description: A rich businessman who had been born and raised in Europe comes to his late father's village in India--after discovering his father's real identity--and gets involved with nasty politics and fights against local politicians and goons to save poor farmers and make sure that every person of State will realize the importance of crops and poor farmers.

Name: Maasthi Gudi
Description: When Maasthi learns about poaching incidents in a nearby jungle, he decides to take it upon himself to prohibit poachers from killing wild animals.

Name: Happy New Year
Description: It is an anthology film based on of five different life stories. A slice of lives of a few people all culminating on new year's eve. A radio jockey also a stand-up comedian who would make the world around him laugh their souls out, has a girlfriend bedridden with terminal disease, a constable who hates his job, an anti-social thug who hates any kind of celebration, an IT techie who thinks new year's eve is just another day and a manager of car showroom who is unhappy about his overly orthodox wife, search for something they don't have, but the new year's eve has more than they can imagine. Their life changes in its own ways, finally they start their new life but the search is still on.

Name: Porki Huccha Venkat
Description: Huccha Venkat, a former underworld type, is all set to take the route to reform by starting his Sene. With plans of women's emancipation and helping the needy, he becomes the Messiah. Amidst this, he has a love story and also a tryst with politicians and cops.

Name: Raaga
Description: Mithra is a blind man, whose happy-go-lucky demeanor and philosophies ensure that he is everyone's favourite. When a timid, insecure and rich blind girl, Anu, enters his life, he experiences a whole new feeling.

Name: Chakravarthy
Description: Shankar, a humble and care free youth from Madikeri. After his father's retirement he is sent to Bengaluru in search of a job but then his life changes drastically thereon and he becomes an underworld don.

Name: Manasu Malligey
Description: A poor boy Parshu is in love with upper caste Sanju, who is the daughter of the local politician. They are attracted to each other and a young romance is blossoming. But with caste politics and opposition at play, trouble seems in store ahead for them. Will they be able to fight their love?

Name: Rogue
Description: A young man falls for the commissioner's sister, Anjali, who betrays him. After finishing his time behind bars, he sets on a mission to save another girl named Anjali who is chased by a gangster.

Name: Raajakumara
Description: A dutiful son, a prince in his fathers' eyes, retains his purity of character despite the many challenges thrown his way.

Name: Shuddhi
Description: An American in India befriends two journalists who are fighting against the country's lenient juvenile justice act; her trip turns into a spiritual journey.

Name: Urvi
Description: Troubling circumstances bring forward three women who work together to plot their revenge against one common man who is responsible for destroying their lives.

Name: Bangalore Underworld
Description: kannada movie set in the backdrop of Bengaluru which follows the life of Maalik who worked under two notorious dons.

Name: Eradane Sala
Description: A widow tells her son to keep his distance from the girl who will be living with them. He tries his best to not develop any feelings towards her but eventually falls in love with her.

Name: Kaal Kg Preethi
Description: Guru discreetly loves his college-mate but fears to express gets a chance to drive her all the way to her hometown after they're done with college.

Name: Srinivasa Kalyana
Description: A regular guy finds himself through his journey of finding love, lust and heartbreak and his real purpose in life through encounters.

Name: Uppina Kagada
Description: A young girl goes in search of her father and meets a man on a river bank. That meet leaves her with a lot of questions and also few solutions to live in a pluralistic society.

Name: Chowka
Description: Four ambitious and aspiring individuals who end up in jail, are led by a school teacher who shows them hope but also stirs up their passion towards reform.

Name: Allama
Description: Story of the rebellious thinker Allama, also known as Allama Prabhu.

Name: Beautiful Manasugalu
Description: A happy-go-lucky youngster falls in love with a beautician until their fairy tale romance gets disrupted by an event which threatens to ruin their lives.

Name: Srikanta
Description: Srikanta, who indulges in petty illegal activities, gives a lift to a journalist en-route to Agumbe. The duo talk about their life and experiences throughout their journey.

Name: Pushpaka Vimana
Description: A man does not let his disabilities deter him from being a wonderful father to his daughter.

Name: ZERO Made in india
Description: Evocative and provocative, this offbeat saga delves into the special bond between father and son. Highlighting their unique relationship, it follows the trials and triumphs that both of them face in life. Will they be able to succeed in their goals, and remain together against all odds?

Name: Kirik Party
Description: Kirik Party is the story of a gang of mischievous students, lead by the protagonist Karna (Rakshit Shetty), who has just joined an engineering college.

Name: Sundaranga Jaana
Description: A romantic comedy story between Lucky who has temporary memory loss and Nandana.

Name: Naanu Mattu Varalakshmi
Description: Motocross racers Munna and Charan are arch enemies and keep competing against each other. However, situations take a drastic turn when Munna falls in love with Varalakshmi, Charan's sister.

Name: John Jani Janardhan
Description: John, Jani and Janardhan are three carefree youngsters whose lives change after they learn about a murder and set out to find the culprit.

Name: Mummy Save Me
Description: A 7-months pregnant mother and a six year old daughter move into a bigger home where they start to experience unusual paranormal events.

Name: Harikatha Prasanga
Description: A Yakshagana actor who mainly does female roles is faced with his own sexuality and societies outlook.

Name: Badmaash
Description: Set against an urban backdrop, "Badmaash" is a romantic thriller about Vijay, an intelligent, playful and witty lad and Priya, an RJ and a fiercely passionate Kannadiga who tries to teach Kannada and Indian culture to Non-Indians through street plays and theatrical plays. Right from their first encounter, Vijay develops a strong attraction for Priya which eventually turns to love. When everything seems perfect and romantic, the tone of the tale suddenly changes when a cruel yet highly intelligent villain comes in between them. From now on, how Vijay uses more of his brain like Chanakya to win his love back is what "Badmaash" is all about. "Badmaash" is a very apt title based on the hero's character - who is a Con Man. Badmaash is attribute of the character who will cheat you and walk away right in front of you with a smile on his face. The story of the film is like reading a newspaper covering news from politics to cricket, cinema to media, and astrology to scandals. Packed with numerous twists and turns, "Badmaash" is a romantic thriller, snowballing to an unusual and nail biting climax. What awaits the audience at the end will have them at the edge of their seats.

Name: Kahi
Description: A series of events unfold in modern day Bengaluru, intertwining four different lives: a dancer, a drug peddler, a writer and a psychopath.

Name: Santhu Straight Forward
Description: Santhu is the typical do-gooder youngster, who is also the angry young hero. He falls for college student Ananya after a series of chance meetings. But, there's also dreaded don Deva in the picture forming the triangle.

Name: Mukunda Murari
Description: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

Name: Railway Children
Description: 12 year old Raju arrives on an unknown city platform. He's soon sucked into a gang run by 'Solution' that deals with petty crimes. A new life of adventure away from home begins, bringing along dangers of drugs, abuse, crime and also hope.

Name: Rama Rama Re
Description: A renowned criminal plans his prison break and tries to run away from his death row as far as he could.

Name: Nagarahavu
Description: Naganika returns to the present world and transforms into a powerful snake to avenge her death and reclaim her family property.

Name: Dana Kayonu
Description: Docomo is a happy-go-lucky young man who grows up in a rural milieu. When he succeeds in rearing a special breed of Indian bull, he gains a great reputation and a huge fan following. How will his love life unfold?

Name: Idolle Ramayana
Description: Four people with different ambitions, find themselves being tested along the same lines as characters in the Ramayana were, millennia ago. What lessons will life teach them and how will they face the consequences of their actions?

Name: Jaguar
Description: Krishna, a young medical student, strikes against corrupt figures of power as a vigilante and tries to decribes his father's injustice death while trying to win the love of his friend's sister as a college student.

Name: Doddmane Hudga
Description: Romance blossoms between a city girl and a tough small-town guy.

Name: Sipaayi
Description: The protagonist, a TV reporter fights to stop illegal activities around the city.

Name: Mungaru Male 2
Description: Preetham, the son of a millionaire seeks excitement in every aspect of his life until he meets the unique and charming Nandini who changes his perspective and goes missing from his world.

Name: Golisoda
Description: A raw tale of hope, survival and success that delves into the trials and triumphs in the life of four orphans, who opt to leave their aimless existence, and work towards achieving a sense of identity and respect in society.

Name: Neer Dose
Description: The lives of four individuals who are unlikely to befriend each other, a retired PWD officer, a BBMP hearse van driver, a 36-year-old spinster running a milk booth and a sex worker, cross and end up being more than just friends.

Name: Prema Geema Jane Do
Description: Prema Geema Jaane Do is a soft romantic comedy. The movie is about the protagonist setting up a journey to a new place and meeting new people.Why he hates love and what is in his past forms the main crux of the story.

Name: Happy Birthday
Description: A fearless man leads a violent lifestyle, but when he falls in love with a simple, sweet young woman he must drastically change his lifestyle and leave his past behind. Can he succeed in marrying his beloved?

Name: Crazy Boy
Description: Arjun is an orphan, who grows up to be a daring young man. At college, he meets and falls in love with Nandini, a woman from a wealthy family, much to her brother's disapproval. Can Arjun and Nandini stay together against all odds?

Name: Madamakki
Description: Sadhu ruled the underworld for 15 years in Mumbai. When his boss is gunned down by ATF chief Shanker Sadhu with his friends decide to settle down in Dubai. Before that he wants to have a look at his mother Rathnamma in Madamakki.

Name: Kotigobba 2
Description: An innocent Satya is captured for a crime committed by his look-alike criminal Shiva. Will the cops believe his story and capture the real criminal.

Name: Santheyalli Nintha Kabira
Description: Kabira, an orphan, is raised in the house of poor Muslim weavers. He's different from the rest of his lot because of his peaceful demeanour, which allows him to question religion and practices.

Name: Kalpana 2
Description: Raghava has Nyctophobia. Raghava, who loves Nandhini, is a cinematographer for a TV channel and wants to shoot a fake haunted house, in order to increase TRP ratings. To their misfortune, they are haunted, not by one but by five ghosts.

Name: Nanna Ninna Prema Kathe
Description: A singer/Mehndi artist falls in love with the daughter of a wealthy family, when he meets her at a wedding but faces major obstacles while he tries to express his feelings to her.

Name: Run Antony
Description: Antony is depressed and wants to commit suicide. He meets Yashu, who makes him see the positive in life. When he thinks his life could be happy, there's an unexpected shock. He has to run to save himself and find the truth.

Name: Naani
Description: A couple move into a palatial house which happens to be haunted by the spirit of a little girl called Naani, leading them to unearth the story behind her presence.

Name: Zoom
Description: Santhosh and Nayana are both creative directors at an advertising agency.Nayana is straight forward and believes in hard work,Santhosh is just the opposite.What happens if these two contradicting personalities fall in love with each other?

Name: Jigar Thanda
Description: An aspiring director targets a ruthless gangster for making a violent gangster film. His discreet attempts to research the gangster fail miserably. Finally when he gets caught snooping, the tables are turned on him.

Name: Lakshmana
Description: Lakshmana is a happy-go-lucky soul, but has a hidden truth. Anjali, too, a happy person, is on a mission to avenge a personal loss. The two seem to be star-crossed for they not only fall in love after meeting in college but realize they are on the same path for revenge.

Name: Jaggu Dada
Description: A feared don must woo a woman from a cultured family and marry her within a short period of time, in order to escape from his grandfather's insistent ghost. How will he convince a suitable woman to marry him, despite his criminal record?

Name: Godhi Banna Sadharana Mykattu
Description: The film is about Venkob Rao (Anant Nag), a middle class simpleton ailing with Alzheimer's, who goes missing. His son, Shiva (Rakshit Shetty) is a career driven person, who is forced to pause his hectic life to search for his father. Sahana (Shruti Hariharan), a doctor who takes care of Venkob Rao also gets involved. In his search for his father, he finds a lot more than he set out to find.

Name: Karva
Description: It is a two dimensional story, one trying to unveil an age old unknown mystery, and another experiencing the existence of the unknown. Do these stories meet? What happens to the fate of those involved with the unknown ?

Name: Apoorva
Description: An unconventional love story between two people who are generations apart.

Name: Ishtakamya
Description: Rich Dr.Akarsh and young middle class girl Acchari meet by accident, and seem to have the perfect romance going for them. Just when you think there's a happily ever after, there enters the other woman, Aditi.

Name: Style King
Description: Karthik and Kashi look alike, but Karthik aspires to be a sub-inspector while Kashi is a criminal mastermind. What happens when they end up being in the same city with a bag of stolen cocaine playing games in their nearly-perfect lives?

Name: Akira
Description: The film revolves around Akira, who is reminiscing his life, his trysts with love and how he turned out to be the responsible man that his businessman father he eventually wanted to be.

Name: Chakravyuha
Description: A corrupt law minister incites violence in a law college and the police turn a blind eye. Lohith, a college student, turns into a vigilante and tries to punish the offender.

Name: The Great Story of Sodabuddi
Description: The film tells the story of Sodabuddi, who spends his life wastefully. He has two romantic encounters and the audience gets to relive these tales, until the climax throws in a complete surprise.

Name: U Turn
Description: A journalist who intends to write an article on traffic rule breakers gets dragged into a whirlpool of murder cases and deception.

Name: Jai Maruthi 800
Description: Jai Maruthi 800 is an action comedy that is set in two distinct time periods. The film begins with an incident that occurs in the 16th century, which reaches its logical conclusion in the present day.

Name: Jessie
Description: Jessie is a triangular love story that explores the effect of religion on love.

Name: Ranathanthra
Description: After a lot of hurdles, two youngsters get married and head to a farmhouse located on an island off coastal Karnataka for their honeymoon. Just when it was to be happily ever after, they experience a series of horrific incidents.

Name: Kiragoorina Gayyaligalu
Description: The movie depicts the indomitable feminine spirit in all its grandeur. Most importantly the role of women in countering the evils of society on a broad canvas of agrarian India.

Name: Simpallag Innondh Love Story
Description: Kush and Kushi, who are romantics at heart encounter each other on a road trip as their opposing personalities spark off an attraction between them.

Name: Tyson
Description: Tyson is a power-packed action entertainer. The film shows the hero's struggle to become a Police Officer and the rest of the story portrays him as a strict and dignified cop.
Laced by the musical journey of Friendship, Love and Relationships, Ré is a comical extravaganza of real experiences happening in our day-today life.

Name: Game
Description: A murder, a case of driving under the influence of alcohol, a hit-and-run, and an investigation which links the incidents together. A film about how a family suffers due to drunken driving.

Name: Krishna Rukku
Description: The girl and boy who have grown up together realise very late that their relationship is that of love. By the time they realise it, they are about to go separate ways.

Name: Bhale Jodi
Description: After meeting at a mutual friend's wedding, an impulsive young man falls in love with a woman, who just happens to be previously engaged to be married. How will he react to this revelation? What will the future hold in store for them?

Name: Shivalinga
Description: A newly married CID officer is handed over a murder case which takes a personal turn when his wife happens to be involved in the case.

Name: Devara Naadalli
Description: Based on true events, this incisive tale follows the complex sequence of events that are sparked off by a bomb explosion, at a school in a sleepy little coastal town of Karnataka. How will the community react to the event?

Name: Jwalantham
Description: This socially relevant saga depicts the tremendous injustice meted out to hard-working farmers in the region, who are exploited and oppressed by corrupt government officials. Will their struggles lead to the fulfillment of their rights?

Name: Priyanka
Description: A happily married 37 year old woman falls in love with a mid twenties younger man who decides to make his presence felt in her world when she decides to leave him and save her marriage.

Name: Puta Tirugisi Nodi
Description: A young, cricketer turned teacher, has to overcome a big challenge in his personal life; and teach a motley bunch of kids what it means to play hard but fair.

Name: Viraat
Description: A businessman strives to find the solution for the existing power cut problems present in his community.

Name: Ricky
Description: A wildlife conversationalist who follows his passion and leads a fairy-tale life gets threatened by the Naxals.

Name: Masth Mohabbat
Description: A workoholic man falls in love with a beautiful woman who seeks his help, until he discovers an uncomfortable truth about her, which could disrupt their relationship.

Name: Last Bus
Description: 6 passengers board the last bus, anxious to reach their destination. But fate has other plans for them. Shock, anxiety, deceit, anger, frustration, fear takes over this unexpected journey that twists and turns into a nightmare.

Name: Parapancha
Description: Rajeeva rebels against his father and leaves home. A nomad called Khaali Peeli takes him under his patronage and gets him a servers job in the family bar and restaurant 'Parapancha'.

Name: Maduveya Mamatheya Kareyole
Description: Kushi and Suraj are childhood friends who are pre-arranged to marry each other by their families, as they must overcome their personal differences.

Name: Killing Veerappan
Description: A master strategist is appointed following Veerappan's unabashed spate of crimes and murders. The official puts in place Operation Cocoon, which involves setting up a network of spies and informers.

Name: Kathe Chitrakathe Nirdeshana Puttanna
Description: Puttanna is an aspiring filmmaker, who comes to Bengaluru from Raichur. After several unsuccessful attempts, he finally finds an interested producer. He narrates a story about horror tales that a filmmaker faces revealing in the end that it's no fictional tale but his own encounters. How do they tackle the ghost?

Name: Ganga
Description: An honest auto driver Ganga is the life and soul of her family, which consists of her sister, nephew and niece. Ganga finds herself in trouble when she goes out of her way to unite two lovers making an enemy out of a powerful politician Devaraj. Devaraj plots an elaborate scheme to break Ganga and everything that matters to her the most. How will she deal with it?

Name: Master Piece
Description: Yuva is a young rebel, who aims to be the boss of everyone. Street-smart and intelligent, he does not want to be the Good Samaritan like Bhagat Singh that his mother wants him to be. His dreams and aspirations make him take some 'wrong' choices. But, his journey makes him understand what's good and what's not.

Name: Jaathre
Description: This movie revolves around a guy who comes to Bengaluru from a fantastic place called Mudigere.

Name: Rathaavara
Description: Rathaavara means the King's General who is also the best warrior.

Name: Minchagi Nee Baralu
Description: A scientist leaves behind his wealth, including a time machine to an engineering student. Through this machine, he ends up conversing with a student living in 1999 and falls in love with her. Will he manage to trace her and have a happily ever after story?

Name: First Rank Raju
Description: Raju is a quintessential geek, who aims at always securing the first place. His parents sacrifice everything to ensure he is a consistent topper. What happens when he has to face the real world on his own?

Name: The Plan
Description: The Plan - youth centric, high energy, prison break, suspense thriller, social and political film treated on world cinema treatment. The film is portrayed on a canvas of a prison amidst of a dense forest. Where, in, trapped lives, battling between Rage, Fear, Revenge and deceit that finally unfolds in to a climax that reflects the ugliness of the social face today's world... It talks about the friendship of four guys, how they live life and a moment of thoughtlessness changes their lives and they find themselves in prison.. What happens next forms the crux of the story...

Name: Boxer
Description: Raja, a street boxer, falls in love with a blind girl Lakshmi, who shows him love and compassion. Raja, who has a few enemies, dreams of living happily ever after with her. Is this possible?

Name: Bangalore 560023
Description: The movie revolves around the daily mundane lives of few men in Bangalore and how cricket is an integral element to it. The movie is about friendship, rivalry and love, all explored through the concept of gully-cricket.

Name: Ramleela
Description: Ram helps a couple elope. It turns out that the girl is the daughter of a dreaded don. Through his misadventures, he falls in love with Chandrakala, who happens to be the don's other sister. All hell breaks loose when he finds out this truth.

Name: Care of Footpath 2
Description: An emotional suspense thriller inspired by true stories of juvenile delinquents in the India. Four teenage friends are provoked to plan and execute the murder of a cop.

Name: Ouija: Game Never Ends
Description: The happy go lucky girls working as software professionals start a short film to pursue their dreams of film making. Everything goes well apart from the theme of the film they chosen.

Name: Mumtaz
Description: Two children, who essay the roles of Shah Jahan and Mumtaz as kids, are separated when the girl shifts her residence. The boy pines for her. Do they unite as adults?

Name: Vascodigama
Description: Lecturer who will try to show the Strengths and Flaws of Indian Education System.

Name: Ring Road
Description: One Thought, One Action, Many Consequences. It is a story of how fragile life is - and how one small decision avalanches into one of the most talked about cases of Karnataka,India.

Name: Plus
Description: In order to protect himself from his enemies, Jai, a businessman, brings together his son, Vivek, and his friends, Ritesh and Nidhi, who are victims of different psychological disorders.

Name: Thamisra
Description: Four friends set forth to an abandoned mansion in Sakleshpur, where one of the protagonist's dead aunt lived. In the house is an antique piece worth crores. They want to find that and sort their lives out. But, this plan sees a big ghostly obstacle.

Name: Mr
Description: A common farmer turns into an IAS police officer to help the poor and fight against corruption and finally taking the revenge of his murdered sister.

Name: Naanu Avanalla..
Description: The film focus on a transgender, who is destined to have a life of utter neglect and disappointments.

Name: Arjuna
Description: a simple story webbed around few characters is proving to be a winner.

Name: Luv U Alia
Description: Can a boy in love win over his beloved's heart and change her views on love and commitment?

Name: Kendasampige
Description: When a love story goes awry, two young lovers are forced to take to the road with the police hot on their heels. They escape across Karnataka in a roller-coaster ride that is at once enthralling, exasperating and nail-biting.

Name: RX Suri
Description: RX Suri is inspired from the life story of Paritaala Soori, who was infamous for his criminal activities in the Rayalaseema province of Andhra Pradesh.

Name: Octopus
Description: A scientist finds a medicine for heart issues at a cheaper cost but he gets chased by the medical mafia and runs away.

Name: Aatagara
Description: Ten people are chosen to participate in a contest and assembled in a bungalow in a picturesque island. When the contestants begin to die painful deaths one by one, can the last five left standing find way to escape the house of terror?

Name: Muddu Manase
Description: Suri leads a happy-go-lucky righteous life in Bengaluru, where he has a Tom Boy Mouna, his distant relative, wooing him. But, in his heart, Suri still harbours feelings for his first love Poorvi.

Name: Uppi 2
Description: A psychological thriller which depicts the fact that "Today is a gift - that's why it's called Present" in an unusual way. It is about a man called Neenu, who lives in the present. The film takes the audience through a journey of his life by detailing why Neenu lives in the present, by exploring his past and his future - both as seen by different people in Neenu's life. The film also highlights that happiness can be attained by means other than wealth.

Name: Buguri
Description: Krishna is engaged to his family friend, Ishanya. Unable to get over his past relationship, he goes in search of his college lover, Nandini.

Name: Thithi
Description: In a South Indian village, a centenarian's funeral brings together his free-spirited son, inheritance-hungry grandson and girl-crazy great-grandson.

Name: Male
Description: Male is a simple story between two youngsters Varun and Varsha, and the movie name literally mean rain in Kannada.

Name: Bullet Basya
Description: Hariprriya and Sharan pair up for the first time in Bullet Basya. Sharan plays a 'trendy' villager in the film and a large part of it is set in the imaginary village of Singapura.

Name: RangiTaranga
Description: Mysterious events begin to unfold after a reclusive novelist and his wife move back to her ancestral village, followed by a journalist.

Name: Ganapa
Description: Ganapa is based on an incident in Bengaluru's underworld. The film takes a realistic approach, not on rowdyism, but on people affected by it.

Name: Vajrakaya
Description: Vajrakaya is the heart touching story of a young man Viraj (Shivarajkumar) who goes in search of his mother. Viraj leads a normal life, and one fine day he learns that he was adopted. This makes him restless and he starts the search for his parents. The first half of the story becomes essential as it depicts Viraj and his parents' flash back story. Whether Viraj's search fo his parents becomes successful and unite his family is the second-half. Cast Performance: The main highlight of the movie is Shivarajkumar's performance. The Badshah of Sandalwood has shared oscreen space with Jayasudha, she plays his mother in the movie. Shivarajkumar's all three heroines perform well, Karunya Ram and Nabha Natesh steal the show. Shubra Aiyappa's character is more or less a cameo role.

Name: Ranna
Description: A rich man is pining for his daughter who left him 25 years ago. He wants her back in the family, something only his grandson Bhargava can make happen.

Name: Bombay Mittai
Description: Three friends who are on their way to attend a birthday party meet a beautiful damsel in distress whom they try to impress.

Name: Endendigu
Description: Endendigu is a romantic thriller.

Name: Rana Vikrama
Description: Dheera Rana Vikrama is a action entertainer movie in which, Puneeth Rajkumar will be seen as a powerful police cop.

Name: Vaasthu Prakaara
Description: Two self-declared vastu experts try to mend a broken family using their expertise in vastu shastra.

Name: Krishna Leela
Description: Leela actress depressed with her father and on other hand Krishna actor suffering from daily tensions accidentally get connected on mobile lot of things get messed up and due to this Krishna has to forcefully marry leela will they stay together or get divorced.

Name: Rhaatee
Description: The story is about Rani, a girls from a very small village in Karnataka. She is a huge fan of actor Darshan and her life revolves around the protagonist Raja.

Name: Goa
Description: Three youths are born and brought up in a village. Their dream is to marry foreigners and live a fancy life abroad. To materialize their dream, they set off to Goa. Will they hit the jackpot there?

Name: Rudra Tandava
Description: Rudra Tandava follows a timid young man who has a loving family. When his brother, a government official, is murdered, the protagonist and his father plans to take revenge in their own separate ways.

Name: Mythri
Description: Fast paced and evocative, this contemporary social drama delves into concepts of love and fidelity in human relationships in view of modern liberal lifestyles, through the lives of a scientist and a news anchor.

Name: Dk
Description: Prem also known as DK is street smart and never loses a bet. Subbulakshmi is a politician's daughter who also never lose a bet. These two characters lives intertwine.

Name: Raja Rajendra
Description: The story revolves around Bottle Mani (Sharan), a lame duck, who takes a supari to kill Neelakanta Raju (Ramakrishna), an elderly person from a royal family. He's been assigned the job by none other than the old man's three sons-in-law, who want to grab his property. Mani is assisted by his uncle (Tabla Nani) but he faces a lot of problems in the palace as the family is huge. He misses a couple of chances to kill Raju. There's a twist in the tale when the real Bottle Mani (Ravishankar) walks out of jail only to find that a fraud has usurped his identity and entered the palace. Henceforth, it's only chaos that reigns supreme.

Name: Abhinetri
Description: A young girl rises to stardom, facing sexual harassment and struggling to remain grounded as she does so.

Name: Siddhartha
Description: Siddu alias Sidharth (Vinay Rajkumar), a singer and a guitarist and Khushi (Apoorva Arora). While Siddu is a happy-go-lucky boy, Khushi is rather possessive and wants all his attention. When their families agree to get them hitched, Siddu seeks a 20-day break from Khushi to lead a carefree life with his friends. But there's a catch. Khushi's not allowed to meet, call or text him during this period. Khushi, being her clingy self, is not able to live without him. After 20 days, an angry Khushi tells Siddu that she also wants to take a one-year break from him and go to London for higher studies. Siddu agrees. The story takes an interesting turn when Khushi returns with her new lover Rahul. Naturally, Siddu, who's been eagerly waiting for her, is devastated. Will he be able to win her back?

Name: Jackson
Description: Jackson is a comedy of errors that deals with problems that alcoholism gives rise to, albeit in a humorous manner.

Name: Shivam
Description: A younger son must step up to defend the temple for which his family is responsible.

Name: Khushi Khushiyagi
Description: Raj (Ganesh) is portrayed as a carefree guy who believes that everyone has the right to make their own decisions. At his friend Sadhu's (Sadhu Kokila) wedding reception, he sees Priva (Nandini Rai) and falls for her. He asks Sadhu's wife to learn more about Priya. Sadhu's wife gives Priya's number to her husband and asks him to pass it to Raj. A miscommunication between Raj and Sadhu leads to Raj calling another woman, Nandani (Amulya). Raj mistakes Nandani for Priya on the phone and has a conversation with her. Unbeknownst to him, Nandani knows who Raj is and develops an interest in him. Through a series of events, everything is revealed and Raj's confusion is cleared. Meanwhile, Raj is helping his friend Anand get the attention of another girl. This girl turns out to be Priya, who falls for Anand. Comedic events lead to Anand eventually doubting Priya, which puts their relationship at stake. This is later resolved and they come together. Meanwhile, Nandani plans revenge against Raj for the deception and pain that he put her through. She gains employment as Raj's boss and uses this position to tempt him, putting him through hardships and seducing him. Raj plans to propose to his boss (Nandani), but she is already planning to reject his proposal to avenge her pain. Just before he proposes, Raj realizes that he is truly in love with Nandani. He runs to her house to plead for forgiveness.

Name: The Yakshagana Puppets
Description: The Yakshagana Puppets, is a 2016 Indian documentary film directed by Kiranraj K. This is the first ever documentary film on Yakshagana Puppets. The film is regarding the long time experiments and achievements of Sri Gopalakrishna Yakshagana Bombeyata Sangha, Kasaragod (Puppet show troupe) which has been working for the rejuvenation of Tenkuthittu Yakshagana Bombeyata (Southern style yakshagana puppet show) through demonstrations and shows is being produced. The film covers the full gamut of puppetry from its making up to its stage show. Even the amazement experienced by the spectators including the inquisitive students on witnessing the wonderful puppet shows has not escaped the camera eye. The fascinating natural scenes on the banks of river Chandragiri can also be enjoyed through this film. The opinion of the young and elderly lovers of this artform also has been recorded in this documentary. The film is shaped on the basis of Hindu mythological stories and therefore the scenes of temples and images of the deities worshipped in the temples have also been pictured in this film.

Name: Mr
Description: A man whose life seems straight out of a classic Kannada movie faces highs and lows in life and love.

Name: Haggada Kone: End of the Rope
Description: Channa the protagonist is a murder accused who has been sentenced to death by the court of law. His thoughts buried in his subconscious wakes up and erupt out as a dream, where he questions his close friend who took him into robbery, his irresponsible father and his teacher who was scared to correct his mistakes. His own consciousness answers his questions and takes the blames. The warden wakes him from his dream, hands over a set of cloths and instructs him to get ready. When Channa is ready, the Jailer walks into the cell and reads the punishment notice about the death sentence to be executed in sometime. At this point, Channa picks up an intense conversation with the jailer about the existence of CAPITAL PUNISHMENT.

Name: Harivu
Description: After his son suffers from severe illness, the farmer decides to take him to Bengaluru for treatment. Unfortunately, when the son dies, the farmer faces trouble taking the body back home.

Name: Software Ganda
Description: Manu, a software engineer, faces difficulty working under Priya, his short-tempered NRI boss. Priya is forced to leave India due to visa issues and she decides to marry Manu for her selfish needs.

Name: Ambareesha
Description: A simple man from a village comes to a city to make his fortune and will not accept mistreatment from anyone.

Name: Belli
Description: Belli comes to the city in search of a job but ends up working for a don who is also a politician. However, when the don gets killed by his rivals, Belli decides to avenge his death.

Name: Namo Boothatma
Description: A man inherits a bungalow which he renovates and turns into a hotel. As customers begin to arrive, each one invariably ends up dead and the owner begins to suspect that the house may be haunted.

Name: Namasthe Madam
Description: Nanda Gopal (Srinagara Kitty) is promised a promotion by his boss Radhika (Ragini) if he successfully performs the tasks assigned to him. Radhika wants to marry Nanda, who is already married to Rukmini (Nikesha Patel).

Name: Attihannu Mattu Kanaja
Description: Gouri, a documentary filmmaker takes a journey along with her friend. She is trying to collect material for her documentary project on instrumental music. They go to a village with the help of a schoolteacher. They travel to meet an instrumental musician, who has gone some place elsewhere to give a performance. Both are forced to stay in the village till the musician returns. Film tries to capture the human attitude when they are placed in a condition/situation/environment which is familiar and at the same time unfamiliar. As the seemingly simple yet complex situations develop, how these characters fits in to a landscape and climate as much mental as physical. Some time "vision" isn't what is visible, sound isn't exactly what is heard.

Name: Neenade Naa
Description: Dev struggles with his career and love life until he falls in love with Ankita. When Ankita dumps him, Dev falls for Pavi, and worries she will dump him too.

Name: Bahaddur
Description: Ashok is on the search for love when he meets Anjali. He falls in love with Anjali but is heart broken when Anjali turns him away. Anjali is supposed to be arranged in marriage to someone her father chooses for her.

Name: Thirupathi Express
Description: Thirupathi Express' is a clean fun-filled family entertainer, starring Sumanth Shailendra and Kriti Kharbanda in the lead roles. . The film is a travel love story. The family of Sumanth is bound to Tirupathi, while on the journey he meets many characters, turning out to be a roller coaster ride of adventure. What happens when he misses the train, forms the crux of the story.

Name: Power
Description: Un rico propietario de un club nocturno de Nueva York lleva una doble vida como un capo de la droga.

Name: Adhyaksha
Description: Chandru (Sharan) likes a school teacher very much named Kalyani (Asmita Sood). But he couldn't express his fondness to her directly, so he sends Aishwarya (Hebah Patel) with a love letter to give her. Though Kalyani refuses his love, Aishwarya did not tell him that. On a separate incident, Aishwarya's father fixed her marriage but she was not ready to marry before finishing her study. Chandru stops the marriage by involving police into the matter, which made Aishwarya to fall in love with Chandru. So instead of telling about Kalyani 's refusal she started to receive gifts in the name of Kalyani. To find out what happens next watch the film.

Name: Aryan
Description: A Kannada sports drama directed by D. Rajendra Babu and Chi Guru Dutt and starring Shiva Rajkumar and Ramya in the lead roles. The film is based on the life of Aryan, an athletics coach. protégée Shwetha, a sprint queen, goes on to win a major athletics event. Against this backdrop, there is a love story with various obstacles in the form of hostility, betrayal, jealousy, and lust.

Name: Bahuparaak
Description: Manas, Mani and Mauni are at a critical stage in their lives wherein Manas is caught in a love triangle, Mani is on his way to become a crime boss and Mauni resorts to corruption for political gains.

Name: Sachin! Tendulkar Alla
Description: A 13-year-old boy with autism, who is a big fan of Sachin Tendulkar, dreams to make it big in cricket. Later, he meets cricketer Venkatesh Prasad who trains him in the sport.

Name: Rose
Description: Ajay (Ajay rao) and Ammu (Shravya) are lovers and though Ajay is good, his group of friends is drunkards. Trouble comes when Ajay is arrested by the police for the murder of Rohan (Tilak) and he is sentenced to life imprisonment. But in truth, it is Ajay's friends who kill Rohan. Knowing this, jailer Surya (Saikumar) helps Ajay to come out but by that time, Ajay gets into trouble with the gangster Catu (Petrol Prasanna). What happens from there forms the rest.

Name: What?
Description: The film revolves around three peoples and Kidnapping Of Balkrishna about money.

Name: Drishya
Description: A man takes desperate measures to try to save his family from the dark side of the law after they commit an unexpected crime.

Name: Un Samayal Arayil
Description: A young couple plays havoc with the union of an older couple.

Name: Gajakesari
Description: It deals with the story of Baddi Krishna (Yash),who will be a cool dude in the town. Ananth Nag, who will be the Matadhipathi(chief of temple) will decide to make Baddi Krishna as his successor.Though Krishna will not be interested in the traditional and religious practices,situation will leads him towards that post.

Name: Ajith
Description: Ajith is a 2014 Kannada film directed by Mahesh Babu starring Chiranjeevi Sarja and Nikki Galrani. The movie follows the journey of two strangers, a jobless carefree man and a woman with whom he has fallen in love, who embark on a road trip filled with action and excitement.

Name: Maanikya
Description: A village strives to overcome the rivalry between two ancient factions.

Name: December 1
Description: A poor family is chosen to receive the state's chief minister for dinner and a short stay.Everything is expected to go fine but there are some unexpected surprises.

Name: Kwatle Satisha
Description: Satheesha wants to marry Dhanu but just before the wedding, he unexpectedly loses his memory. However, his friends decide to keep this a secret and help him get married.

Name: Agraja
Description: Charandas, a corrupt IAS officer, and Siddha engage in bribery and face corruption charges. However, they soon realize their error and its grave impact on society and fight to end the evil.

Name: Huchudugaru
Description: The film revolves around the typical life of four boys in villages of Karnataka.

Name: Ulidavaru Kandanthe
Description: A journalist sets out to uncover the truth behind an incident, through the perspectives of different people, unraveling how they and their lives are intertwined with it.

Name: Ragini IPS
Description: A female IPS officer is fighting against corruption and corrupt people.

Name: Chandralekha
Description: four people who decide to commit suicide in resort but find themselves haunted by vengeful ghost . The film is remake of Telugu film Prema Katha Chitram (2013)

Name: Dil Rangeela
Description: Preetham, a chef and a compulsive liar goes on a secretive, fun trip to Goa after getting engaged to his rich employer's only daughter.

Name: Shivajinagara
Description: Ramu grows up under difficult conditions that make him a violent person. When he learns that a local thug is wreaking havoc and troubling his family, he decides to put an end to his atrocities.

Name: Ugramm
Description: A man with a dangerous past must protect a girl from those who are hell bent on killing her.

Name: Nan Life Alli
Description: Two brothers share a good relationship till a girl comes between them. Deepu is all set to go to Norway when he discovers that his brother Ramu's relationship with Ragini, who is dead. How is Deepu's GF Mouna connected to these events?

Name: Brahma
Description: Bramha (Upendra) a notorious gangster who is a nightmare for politicians and the police. The Police appoint ACP Shinde to nab Bramha, but Brahma escapes to Malaysia on a secret mission where he meets the heroine (Pranitha Subhash). Pranitha falls for Brahma, but Bramha rejects her love and comes back to India. Pranitha follows him to India also. The story then takes a different turn from there. Why does Brahma avoid her? Why does Brahma go to Malaysia? What is his secret mission? Why did he become a dreaded gangster? What connection does Brahma have with the 16th century warrior? Will the Police be successful to nab Bramha for his anti social activities?

Name: Ninnindale
Description: Vicky Venkatesh ( Puneeth Rajkumar) is an adventure enthusiast based in New York. He's tried everything from sky-diving to rock-climbing. Pramila (Erica Fernandes) comes to New York in search of work and accidentally meets Vicky. She faces some embarrassing situations while looking for a job but Vicky boosts her confidence. Pramila falls in love with Vicky, but he doesn't reciprocate her feelings. A hurt Pramila decides to leave him and goes away. However, in due course of time, the hero realizes that he's made a mistake by letting her go. The film ends on a happy note bringing the duo together.

Name: Thallana
Description: Jaya works as a housemaid at Sadanand's house in Bangalore. Her 12 year old daughter suddenly goes missing. Sadanand, who is close with her daughter intervenes to find her. Their search for the girl is muddled and complicated by bureaucracy, societal disinterest and prejudiced hostility.

Name: Shravani Subramanya
Description: An aspiring musician saves a naive girl from the hands of a guy whom she picked, but has now been found to be a rogue. Later both gets their enemies and the plot thickens.

Name: Dyavre
Description: A jail warden (Bhat) who is concerned about the well-being of the prison inmates strives to control the situation after a mass jail breakout. Along the way he has to contend with an enthusiastic journalist (Sonu Gowda) who is searching for a scoop.

Name: Bhajarangi
Description: Jeeva arrives in a village ruled by a cruel god-man and upon learning about his ancestors decides to fight against him.
Six youngsters go for a trekking trip. If five of them gets killed by unknown forces, how many will return back?

Name: Chaddi Dosth
Description: The plot is simple. Ranganna (Rangayana Raghu) comes to Bangalore from Rampura village, looking for Venkateshwara (Avinash), his maternal uncle, for his signature to sell a property in the village. But Venkateshwara cheats him stating that he himself would buy the property and give money to Ranganna. He takes the signature of Ranganna but does not pay him the money. Ranganna becomes close to Khadim (Sadhu Kokila), a petty thief, who is in love with Sandhya (Roopashri), a money lender in a market. As the story progresses, Venkateshwara's daughter (Ashwini Gowda) falls in love with Ranganna. The story takes a turn for the good for both when Ranganna promises to get Sandhya for Khadim, and Khadim promises to get Ranganna his maternal uncle. How they do it is filled with fun and comedy.

Name: Sweety Nanna Jodi
Description: Priya who hails from a middle class family has an inexplicable hatred towards those belonging to rich families. Siddarth who falls in love with Priya, belongs to an affluent family. Will Priya accept him, forms the rest of the story.

Name: Raja Huli
Description: Raja Huli comes from an affluent family and always there to help his friends. One day he sets out to convey the love on behalf of his friend to a girl, to his surprise he finds out that it is his ex-girlfriend. But instead of accepting the love of Raja's friend, the girl falls for Raja once again. This leads to a series of events. A murder that takes place and Raja is blamed for it.

Name: Sakkare
Description: Neha (Deepa Sannidhi) is a frustrated girl as her romance with JD and Preetham turns sour. After a suicide attempt, she comes to her sister's house to forget her past experiences. But Vinay, who calls himself Vinny, winner and bajigar, impresses her with his witty talks and mannerisms. He also weaves a story and tells her that he was part of romantic drama with the two boys. Vinay, as per the wishes of Neha, also brings Vasundhara (Vinaya Prasad) and Col Cariappa (Anant Nag), who were staying single, together through his witty ways. This makes Neha trust him. But later she comes to know that Vinay was also a cheat who played with her emotions to win her heart by cooking up stories. The story takes a curious, but an interesting turn from here.

Name: Jatta
Description: Jatta, a forest guard, leads a happy life with his wife. Later, his wife elopes with a tourist and he gets involved in a clash of ideologies and enslaves a woman in his isolated forest home.

Name: Brundaavana
Description: Madhu and Bhoomi are the cousins of two stepbrothers, who are arch enemies of each other. When Madhu falls for Krishna, he takes up the responsibility to end her brothers' rivalry.

Name: Barfi
Description: A young man and woman must transcend communal prejudice if they want to be together.

Name: Victory
Description: A comedy thriller narrates how one small misunderstanding between the lead pair lead to critical situations. Twist in the story is at the intermission.

Name: Jayammana Maga
Description: A mother and a son struggle with their relationship and with paranormal activity.

Name: Tony
Description: The story revolves around Tony who wants to make quick money and keep his girlfriend happy. His greed changes him eventually and complicates his relationship with his girlfriend.

Name: Lucia
Description: A man suffering from insomnia is tricked into buying a drug, Lucia, that makes his desires come true in his dreams, blurring the line between fantasy and reality.

Name: Googly
Description: Sharath and Swath, who fall in love but get separated due to some misunderstandings. They reunite a few years later at a friend's wedding

Name: Whistle
Description: Whistle is an Indian Kannada film directed by Prashant Raj of Love Guru Fame. The story begins on a romantic note with Ram, a pizza delivery boy, marries his girlfriend Anu after she gets pregnant. The story takes a curious turn when Ram, who visits Smitha Bangalow to deliver pizza. The drama which follows in the haunted house is linked to diamonds. A remake of tamil blockbuster 'Pizza' 2012.

Name: Nam Duniya Nam Style
Description: The story revolves around three best friends, Umesh, Yogi and Preetham. It is on their first trip abroad that they help Preetham find his love, Maya.

Name: Chandra
Description: Royal decorum, even in modern India, is stringent. The old tenet of duties and honor, before emotions and love, still subsist. In order to conserve their prominence, the royals seek the wealthy for alliance, if they have exhausted their own kind. CHANDRA is a tale of a princess caught between the so called royal traditions and her simple uncomplicated heart. Through mature and gripping performances, the essence of love and values linger alongside melodious music, picturesque cinematography, witty comedy, and smooth rendition. The film sends the much needed message - love is above all, and it is only your heart that makes you a royal and not your wealth.

Name: Auto Raja
Description: Quick-witted Raja who admires the critically acclaimed and popular yesteryear director-actor, Shankar Nag is an auto driver himself. He crosses paths with a village girl, Rani, who has come to the city to become a professional actress.

Name: Kaddipudi
Description: Kaddipudi, a rowdy sheeter, yearns for a peaceful life, but politicians like Renukaji, his son Gaali and Shankarappa use him as a pawn for their selfish ends.

Name: Director's Special
Description: A story about a person who brings four unknown as his family. How it unfolds is the story

Name: Bul Bul
Description: An beatifull family entertaining love story

Name: Bachchan
Description: A real estate businessman is forced to go on a vengeful crusade after the love of his life is tortured by goons.

Name: Andar Bahar
Description: An underworld don and his cronies on the run accidentally meet a charming girl. She takes them to the hospital she works in after mistaking them to be police officers.

Name: Bharath Stores
Description: Govinda Shetty doesn't accept globalization which brought the countries nearer. Because even he was a part when India also accepted these which resulting in the gradual change in the lifestyle by popping up Malls and Marts.

Name: CID Eesha
Description: Watch the full movie, CID Eesha, only on Eros Now. CID Eesha is a 2013 Indian Kannada film, directed by N Rajesh and produced by C Umakantha Raju. The film stars Jaggesh, Mayuri, Komal Kumar, Rangayana Raghu in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijay Bharathi.

Name: Topiwala
Description: This movie is about a set of honest people like Basak (Upendra) and others who fight against corrupt politicians who have huge amounts of black money. They've their bank account at Swiss Bank. So in order to sue them and make the whole nation know their fraud, Basak and team fight with them. But unfortunately, a layman helps those politicians and the politicians win, taking away the money. Though Basak and team loses, they tell the layman (and the general public) that they're the ones who have the power to change, sue those having black money.

Name: Simple Agi Ondh Love Story
Description: Kushal (Rakshit Shetty) is sent by his radio jockey sister Rachana to Kodagu to meet her boyfriend's sister in the hope that the two will take a liking to each other, leading to marriage, and thus paving the way for her own marriage. Kushal meets a bubbly girl Kushi (Shwetha Srivatsav) in the house he is sent to, but the rest of the family is out of town. The two share their past romantic liaisons before falling in love with each other. It turns out, though, that the girl is not who she pretends to be. The film takes a curious turn from here.

Name: Myna
Description: The film begins with Satya (Chetan Kumar) being chased by the police. He is caught and is charged with a 34 serial murder case. While being transported to Bangalore on criminal charges, he shares his story with ACP B. B. Ashok Kumar, the officer who is leading the team that arrested him. How Satya met Mynaa is revealed in a flashback sequences.

Name: Attahaasa
Description: Veerappan has been a subject of great mystery and inquisitive character among the journalistic society. His life has been marked with various twists and turns that has always left a common man in oblivion of sorts. His crimes have been marked as acts of bloody thirst for power and money by the forces that have kept a track on him during his tenure as a brigand. This movie is made with a pure journalistic perspective. An in depth study of his life and activities which includes the final moments has been done over the past eleven years. Two hundred and fifty and odd first hand people connected to his life have been interviewed. The cinema is shot on real and authentic locations connected to the events. Also keeping the cinematic value intact, we have not left any stone untouched when it comes to the realistic genre of cinema with respect to this story. The cinema covers everything from the brigand's birth to death and all the pivotal events connected to his story. One should look out for the thrilling moments in the climax of the movie, captured with great rustic detail.

Name: Gombegala Love
Description: What's life movie tries to answer questions in very beautiful way. Never give up attitude of main leads makes movie worth watching.

Name: Varadanayaka
Description: A revenge story, but with a twist. Hari and Siri are in love. Hari's elder brother, Varadanayaka is a tough man and an honest police officer. Will his work and the enemies he makes, especially Section Shankar, impact the lives of his family?

Name: Lakshmi
Description: CBI officer Lakshminarayana is entrusted with the task of busting a terror outfit.

Name: Galaate
Description: A classic college love triangle story. Ankitha is in love with her college mate Abhi but Abhi falls for her friend Shalini. Who will Abhi eventually choose?

Name: Yaare Koogadali
Description: Two friends run away from a mental hospital where they were forcibly kept despite being sane. They decide to stay low with another friend in a rental house. With goons chasing them and being labeled as insane can they lead a normal life?

Name: Prem Adda
Description: Ranganath and his friends are small-time criminals who are loyal to a village politician. But when they are discarded by him after they commit a murder to aid his political plans, they plot a revenge.

Name: Drama
Description: Two young people, Venkatesh and Nandini, get embroiled in a murder case when the strict principal is killed after he humiliates Nandini.

Name: Edegarike
Description: Contract killer Sona decides to leave his past behind. This unnerves his powerful don who orders him killed before he can surrender but things don't go according to plan.

Name: Kranthiveera Sangolli Rayanna
Description: Life saga of Indian brave freedom fighter Sangolli Rayanna against British...

Name: Mr 420
