Description: A school teacher, who is 28 years old and in in search for a suitable groom!. She has gone through 31 wedding proposals, but not a single one fell into place.

Name: Kallan D'Souza
Description: Kallan D'Souza and his friend, get by in life committing petty thefts. CI Manoj is a corrupt police officer who confiscates a huge amount of hawala money, and plans to pocket a big portion of it with his team, rather than turning it in.

Name: The Arbit Documentation of An Amphibian Hunt: Aavasavyuham
Description: Joy is a man who seems to have a mysterious connection with nature. One day he arrives in Puthuvype, and the people there recount stories about him. No one knows where he came from and no one knows where he was going either.

Name: Thirimali
Description: The happy life of a couple gets affected when things take a new turn.

Name: Bro Daddy
Description: The plot revolves around the life of a family man. Unexpected events happen in their house. The brother and father decide to take on the challenges.

Name: Hridayam
Description: The emotional journey of Arun, his carefree bachelor days in engineering college, and how he matures through various phases of life.

Name: Bhoothakaalam
Description: Following the death of a family member, a mother and son experience mysterious events which distort their sense of reality and make them question their sanity.

Name: Salute
Description: S.I Aravind Karunakaran, a police officer on voluntary leave, is haunted by an old case he investigated. How far will he go to unravel the mystery and bring the truth to light?

Name: Meppadiyan
Description: Mechanic Jayakrishnan gets into a big land deal, as a good business investment, but ends up faced with life-changing situations in making the deal happen.

Name: Sathyam Mathrame Bodhippikkoo
Description: Investigation story on the murder of a leading criminal lawyer in the city by an IPS officer.

Name: Super Sharanya
Description: Sharanya, a shy and introverted person, is a native of Kollengode, Palakkad who moves to Thrissur to pursue engineering. She finds it difficult to cope with her new surroundings in college and her hostel.

Name: Randu
Description: Randu is a socio-political satire that hilariously portrays how the quite normal life of a village youth namely Vava is disturbed by the acts of some communal groups in the village. The current social atmosphere and political events add to his challenges. Can he make things straight through his wit and innocence?

Name: Keshu Ee Veedinte Nadhan
Description: Keshu, a 60 year old driving tutor, and his family, flags off a journey to Rameswaram in order to complete his late father's final rituals. Something unforeseen happens en route, which changes his life.

Name: Oru Thathvika Avalokanam
Description: Follows the challenges in the life of a youngster, and events that change his life.

Name: Vidhi
Description: Based on real incidents of the demolition of 'illegally constructed' Maradu flats, Vidhi weaves in two stories; apart from the real-life flat demolition, there is a story of Wayanad tribal colony murders and police atrocities.

Name: Meow
Description: Married couple Dasthakeer and Sulekha move to Dubai with their three children for a better life.

Name: Madhuram
Description: Sabu, Thaju, Ravi and others wait for their loved ones to be treated at a government hospital. Despite their sadness about loved ones, they help each other while learning from each other's lives.

Name: Kunjeldho
Description: Kunjeldho, an undergraduate student, falls in love with his classmate Nivedita. Problems arise when Nivedita gets pregnant.

Name: Ajagajantharam
Description: Aranjali is all set to celebrate the annual temple festival. Some unforeseen chain of events involving an elephant, a few young men, a notorious criminal, a drama troop and some trouble-loving villagers brings complete mayhem to the place.

Name: Minnal Murali
Description: An unusual event creates a lightning which in turns gives superhuman abilies to an ambitious tailor ,whose responsibility is now to protect his home village from the evil plans of the antagonist.

Name: Muddy
Description: Muddy is an adventurous thrilling movie that has several breathtaking moves which was brilliantly done by our Artists without any dupe. The mud race is choreographed by the Director, Dr. Pragabhal.

Name: Sumesh & Ramesh
Description: Indhu (Salim Kumar) as a drunkard lazy father and Praveena the Mom narrates atypical mallu drunkard family life. She is the breadwinner of family. Being Jobless teenagers Sumesh & Ramesh roam around like their father & careless .

Name: Udumb
Description: The events that happen in the life of Ani after he gets convicted for a murder.

Name: Oru Canadian Diary
Description: Sara migrates to Canada and keeps in touch with Surya. However, a few days later, the calls stop. Once Surya reaches Toronto, he begins his search to locate Sara.

Name: Bheemante Vazhi
Description: Bheeman realizes the inconvenience caused by an old pathway when he had to take his mother to the hospital. His life takes an interesting turn when he decides to broaden the pathway.

Name: Kaaval
Description: Thamban and Antony were best friends and business partners. A family tragedy and its falling-out separates them for good. But now Antony and his family faces a grievous situation, and he is forced to ask his old friend for help.

Name: Jan.E.Man
Description: Joy Mon plans his own birthday party to overcome sadness and loneliness, but things take an unpleasant turn when the man next to his friend's house become deceased. Can Joy Mon have a pleasant and cheerful birthday celebration ?

Name: Aaha
Description: Aaha is a sports drama film based on the game tug of war.

Name: Ellam Sheriyakum
Description: Chacko sir's dream of becoming Chief Minister of Kerala get scattered when his daughter elope and marry a comrade from opposition. This political satire drama focuses on the newly married young couples having different political views

Name: No Man's Land
Description: Working as a housekeeper cum escort, Sumitra trudges along with her uneventful life in a resort at a hill station in Kerala. Haunted with self-pity, she finds solace in alcohol.

Name: Lalbagh
Description: Sara's husband Tom gets food-poisoned after a birthday party, and police suspect it was a deliberate attempt to murder him. And they are after the culprit.

Name: Kanakam Kaamini Kalaham
Description: The film revolves around a single day in 'Hill Top' - the once-grand, now-drab hotel in downtown Ernakulam, where a constantly bickering married couple, Pavithran and Haripriya, checks-in for a jolly stay. All the hotel employees and residents seem odd from the beginning itself. Then, all of a sudden, a resident shows up dead under some mysterious circumstances. Now, everyone's a suspect.

Name: Kurup
Description: Kurup is a criminal who is on the run from police after murdering someone for life insurance fraud.

Name: Mission C
Description: In Munnar, understudies are seized by transport gangsters who come on visit and snatch understudies on the vehicle and move towards the Munnar forest. Police are endeavoring to get the lawbreakers by getting the understudies preceding entering the boondocks.

Name: Cabin
Description: Cabin revolves around Devaraj, a truck driver from Tamilnadu, who gets involved in an unforeseen incident with a family moving to Kerala.

Name: Star
Description: Star is about a couple, Roy (Joju) and Ardra (Sheelu). Married for 17 years and living happily with their children, their life turns upside down once Ardra, a homemaker, encounters some eerie situations.

Name: Erida
Description: A wealthy man offers his beautiful wife as a bet in a high stakes poker game which leads to a dangerous play of hate, deception and murder.

Name: Bhramam
Description: Sam, an ace pianist and a pretentious blind man accidentally gets thrown into a famous yesteryear celebrity's homicide which turns his life upside down.

Name: Sunny
Description: Sunny loses everything that he earned in his life. Shattered and hopeless, he smuggles himself back from Dubai to Kerala in midst of a global pandemic with his own secret plans.

Name: Kaanekkaane
Description: Dpt. Tahsildar Paul Mathai arrives in town for some court matters. He is welcomed by his son-in-law Allen. But when Paul is leaving Allen's home, something catches his eye. There comes the shift in their lives...

Name: Paka (River of Blood)
Description: PAKA is a tale of a river that swells with the blood of two feuding families and a young couple that tries to overcome this hatred with their love.

Name: Pidikittapulli
Description: A day in the life of a junior architect and the people he interacts with.

Name: Alice in Panchalinadu
Description: The movie revolves around the life of Alice, a resident of Delhi, after she visits her ancestral home in Pachalinadu, an infamous village in Idukki known as the hub for robberies.

Name: #Home
Description: Oliver Twist (Indrans) wants to be tech-savvy and become a better companion to his two sons, who spend more time on their phones than with their loved ones.

Name: Kuruthi
Description: Conflicts started to happen in Moosa Khader's home after the entry of a police officer and a murder convict.

Name: Eighteen Hours
Description: A young vulnerable woman who gets caught up in the abduction of a group of school girls, by an armed and dangerous gang of goons becomes the only hope of their survival, while the police desperately try to track them on a hostile, isolated forest terrain.

Name: Bannerghatta
Description: Storyline One night Ashiq, an acting driver comes to know that his sister,who went out of town for a job interview is in a dangerous situation.

Name: Chuzhal
Description: The mystery revolves around 5 young people in a hill station resort. Something starts to haunt them without revealing it's presence, while it creates a death trap for them.Will they make it out alive?

Name: Malik
Description: A past ridden with crime, death and pain is recounted to Freddy, a juvenile criminal, who has been assigned to eliminate his estranged uncle Sulaiman, an aging patriarch, while behind bars.

Name: Sara's
Description: Associate director Sara, is struggling to do her first project. Will she be able to succeed with her decisions and get things right?

Name: Cold Case
Description: The film tells the riveting story of a complex murder case, parallelly investigated by a police officer and an investigative journalist in their own way, who eventually cross paths to unravel secrets they never imagined.

Name: The Last Two Days
Description: Two months have passed since three youngsters belonging to a political outfit have gone missing. C.I Srikanth aided by C.P Aby Mathew are given a final two days to solve the mystery.

Name: Wolf
Description: When the police try to unravel the truth behind a series of mysterious crimes in a locality, they face an unexpected situation.

Name: Kho Kho
Description: Malayalam Feature Film based on the Indian tag sport Kho-Kho. The film is written and directed by Rahul Riji Nair and is produced by First Print Studios. Rajisha Vijayan plays the central protagonist in the film.

Name: Krishnankutty Pani Thudangi
Description: Unni, a male nurse, is known for reciting horror stories in a captivating manner. But one such recitation turns his life upside down.

Name: Nayattu
Description: Three police officers who are on a run for life, escaping the outbreak against them due to the unlawful arrest and torture of a civilian. It brings in a few shades of arrogant yet very much human police officers and their helplessness.

Name: Chathur Mukham
Description: An ambitious young woman faces a supernatural force through technology. Will she be able to survive the onslaught and solve this unheard phenomenon?

Name: Nizhal
Description: John Baby, who is recouping from a traumatic accident, meets Nitin, a young boy who interests him with murder stories. When Baby explores the possibility of Nitin's stories by mapping the events, it matches with the real-time incidents.

Name: Joji
Description: Joji, an engineering dropout and the youngest son of a rich family lives with his aspirations of becoming super wealthy. Driven by greed and blind ambition, he decides to execute his plans following an unexpected event in the family.

Name: Irul
Description: When a car breakdown forces a couple to seek shelter in a nearby home, conversations with the stranger inside soon suggest there's a killer among them.

Name: Anugraheethan Antony
Description: A happy-go-lucky Antony disappoints his Dad who was a teacher, so his Dad brings home 2 puppies to insult Antony and show him how thankful Dogs are. Antony despises the Dogs and never leaves any chances to trouble them.

Name: Aarkkariyam
Description: Shirley and Roy in the middle of an impending Covid lock-down and a personal financial crisis, leave their Mumbai home for Shirley's home in Pala where her father Ittyavira stays. Roy soon finds that her home is not what he thought it is.

Name: Innumuthal
Description: The life of Abhinandhan, an ardent devotee of Lord Krishna, turns upside down after a stranger arrives to meet him.

Name: Aanum Pennum
Description: An anthology film that takes you through three different eras in the history of Kerala with three different stories.

Name: One
Description: Story of Kadakkal Chandran, the Chief Minister of Kerala whose uncompromising attitude towards corruption and his dictatorial actions have gained him a lot of enemies. The events get more intense when he faces an allegation.

Name: Kala
Description: A psychological thriller that revolves around Shaji who faces an intriguing conflict with the many layered shades of human behavior.

Name: Mohan Kumar Fans
Description: Mohan Kumar is an ex-superstar, and Krishnan Unni is his greatest fan and also his driver. The film depicts the lengths that Krishnan Unni and Mohan Kumar's family and friends go to, in order to keep him happy--no matter what it takes.

Name: Varthamanam
Description: Faiza joins Delhi University as a research student. She gets acquainted with Amal and other students with a sharp political stance. However, the dynamics of campus life take new forms after the killing of her roommate's brother.

Name: The Priest
Description: A priest and a police officer are trying to solve a set of mysterious suicides. As their investigation closes in, they discover another crime with even farther-reaching consequences.

Name: Tsunami
Description: Bobby is a young man who goes to a seminary in Goa to become a priest, despite his family opposes that. But something happens during his journey so that he ends it there and returns home.

Name: Thirike
Description: A young crafty man kidnaps his own brother, who has Down Syndrome, from his adoptive parents in an attempt to reclaim his past.

Name: Amala
Description: The journey of a brilliant police officer who is entrusted with the task of solving a series of murders happening in the city overnight. He sets out to find clues that would lead him to the killer.

Name: Black Coffee
Description: Will cook Babu who shares a deep bond with Kalidasan return to the latter's house after their misunderstanding?

Name: Drishyam 2
Description: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

Name: Joyful Mystery
Description: A couple in Kerala, India, are on their way to a doctor's clinic to confirm a suspected pregnancy. Tension builds during the ride as the two discuss their future and how to handle the changes in their lives.

Name: Attention Please
Description: An aspiring script writer narrating his plots over booze to his 4 flat-mates.

Name: Operation Java
Description: The story revolves around a group of officers and a series of mysteries, events and cases reported before them in the Cyber Cell. It is also about how they plan and execute their operations.

Name: Grahanam
Description: The story revolves around the life of a couple Roy and Tina whose happy life lands into an unsettling loop of twists when a doubt about Roy's identity haunts Tina.

Name: Yuvam
Description: Three young and not so successful lawyers fight against a social evil.

Name: Churuli
Description: Two undercover cops who go in search of a fugitive enter another dimension occupied by uncivilized residents who are crass and rude. There, the two men get stuck in an apparent time loop as inexplicable events begin to occur.

Name: Sajan Bakery Since 1962
Description: Saajan Bakery Since 1962 revolves around a family-owned bakery that faces sibling rivalry between the two children of the Bakery's founder Saajan.

Name: Thinkalazhcha Nishchayam
Description: Set in Kanjahad, film narrates through the day before a traditional marriage engagement party Suja and Laxmikanth, fixed by Suja's father against her wishes.

Name: Vaanku
Description: Razia, who belongs from a conservative town of Kerala, lives happily with her family. During her final year semester, Razia and her friends discuss their desires where she unveils her one wish to fulfill before the end of her student life.

Name: Vellam
Description: An alcoholic is left stranded by society, friends and family until he successfully completes his de-addiction. Will they accept him when he is clean and sober?

Name: The Great Indian Kitchen
Description: After marriage, a woman struggles to be the submissive wife that her husband and his family expect her to be. The story follows her journey, as she changes herself and, even more so, changes the household.

Name: Guardian
Description: The story revolves around a doctor who tries to save his wife when her past haunts her.

Name: Pullu
Description: The story of a woman named Sunanda, bound by myth and the traditions which forces her to leave her struggling family behind and become the "Devamma" a position based on a mythical legend who is responsible for bringing rain to the village.

Name: Love
Description: A family and the various situations navigated by a husband and wife.

Name: Halal Love Story
Description: A group of friends attempt to make a 'halal' film that conforms to the guidelines and descriptions of an Islamic organization which they are a part of.

Name: C U Soon
Description: A software engineer, living in Kerala, is prompted by his family to look for his cousin's missing fiancee. As they stumble upon her video-based suicide note, he races against time to find her.

Name: Kilometers and Kilometers
Description: Josemon, a young man from Kerala meets Cathy, an American traveler and offers to show her around but during their trip, they begin to share their different views of life to better understand each other.

Name: Maniyarayile Ashokan
Description: When his unlucky horoscope doesn't bode well for his future wife, an earnest bachelor goes to surprising lengths to get the family he's always wanted.

Name: Sufiyum Sujatayum
Description: Sujata (mute) is in love with her neighbour, a sufi priest but her father gets her married off to a well-do-to NRI, in Dubai. Ten years have passed since and she thinks that she's left that love in her past - until, one day, she gets a call. Her husband (Rajeev) decides to bring her back to the village. What follows, forms the crux of Sufiyum Sujatayam, a musical love story.

Name: Kappela
Description: Set in the village areas of Wayanad, Malappuram and Kannur, Kappela revolves around an ordinary, innocent girl who comes to Kozhikode city from a high range area called Poovarmala.

Name: 2 States
Description: A son, his father and his grandfather lead a happy life in a village in Kerala. One day, a girl from Tamil Nadu comes to their village. Their world turns upside down when she and the son fall in love with each other and decide to elope.

Name: Kozhipporu
Description: The story revolves around two families, portraying their relationship, and how a hen and its eggs changes it over time.

Name: Forensic
Description: Samuel uses his forensic skills and discovers breakthroughs in a serial killing case as further victims are added to the list. Shikha teams up with Samuel and uncovers evidence that might lead to the killer's identity.

Name: Isha
Description: The ghost of Isha, who was murdered by a few powerful men, possesses the body of a girl in a family that moves to a hill station bungalow. Isha is out there to take vengeance.

Name: Joshua
Description: Portraying the impact of the medium of cinema on the minds of children.

Name: Paapam Cheyyathavar Kalleriyatte
Description: Christians believe that marriages are made in heaven. It is a satirical take on the belief, which is reinforced through marriage rituals, about the Christian marriage and the reality of it as seen around us.

Name: Trance
Description: A disheartened motivational speaker gets hired by a corporate to become a preacher until his live stint on television puts him and his service under the scanner.

Name: Ayappanu Koshium
Description: The story revolves around the clash between Ayyappan, a senior police officer who serves at the Attappadi Police Station and Havildar Koshi, who comes to the village with a motive.

Name: Varane Avashyamund
Description: Neena is a French teacher and single parent to Nikitha, who is obsessed with the concept of arranged marriage. Their lives change when a retired army man and another young man come to stay at their apartment.

Name: Anveshanam
Description: Aravind is informed that something unexpected has happened to his family and has to reach the hospital immediately. What awaits him comes as a shock as he is soon sucked into a miasma of questions that he has to fight to find the answers.

Name: Gauthamante Radham
Description: Guathamante Radham revolves around Gauthamam and his journey of getting a driving license and, for the first time in the family, a car of his own.

Name: Mariyam Vannu Vilakkoothi
Description: Three friends, all the way from their school days and are still together, working in the same company. The problems start when the trio decided to celebrate their colleague's birthday at the place where he stays as a paying guest.

Name: The Kung Fu Master
Description: Rishi Ram and his sister Rithu Ram, both of whom are martial arts instructors settled in Rishikesh. Their peaceful life is turned chaotic when they cross paths with a notorious martial arts gang, leading to a spree of furious violence.

Name: Silencer
Description: The film tells the story of Eanasu, an old man of ethics, who is in constant struggle with people around him, including his only son Sunny on moral grounds. He surpasses his solitude with noisy rides on a motor bike without silencer, which irritate others around him. Understanding the journeys of his father is not spatial, but through memories and dreams.

Name: Shylock
Description: A ruthless moneylender must tackle a wicked man's plan to outsmart his way out of the debt to achieve what's rightfully his.

Name: Al Mallu
Description: Nayana was cheated by her prospective fiancee, but when he does the same to a dear friend, she decides enough is enough

Name: Uriyadi
Description: Movie revolves around the annual Onam celebration, happening in a police residential quarter. It offers a unique sneak peek into the everyday life's of police personnel and their family, covering their little joy and sorrows.

Name: Big Brother
Description: Sachidanadan had to go to the juvenile home for killing someone. After his release, the recent things that happened to his family, shock Sachidanandan and he has to fight against a powerful drug racket in the city.

Name: Anjaam Pathiraa
Description: The police are on the trail of a serial killer, but with the victims being fellow officers, will they be able to catch the killer and solve the case in time?

Name: Maarjaara Oru Kalluvacha Nuna
Description: Due to an unfortunate event, Shanthanu leaves home and resides in the outskirts of the city named Ashramam Veedu. During the stay period, there is a twist of fate in Shanthanu's life as he encounters a chain of mysterious events.

Name: Dhamaka
Description: Crooked intellect father makes a plan for his son's marriage to a divorced millionaire. Problem begins when son finds out he has erectile dysfunction at his first night

Name: My Santa
Description: The life and challenges of a young girl and a secret Santa who comes into the little one's life on a Christmas eve to fulfill the dreams of the child.

Name: Driving Licence
Description: A famous actor needs to renew his driver's licence, and the motor vehicle agent is a fan of his, but a series of misunderstandings causes a great deal of friction.

Name: Thrissur Pooram
Description: Pullu Giri is trying to live a peaceful life forgetting his ruffian past in his hometown. However, he gets dragged into the affairs of the local goons and gangs after an incident, post which a 'give and take' drama with new baddies ensues.

Name: Valiyaperunnal
Description: Movie revolves around a group of people living in a harbor town. The story delves into their love for each other and a certain festival of sacrifices.

Name: Prathi Poovankozhi
Description: Madhuri (Manju Warrier) an ordinary sales girl takes extra ordinary revenge against Antappn (Roshan Andrews) who misbehaved to her during a bus journey

Name: Stand Up
Description: Diya and Keerthi are friends. Keerthi is an aspiring Stand Up comedian and she is trying to find some opportunities for her shows. a becomes a regular presence in the friend's gatherings and through which she get introduced to 's brother Amal and his friends Jeevan and Sujith. Diya and Amal become lovers eventually. This changes everything for everybody in the

Name: Mamangam: History of the Brave
Description: During the Mamangam festival held at the banks of Bharathappuzha in Thirunavaya, soldiers from various places used to come together to wager battle.

Name: Munthiri Monchan
Description: Munthiri Monchan is a feel good urban romantic comedy revolves around Vivek Viswanath, a young marketing guy working in an cinema advertising firm and his accidental meeting with Ima Rajiv, who runs an online lending library startup. Deepika enters their life as the third person on a train trip to Mumbai.

Name: Jimmy Ee Veedinte Aiswaryam
Description: Jancy Vetilakaran and her family's entire life revolves around her pet dog Jimmy. So when she gets married, her relationship with her husband - also named Jimmy - takes a back seat. Dejected, Jimmy tries everything he can to become the object of her affections.

Name: Thakkol
Description: Fr. Monsignor exerts an iron grip of authority and control over Ambrose, making his life miserable. Ambrose is appointed as the priest of another church. When Ambrose happens to get a mysterious key, the story takes a new turn.

Name: Ulta
Description: Story of a fictional town called Ponnapuram, where all the women are self-sufficient and trained to handle any situation. Their world is put to the test when a few men decide to take them down.

Name: Patham Classile Pranayam
Description: Vivek and Sambhu are rival classmates. Both are infatuated with Meera but Meera is only interested in studies. Will Meera choose anyone? Their final exams are approaching fast.

Name: Kamala
Description: Safar, a high-level real estate broker, is on his way to one of the biggest deals of his life when he encounters Kamala. In the next 36 hours of his life, the mysterious Kamala turns Safar's perfect day into a nightmare.

Name: Happy Sardar
Description: Happy, a timid Sardar living in Patiala, finds his life turned upside down when he falls in love with Mary, a Malayali Knanaya Christian girl. His folks want a Punjabi shaadi and Mary's father is adamant on having a Christian wedding.

Name: Kettiyolaanu Ente Malakha
Description: Sleevachan gets married in hopes of having someone to care for his aging mother. He is, however, oblivious of the idiosyncrasies of a relationship. Trouble comes soon after he takes matter to his own hands.

Name: Sullu
Description: Sullu a survival thriller Revolves around Jithu the protagonist and his relationship with his parents. Jithu a 9 year old boy is very mischievous and couldn't tolerate his moms pamperings and his father's anger issues. One day while playing hide n seek games with his cousins he accidentally get stuck in wardobe which change the life of him and the people around him.

Name: Vaarthakal Ithuvare
Description: Ittan Pillai, the police station head finds himself encapsulated in a case of theft which leads him and the others through a series of chained events throwing the case into a spiral.

Name: Helen
Description: An ordinary suburban girl suddenly disappears, leaving her loved ones in a desperate search as she must face the ultimate battle - the one for her life.

Name: Jack & Daniel
Description: Jack, a thief of hoodwinks the system and steals black money is chased by Daniel, a cop intent on catching him.

Name: Android Kunjappan Version 5.25
Description: Story of a conventional, conservative small town villager and his son who has to move away from home due to his profession. Their relationship gets an endearing twist when an AI humanoid enters their lives and fills in their emptiness.

Name: Nalpathiyonnu
Description: This socio-political satire unravels through hilarious incidents when two people - strong followers of Communist ideologies-set out on a pilgrimage to Sabarimala.

Name: Aakashaganga II
Description: Arathi, accepts a challenge to test the authenticity of an 'Ashram' that claims to help its followers talk to the dead. To her surprise, she communicates with her dead mother who leads her to the dark and hidden secrets of her own family.

Name: Under World
Description: Story of a group of people who must navigate the dark and dirty games of Kerala's underworld as they chase illegal money.

Name: Safe
Description: Shreya opens a Pandora's box of sexual abuse cases that point to a high profile celebrity. Amidst rising crime and violence, Arundhati, a Social Activist starts a public movement called SAFE to protect women, children and the aged.

Name: Edakkad Battalion 06
Description: Shafeek's father wanted him to become a chef, but he chose to serve his country instead. On his annual leave from work, Shafeek, now a young soldier, must deal with his family, his bride to be and a gang involved in illegal activities.

Name: Vikrithi
Description: Mistaking the sleeping passenger on his train for a drunk, a young man posts a picture of him online, unaware of his impulsive act's ugly repercussions.

Name: Aadya Rathri
Description: Manoharan is the last word for the villagers of Mullakkara. The marriage broker has been finding ideal match for youth in his village for 22 years. Will his thoughts on love and marriage change when Ashwathy enters the scene?

Name: Pranaya Meenukalude Kadal
Description: Ajmal, who is a part of the group of people who come together to repair a large boat, falls in love with the boat owner's granddaughter, Jasmine. Things take a turn when a family member finds out the love story.

Name: Biriyaani
Description: The movie chronicles the life of Khadeeja, a married Muslim woman confined within the four walls of the household, forced to conceal her desires in the name of religious and societal norms.

Name: Manoharam
Description: Manoharan is a poster artist struggling to find respect for his profession, after the advent of printing technology. He tries hard to get into the mainstream, by picking up design software skills. Will he succeed?

Name: Ganagandharvan
Description: Kalasadan Ullas is an aspiring singer living an ordinary life, whose world gets turned upside down when he is dragged into a police case involving three women.

Name: The Elder One
Description: A transgender child from Lakshadweep sets off to Mumbai in pursuit of Akbar, an elder brother who left the island due to his sexual orientation.

Name: Jellykettu
Description: A portrait of a remote village where a buffalo escapes and causes a frenzy of ecstatic violence.

Name: Finals
Description: The film revolves around the struggles faced by Alice, a cyclist.

Name: Love Action Drama
Description: A man goes through all kinds of action to impress the girl he is in love with a hope to marry her.

Name: Brother's Day
Description: One day Rony meets an unexpected guest Chandy and they become very close, however, Chandy does not disclose his true identity. Over time Chandy discloses his identity and introduces his daughter Santa and a lot of unexpected events follow.

Name: Ittymaani: Made in China
Description: Manikkunnel Ittymaani, son of a prominent Chinese martial-arts trainer, is a reckless person who keeps landing in trouble.

Name: Shadow of Water
Description: Teenage Janaki departs for a day in the city at dawn. Her suitor has arranged for a ride with his boss, a sullen and dark man who lets Janaki know that he knows she's there without her mother's permission.

Name: Porinju Mariyam Jose
Description: Set against the backdrop of a church festival in Thrissur, is a story of friendship, love and revenge that revolves around the lives of a rowdy, an aristocratic and their mutual friend.

Name: Pattabhiraman
Description: It is the story of a warrior against food adulteration and challenges he faces because of that.

Name: Ambili
Description: Guileless like a child and ever so full of life, Ambili is beloved by everyone in his village. The story traces Ambili's outlook towards life and of challenges others surrounding him that face him on an everyday basis.

Name: Olessia
Description: A drama film directed by Nazrudinsha, Olessia tells the story of an Anglican girl who has to cope with loneliness and depression after being neglected by her parents. The film features Anson Paul, Divya Das and Afsal Ali in central roles.

Name: Kalki
Description: Nanchenkotta is beset by problems and civilian life there is a nightmare. However, the arrival of a fearless police officer with a strong sense of justice is about to change Nanchenkotta's law-and-order situation--once and for all.

Name: Margamkali
Description: Unable to forget his first love, Sachi decides never to love anyone in his life. That's when Oormila enters his life. Will he reconsider his decision?

Name: Ormayil Oru Shishiram
Description: Nithin, a struggling filmmaker is reminiscing his first and unrequited love, Varsha through the days of his plus two classes. This is their coming-of-age story of romance.

Name: Thanneermathan Dinangal
Description: A rom-com based in a school where a schoolteacher named Ravi Padmanabhan comes into the lives of Jason and his friends.

Name: Janamaithri
Description: Cops of Paramedu Police Station encounter a series of events while they are on a mission to improve the image of Kerala Police, by making it people friendly. Will they become successful in their mission?

Name: Sachin
Description: Sachin's father named him after the great Sachin Tendulkar. So, just like Tendulkar when he falls for a girl older than him, the youngster starts believing that perhaps he shares a lot more in common with his idol than just a name.

Name: Shibu
Description: An extraordinary journey of a small town boy, Shibu who aspires to be a film-maker. While working on his career path, he meets a girl, Kalyani, who supports his dreams. What follows is how their aspirations bring them together.

Name: Gangs of 18
Description: Two Schools - one for the rich and one for the poor. Two rival gangs. Two rebel leaders and their epic tale of romance, rivalry and friendship. Prof. John Abraham, who guides these youngsters as they step from adolescence to adulthood.

Name: Sathyam Paranja Viswasikkuvo
Description: Geetha, Suni's wife, bears the brunt of his negligent lifestyle and often quarrels with him over it. After witnessing a gruesome accident, Suni and his friends find their lives taking some really unexpected turns.

Name: Radio Madhav
Description: Mathai's kindness and simplicity endeared him to everyone around him. When an unfortunate turn of events land Mathai in trouble, the people whose life he touched with his kindness rally around to help him.

Name: Subharathri
Description: A simple love story between a man and his wife is broken by a series of unfortunate events.

Name: Luca
Description: An investigative thriller with elements of romance, the film narrates the story of two couples: a Kochi-based scrap artist named Luca and his girlfriend Niharika; and a police officer named Akbar and his wife Fathima.

Name: O.P.160/18 Kakshi: Amminippilla
Description: O.P.160/18 Kakshi: Amminippilla is an unusual court drama happening in Thalassery. This realistic court drama unveils interesting case from different layers with humor and emotions.

Name: And the Oskar Goes To..
Description: A real touching story of a movie maker who struggle to make his own movie passionately and sacrifice his life for his debut Movie, A must watch and inspiring narration.

Name: Unda
Description: The film narrates the events that occur when a unit of policemen from Kerala reach the Naxalite prone areas in North India for election duty.

Name: Ikkayude Shakadam
Description: Story of an ikka (actor mammootty) fan.

Name: Virus
Description: A real life account of the deadly Nipah virus outbreak in Kerala, and the courageous fight put on by several individuals which helped to contain the epidemic.

Name: My Great Grand Father
Description: A 54 year old young looking grand dad is planning to marry a girl of his daughters age

Name: Thamaasha
Description: Srinivasan, a balding professor conscious about his looks, faces a tough time finding the right girl to marry. After learning about his friend Raheem's love story, Srinivasan regains his confidence.

Name: Thottappan
Description: When his partner in crime goes missing, a small-time crook's life is transformed as he dedicates himself to raising the daughter his friend left behind.

Name: Children's Park
Description: Rishi and Jerry are great friends. A strange turn of events lead the duo to an orphanage in Munnar, along with a local politician named Jerry. The events that unfold during their stint in the hill station form the crux.

Name: Adutha Chodyam
Description: Indian Malayalam film directed by A.K.S. Nambiar.

Name: Ishq
Description: Two youngsters who try to find joy after they lose out on love and their need for a mutual trust to sustain love and happiness.

Name: Kuttymama
Description: After retiring from military service kuttymama has became a nuisance to the all the people of his village by his gimmick and blunder6

Name: The Great Indian Road Movie
Description: On regaining his vision after a cornea transplant, a nine-year-old boy embarks on a journey to explore India along with his father.

Name: Uyare
Description: Pallavi is a strong-willed woman who has always aspired to become a pilot. How she gets back on her feet through sheer resilience after being beset by a series of personal crises forms the crux of the film.

Name: Oru Yamandan Premakadha
Description: Movie takes us into the world of a spirited youngster named Lallu and his colorful gang of friends.

Name: Anukoni Athidhi
Description: In an isolated hospital in the high ranges of Kerala, an autistic patient with special skills piques the interest of a psychiatrist, whose investigation into her past leads to startling revelations.

Name: Madhuraraja
Description: When an illegal hooch baron's reign of terror troubles an entire village, the people turn to the only man who can save them: Raja, the flamboyant don with a heart of gold.

Name: Mera Naam Shaji
Description: The lives of three men sharing the same name intertwine, leading to a series of hilarious incidents.

Name: Lucifer
Description: A political Godfather dies and a lot of thieves dressed up as politicians took over the rule. Question arises regarding the successor of the God, unfolding few names, along with the God's most beloved angel, Lucifer.

Name: Argentina Fans Kaattoorkadavu
Description: The film is set on the background of an Argentine football team fan Vipinan between their reign from the 2010 to 2018 FIFA world cups.

Name: Ilayaraja
Description: Vanajan is a middle-aged who lives in a modest house with his ailing father, wife and children. When a moneylender he is indebted makes Vanajan a strange offer one day, his life takes an unexpected turn.

Name: The Gambinos
Description: The film revolves around a mother and her four sons, leading their criminal lives, until the arrival of a young man called Mustafa, who brings unexpected twists and turns to the tale.

Name: Pengalila
Description: An unusual bond between a sixty year old Dalit worker Azhagan and an eight year old middle class girl Radha. Within no time their bond grows stronger. However, his proximity to Radha and her mother doesn't go down well with Radha's father.

Name: Ottam
Description: Set in Trivandrum, the story of Ottam unfolds in a day, and progresses through the lives of two youngsters - Abhi and Vinay. What does destiny have in store for these young men?

Name: An International Local Story
Description: A series of hilarious events take place when a young US-returned doctor is forced into an arranged marriage by his family.

Name: Varikkuzhiyile Kolapathakam
Description: A smart Parish priest is highly respected and loved by the villagers until he gets locked up in a secret location by criminals for witnessing a murder.

Name: Mr
Description: Four wannabe goons desperately looking for contract gigs end up being challenged by a lady gangster.

Name: Kodathi Samaksham Balan Vakeel
Description: Balakrishnan is a lawyer who hasn't been able to achieve much in his professional life due to his stammer. His life takes an interesting turn when his brother-in-law entrusts him with a complex case involving a rich businessman.

Name: June
Description: The life story of a girl named June from 16 years of her age until she turned 26, thereby giving an insight into those ten years of her life.

Name: Oru Adaar Love
Description: The movie depicts the life and times of a group of schoolmates who are best buddies. As they journey through the most memorable times of their lives, lasting friendships are forged and extraordinary tales of romance blossom.

Name: Kumbalangi Nights
Description: The film revolves around four brothers who share a love-hate relationship with each other. Their relationship progresses to another level when Saji, Boney, and Franky decide to help Bobby stand by his love.
When forces within and beyond this world conspire to snatch his son away, a father resolves to do whatever it takes to protect him.

Name: Allu Ramendran
Description: Ramendran is in trouble, since the police jeep he drives always ends up with a flat tyre. This has made him the laughing stock of the village. With his honor at stake, he sets out to find the person who is the source of all his woes.

Name: Lonappante Mammodheesa
Description: Lonappan happens to attend his school reunion, where he revisits his older self and starts to reflect on his potential. When he meets his friends who are doing really well in life and are happy, he starts thinking about his laid back life.

Name: Irupathiyonnaam Noottaandu
Description: Appu, a surfer and restaurant owner in Goa, has to face many difficulties to succeed in love.

Name: Sakala Kalasala
Description: Akbar is a brilliant engineering student. He makes everyone proud when he wins the first prize in a tech fest. However, things take a turn when one of his technical innovation backfires and leaves him into serious trouble.

Name: Mikhael
Description: When a vengeful man with criminal ties starts hunting down his family, Dr. Mikhael vows to protect them and annihilate his enemy.

Name: Neeyum Njanum
Description: A newly married couple moves into a small town hoping to start a new life. But odds are against them and their life takes a roller coaster ride.

Name: Praana
Description: A young woman decides to live a life of solitary in an old mansion away from the city's hustle bustle. Little does she know that the nature surrounding her has other plans for her.

Name: Vijay Superum Pournamiyum
Description: A young engineering student dreams of becoming a chef, much to the dismay of his family.

Name: Thattum Purath Achuthan
Description: Achuthan lives in a village full of fun loving and vibrant people. One fine day he receives a letter addressed to Lord Krishna, which changes his life forever. The letter leads him into the world of Jayalakshmi and into her attic as well.

Name: Njan Prakashan
Description: Pining for a lavish life abroad, a lazy but lovable guy-next-door crafts a scam to avoid a career in nursing and find a wealthy spouse to secure a visa.

Name: Pretham 2
Description: Five members of a Facebook group meet up at an old heritage bungalow to shoot a short film without realizing that their story has an indirect connection with the death of a teenager.

Name: Ente Ummante Peru
Description: The life and journey of Hameed to find his biological mother and how his life changes when Aisha comes into his life.

Name: Odiyan
Description: The story of the Odiyan clan, one of the most dreaded, shape-shifting black magicians in the world which ruled the darkness of night through during the pre-electrification era in Kerala.
When police couldn't tackle a mysterious incident involving his girlfriend, Sanjay takes the matter into his own hands.

Name: Autorsha
Description: It deals with the problems and difficulties faced by auto drivers in Kannur when an incident took place

Name: Joseph
Description: The story develops through the life of four retired policemen. It has the tone of a thriller investigation. An issue affecting the life of Joseph, the central character, and his family is being investigated.

Name: Oru Kuprasidha Payyan
Description: It is a murder mystery which draws its inspiration from the real-life murders in Kerala and explores how a person can be framed and labelled a criminal, even if there is no solid proof of their guilt.

Name: Vallikudilile Vellakaaran
Description: Story about father son deep relationship

Name: Drama
Description: Set in UK, Drama follows the hilarious yet enthralling journey of a funeral director, who sets out to fulfill the final wish of one of his clients.

Name: Johny Johny Yes Appa
Description: This is the story of the menace Johny who is very obedient to his father and have many tricks up his sleeve. He has an innocent demeanor, but underneath he's the mischievous of all the brothers.

Name: Koodasha
Description: Kallookaran Joy is a single father who has left his gangster life behind to lead a peaceful life with his daughter. Things take an unexpected turn when his past comes knocking back to him.

Name: Dakini
Description: Kuttan Pilla, Moly's long lost lover is kidnapped by the underworld king named Mayan. 4 grannies and Kuttappi with the help of Vikraman, a local gangster decide to go on a journey to fight the fierce don Mayan and bring back Kuttan Pilla.

Name: Aanakkallan
Description: A Police Officer seeks a conman's help to solve a murder conspiracy.

Name: Nonsense
Description: A bright but misunderstood student, who has a passion for BMX and a love for science, in his search for humanity. His faith in humanity is tested when something unexpected happens.

Name: Kayamkulam Kochunni
Description: Dreaded by the rich and corrupt and revered by the poor and downtrodden, Kayamkulam Kochunni was a Robin Hood of sorts. Chronicles the life and times of the legendary 19th century highwayman, and how he rose from his humble beginnings.

Name: Aickarakkonathe Bhishaguaranmaar
Description: Sukumaran Vaidyar and his family, who run a charitable ayurvedic resort named Ayur Home. Despite the presence of a multi-specialty hospital in the area, the villagers of Aickarakkonam believe in the efficacy of Ayur Home.

Name: Mandharam
Description: It is a tale of romance in the life of Rajesh, who journeys through various stages of life filled with warmth and contentment from his relationships with the people around him.

Name: Lilli
Description: Abducted and confined in a room by a gang of sadistic men, a pregnant woman tries to escape, against insurmountable odds.

Name: Chalakkudykkaran Changathy
Description: A biographical drama that chronicles the life and the untimely death of actor Kalabhavan Mani, who rose from his humble beginnings to become one of the most versatile artists in Malayalam cinema.

Name: Varathan
Description: After losing his job Abin along with his wife Priya, who has suffered a miscarriage, decide to shift from Dubai to Priya's family estate in Kerala. However, peace eludes the couple as they run into a set of new troubles.

Name: Mangalyam Thanthunanena
Description: Roy and Clara, a newly-wed couple who find themselves in a tight spot after Roy loses his job in Dubai. Will Roy manage to get his act together and deal with the crisis on his own?

Name: Padayottam
Description: The story revolves around a local don Chenkal Raghu, from Thiruvananthapuram and how the society perceives him.

Name: Oru Kuttanadan Blog
Description: Sudhi is writing a blog titled Oru Kuttanadan Blog, based on the serene beauty of a village Kuttanad. The blog largely revolves around Hari, who is an idol to the youth.

Name: Theevandi
Description: Theevandi is a political satire depicted through light humor where the protagonist Bineesh hardly knows a thing even about himself.

Name: Ranam
Description: Trapped in a life of crime, a mysterious getaway driver, lives with this code of conduct and protects his only friend. When he meets someone who can potentially change his entire world, he yearns at a chance for redemption.

Name: Neeli
Description: As Lakshmi learns to accept the setbacks and begins a new chapter in her life, her daughter, Thara goes missing. She embarks on a journey in search of her daughter and comes across four strangers.

Name: Iblis
Description: The love of half-witted Vyshakh for the beautiful Fida and how it takes him places that are beyond reality.

Name: Ente Mezhuthiri Athazhangal
Description: Sanjay Paul, a chef settled in Paris who has traveled around the world wants to add Indian cuisine in his new restaurant. In his quest to get the secret recipes from his friends, he falls in love with Anjali, a custom-candle designer.

Name: Maradona
Description: Maradona, a young man, due to some dangerous situations, moves out of his hometown and reaches Bangalore to stay with his distant relatives. However, during his stay there, his situation worsens further.

Name: Kinavally
Description: Vivek is celebrating his wedding anniversary with his wife Ann, who decides to invite four of his friends to surprise her husband. But, their celebrations are short-lived as they start experiencing paranormal activities around them.

Name: Bhayanakam
Description: A World War I veteran is sent to Kuttanad as a postman to deliver money orders and letters to the families of soldiers. Soon, the happiness that his visits brought to the families turns into sadness with the outbreak of the World War II.

Name: Oru Pazhaya Bomb Kadha
Description: Sreekuttan, a physically challenged young man, meets Shruthi after which he finds himself in the most challenging situation he has ever faced. Will he be able to come out of the situation or be overwhelmed by his physical inabilities?

Name: Koode
Description: The story is set against the backdrop of hills of Nilgiris where two siblings, Joshua and Jenny, who come from a middle-class family. Together, they dwell on the serenity and calmness of the mountains.

Name: Neerali
Description: Sunny meets with an accident. As his life hangs in the balance on the edge of a cliff in the middle of nowhere, he must not only contend with the great adversity he is in, but the adversaries lurking in the shadows as well.

Name: My Story
Description: Jay and Tara, fall in love on the sets of their film. However, Tara is set to marry David. Twenty years later, Jay is a big movie star but is still in love with Tara and decides to travel to Lisbon in search of her.

Name: Kidu
Description: Kidu is the story of a class teacher, who becomes a great influence in the life of five naughty students when a dramatic incident turns their lives upside down. Will they be able to sustain the tough times?

Name: Abrahaminte Santhathikal
Description: Derick Abraham, a fiery and dutiful police officer, continues to be the best officer until his brother Philip Abraham gets arrested for false murder charges. Will he be able to investigate the case and serve justice to his brother?

Name: Njan Marykutty
Description: A transsexual man's attempt to realize his true orientation in a society that stigmatizes gender transformation. Will Marykutty come out victorious while shredding all the taboos associated with transsexuality?

Name: Abhiyude Katha Anuvinteyum
Description: They fell in love and swore to always be together, until a strange twist of fate reveals them to be more than just lovers. To what extent will they go to protect their love?

Name: Mazhayathu
Description: A bizarre incident shakes the family of 3 and the father finds himself becomes the victim of people's anger.

Name: Who
Description: In Mercada, a mysterious valley that is spread across 200 km, strange events occur every year on the Christmas day. A young girl, a dream interpreter, a criminal psychologist and a team of two police officers try to solve the puzzles.

Name: Kuttanpillayude Sivarathri
Description: Kuttan Pillai lives with his wife in a rural village and has an obsession with the jack fruit tree in his yard. During the Shivaratri festival, something strange happens that forms the main story.

Name: Naam
Description: A group of six guys and three girls who meet in college become thick friends and eventually take their friendship beyond the classroom and the campus. All goes well for the group until they are faced with sudden crisis.

Name: Kamuki
Description: Achaamma is forced to make a promise to her father; she would not elope and marry anyone like her elder sister. While she keeps her word for the longest time, she begins to stumble when she meets Hari, her fellow mate at her college.

Name: Premasoothram
Description: A tale of two men falling for the same girl Ammukuty, who is completely oblivious of their love. While Prakashan and Suku fight amongst themselves for her love, a third man vying for it enters her life.

Name: B
Description: A bunch of engineering students in Bengaluru struggle to get through the course due to their lackadaisical attitudes and frequent skirmishes within the college. An incident outside the campus though shakes them to reality and they are forced to confront it through a trial by fire.

Name: Ee
Description: Set in Chellanam, Kochi, the story of Ee. Ma. Yau revolves around the death of Vavachan Mesthiri in a coastal village. It showcases the events that unfold between two evenings and looks at death from different perspectives.

Name: Aabhaasam
Description: The story of Aabhaasam is about an overnight bus journey from Bangalore to Kerala where the travelers analyze the schizophrenic society and how it has evolved through different times.

Name: Chanakya Thanthram
Description: A fresh-out-of-college criminologist, finds himself pit against an evil mastermind, whom he can only outdo by using his wits and courage.

Name: Aravindante Athidhikal
Description: A five-year-old kid is found deserted on Navarathri at a 1200-year-old temple and is believed to have been blessed by with the presence of Mookambika Devi is found and raised by a lodge owner.

Name: Uncle
Description: The social and political milieu of Kerala is of much importance in the movie about an unusual situation a family is forced to face.

Name: Thobama
Description: Story and friendship of three childhood friends

Name: Kammara Sambhavam
Description: Kammaran Nambiar is a crooked man whose life story as an unscrupulous Indian peasant is turned into a film where he is glorified as a freedom fighter with much manipulation of history.

Name: Panchavarnathatha
Description: The story of a bird charmer as he goes on to influence the lives of people while witnessing a change in his own.

Name: Mohanlal
Description: Meenu was born on the same day that Mollywood superstar Mohanlal first appeared on the silver screens across Kerala in the iconic movie Manjil Virinja Pookal.

Name: Parole
Description: Alex is a comrade and an active communist leader. Due to some unfortunate events, Alex gets arrested and is imprisoned but is compelled to come out on Parole to solve a mystery he left behind.

Name: Aalorukkam
Description: Pappu Pisharadi, an aging man, is on a constant hunt for his son, who left him 16 years back, which is when he is brought to a hospital where he meets Dr. Seetha and Priyan, who promise to help him find his son.

Name: Orayiram Kinakkalal
Description: Sreeram, an ex NRI, with few other people, gets involved in an easy money-making plan. In this unusual ride, each one ends up showing different shades of their personality, revealing how far they are willing to go to fulfill their dreams.

Name: Swathanthryam Ardharathriyil
Description: Jacob, a manager at a big financial firm, finds himself behind bars when he tries to save the woman he loves from being involved in a criminal case. The only way for him to survive and to escape was to break out of prison.

Name: Vikadakumaran
Description: Binu Sebastian, a small-time advocate, makes his living by taking up petty cases and leads a simple life. His life takes a drastic turn when he stumbles upon a sensational case and decides to take it up.

Name: Kuttanadan Marpappa
Description: When John Paul, a wedding photographer, meets Jessy for the first time, he instantly finds himself attracted to her. His crush eventually turns into love, the feeling which is reciprocated from Jessy's end too.

Name: Sudani from Nigeria
Description: Story of an African football player and a local football club manager from Malappuram, Kerala.

Name: Poomaram
Description: A war is waged between two colleges at the youth festival, with Goutham (Kalidas Jayaram) leading the Maharaja's college to regain their lost glory from the all-time winners, St. Teresa's college led by Irene (Neetha Pillai).

Name: Ira
Description: Aryan is like every other lover, who finds the world a better place just because of that one person. Life takes a sudden twist when he is implicated of a serious crime which he didn't commit and Rajeev who comes as a savior in his life.

Name: Kala Viplavam Pranayam
Description: Kala Viplavam Pranayam is a story of four school friends trying to figure out their interests and options after school.

Name: Kalyanam
Description: Sarath is deeply in love with Shari looks for the perfect opportunity to tell her. The movie revolves around a wedding, where who marries who is answered.

Name: The Little God
Description: An ode to the age of innocence, Oru Kunju Daivam tells the story of a spirited boy and his little world full of miracles.

Name: Captain
Description: Former Indian football captain V P Sathyan is found dead under mysterious circumstances.

Name: Aami
Description: The biopic on iconic Kerala writer Kamala Das alias Kamala Surayya alias Madhavikutty.

Name: Kaly
Description: Six best friends, all wanted to dress up in branded outfits and look stylish in all manner. The hankering for luxury brands led them to steal. The turn of events starts when they broke into a villa and get stuck inside.

Name: Rosapoo
Description: After suffering a loss in his brick-and-mortar duty-free shop, Shajahan finds it difficult to sustain his business. To make ends meet, he decides to take up odd jobs but to no avail.

Name: Hey Jude
Description: Two odd ball characters, a youngster named Jude and the other, a talented singer named Crystal. When these two characters come together, their lives undergo several changes, leading to love, self-discovery, healing and transformation.

Name: Aadhi
Description: Aadhi, an aspiring musician, travels to another state in hopes of making it big. While there, an unexpected event leaves him trapped, unable to return to his family and running for his life.

Name: Street Lights
Description: James, a Crime Branch police office faces thrilling events during his pursuit to solve a mystery.

Name: Shikkari Shambhu
Description: When an entire village is terrorized by the news of a tiger on the loose, they turn to Peeli and his jolly gang of friends for help. Rumour has it that Peeli is the son of famed hunter Varunni.

Name: Carbon
Description: Sibi Sebastian's relentless determination takes him to the most unexpected situation in his life.

Name: Queen
Description: The story starts with the inauguration of the first-ever Mechanical batch in an engineering campus consists of boys only. Later in the second year of the department, a girl joins and becomes the only girl to be a part of their batch.

Name: Daivame Kaithozham K
Description: The movie is a comic take on gender role reversal between K Kumar and his wife to experience life of one another, with God's permission.

Name: Eeda
Description: Anand and Aiswarya who hail from nearby villages in North Malabar. A chance meeting in their native place develops into a passionate affair in Mysore. But their lives suddenly become intertwined in a series of violent events.

Name: Diwanji Moola Grand Prix
Description: The reopening of a long forgotten race brings together a family, old-time friends and an entire colony of the downtrodden to raise a new champion.

Name: Aadu 2
Description: Shaji Pappan and his gang try to redeem their arts club through a game of tug-o-war. Chaos erupts as the half-witted gang gets entangled in a bigger conspiracy.

Name: Mayaanadhi
Description: The life of Mathan, a mule driver in a gang and Aparna an aspiring actress.

Name: Aana Alaralodalaral
Description: Accused of stealing an elephant's "elassu", Hashim and family are and forced to leave the village. Hashim returns to the village to settle the score.

Name: Masterpiece
Description: Edward Livingston, an English professor at the Travancore Maharaja College. As the defiant students continue to split into warring factions, Livingston sets out to restore order and make the campus a better place for everyone.

Name: Paippin Chuvattile Pranayam
Description: An island and its people, a self-contained world where goodwill and camaraderie prevail over everything else. At the center of this world are Govutty and Tina, and their endearing love story.

Name: Vimanam
Description: The life of Venkateswaran, a differently-able man from Kerala. It showcases how Venkidi, who had hearing impairment, fought all odds and built a lightweight aircraft from recycled materials without any external support.

Name: Y
Description: Some unexpected events on a street catch everybody present there by surprise. The movie is about how the characters there, react to the incidents taking place.

Name: Punyalan Private Limited
Description: Joy Thakkolkaran continues his life through many problems when he introduces a new product: Punyalan Water

Name: Goodalochana
Description: A group of four friends take the easy route to accomplish their dreams. Even when things go haywire, they try to find an easy way out but, fate has other plans for them and all hell breaks loose when their decisions go wrong.

Name: Overtake
Description: Based and inspired by a real-life incident, the movie depicts the events that take place after a family is trapped by a stranger.

Name: Villain
Description: A killer who teases the entire police department with his flawless crimes, gets chased by a retired stylish cop whose past influence the killer's future with the cat and mouse game getting out of hand.

Name: Kaattu
Description: Set in the rustic terrains during the late 70s, movie is a slice-of-life tale with lead characters inspired from the short stories of veteran P. Padmarajan.

Name: Lavakusha
Description: The movie revolves around two happy-go-lucky friends, Lavan and Kushan. Things take a turn when they are approached by a mysterious guy and girl, who influence their lives in various ways.

Name: Solo
Description: An anthology, telling the story of four different people, each story revolving around four different elements: Earth, Fire, Wind and Water.

Name: Sherlock Toms
Description: An ardent fan of Sherlock Holmes from childhood, Thomas tries his best to solve issues like Sherlock Holmes. Thomas without losing his Sherlock Holmes instinct starts applying it in his line of work unveiling a major crime.

Name: Tharangam
Description: The misadventures of two bumbling cops. Featuring a cast of colorful characters each with their own agenda.

Name: Ramaleela
Description: Adv. Ramanunni is offered an MLA seat, he is thrown headfirst in to the dirty abyss of politics. What ensues is a cloak and dagger game where it is impossible to survive unless he plays along.

Name: Udaharanam Sujatha
Description: Sujatha, who juggles menial jobs to afford her daughter's education. But her daughter neglects studies, thinking that she'll end doing odd jobs just like her mother. Things take a comical turn, when Sujatha does something out of the blue.

Name: Pokkiri Simon: Oru Kadutha Aaradhakan
Description: Simon, a charming young Malayalee boy, is a die-hard fan of the Tamil superstar Vijay. However, his parents, who dream of a successful career for him, soon get worried about Simon's craze for Vijay becomes his obsession.

Name: Parava
Description: The story of Parava revolves around pigeon race, a game, which is prominent in Mattancherry, Kochi, Kerala.

Name: Matchbox
Description: Ambu, a college student, develops romantic feelings for a woman he sees at a bus stop. However, things get complicated before he can profess his love to her.

Name: Njandukalude Naattil Oridavela
Description: Kurian returns home when his family summons him, believing it to have something to do with his marriage. However, he learns that his mother has breast cancer and supports her along with his family.

Name: Adam Joan
Description: The story revolves around the life of a planter, Adam Joan Pothan from the village Mundakkayam. One day, he unexpectedly meets a girl named Emy and they go to Scotland together. The new people he meets on his journey changes his life.

Name: Pullikkaran Staraa
Description: Rajakumaran, a talented teacher and also a trainer for other teaching staff. The story takes a turn when two women from two different generations come across his life and change it for the better or worse.

Name: Velipadinte Pusthakam
Description: Professor Mathew Idikkula, who reformed the atmosphere of a college by developing a healthy relationship between teachers and students. The film reflects the goodness of the youth and the impact the students can have. It also takes a round-up on the revenge of the death of founding father of the college by killing his assasin.

Name: Oru Visheshapetta Biriyani Kissa
Description: Tara, a blessed cook in a southern village, and the funny series of events related to a suspended biriyani offering that the villagers attempt to restart.

Name: Bobby
Description: A 21-year old boy, who gives up his Seminary Studies and falls in love with a lady who is 7 years elder to him. The movie showcases the funny events, romance and the love life of the couple.

Name: Honey Bee 2.5
Description: Vishnu aspires to be an actor and his passion and perseverance take him to the sets of Honey Bee 2 (2017).

Name: Thrissivaperoor Kliptham
Description: David Pauly ever wanted in life was to witness the downfall of his high school nemesis Chembaden Joey. When Joey louses up Davy's betrothal ceremony, Davy and his friends vow to scheme up something that would button up Joey forever.

Name: Chunkzz
Description: Mechanical engineering students, Romario, Riyas, Yoodas, and Athmaram think their lives are miserable since there are no girls in their class. Much to their joy, a girl called Riya joins their class and soon becomes their friends.

Name: Varnyathil Aashanka
Description: The lives of four Trichur-based crooks--Kowta Shivan, Paara Wilson, Chembakara Gilbert, and Pratheesh--cross paths with Tips Dayanandan, a lazy, good-for-nothing man who lives off his wife's hard-earned money, on one fateful Harthal day.

Name: Sarvopari Palakkaran
Description: Jose, a Circle Inspector of Police, Special Branch from Trissur, Kerala, who comes from a respected and well-known conservative christian family, is on the lookout for a suitable bride who fits within his idea of an ideal woman.

Name: Minnaminungu
Description: Directed by Anil Thomas, Minnaminungu is a Malayalam Movie which tells the story of a of a single mother in Kerala.

Name: Sunday Holiday
Description: Unni Mukundan, who is very passionate about his first movie, coincidentally meets director David Paul. At the same time, the life experiences of Amal, who relocates himself to Cochin, make him undergo a total change in his vision of life.

Name: Tiyaan
Description: Two youths, a Muslim and a Hindu, get trapped in a religious clash in North India. Can they escape from the situation?

Name: Thondi Muthalum Driksakshiyum
Description: Prasad and Sreeja enter wedlock and move to a new place to continue the rest of their lives. Unfortunate events begin to take place after Prasad, a small-time thief, robs Sreeja's gold chain during a bus journey.

Name: Role Models
Description: Gautham's life takes some unexpected turns after realizing that "the greatest mystery in the world is human life itself." What unfolds is a maze of both the trivial and the sublime.

Name: Oru Cinemakkaran
Description: Alby, who is a passionate and hardworking filmmaker, begins to face financial liabilities. Being stressed, he soon gets involved in a thoughtless act and finds himself in an unpredictable situation.

Name: Avarude Raavukal
Description: Aashiq, Siddharth, Vijay, and Vinod stay together in the house of an old man named Skobo Johnson. The unexpected events in their life form the plot of the movie.

Name: Chicken Kokkachi
Description: Kallu, who hails from a middle-class family, living in a village, is forced to abscond from his village given the problems his family and he starts facing following his sister's marriage.

Name: Godha
Description: Captain, a former wrestler, sends his son Das to Punjab for higher studies. Once there, Das falls in love with Aditi, a champion wrestler, who inspires him to pursue the sport.

Name: Achayans
Description: The Thottathil family set out on a journey to find extreme fun and enjoyment. Accidentally, two girls join their journey. The rest of the journey unfolds with lots of twists and turns.

Name: Adventures of Omanakuttan
Description: An introverted daydreamer and a ghost-hunter pair up.

Name: Ramante Edenthottam
Description: Raman lives a beautiful life in his forest resort. Malini visits Eden and the two meet and fall in love. The film travels through their relationship across a few years and how the two evolve as individuals.

Name: Lakshyam
Description: This film focuses on two people, an IT professional and a person from the slums. The story progresses with their journey from Peermade to Eranakulam as convicts.

Name: CIA: Comrade in America
Description: A young man in Kerala has two weeks to stop the woman he loves from a fixed marriage in the U.S., but he doesn't have the papers to get there.

Name: Rakshadhikari Baiju Oppu
Description: Rakshadikari Baiju Oppu explores the story of a funny and good-hearted man Baiju, who is a government employee and also a patron at the Brothers Club in Kumbalam.

Name: Sathya
Description: The protagonist from Kerala who goes to Pondicherry and becomes very successful in life by gambling. However, he also makes enemies because of this. The story further progresses through the various incidents that happen due to gambling.

Name: Sakhavu
Description: A student political leader who fights for his left-wing ideals. When some people try to use him in order to fulfill their intentions he is forced to fight for his ideals.

Name: Puthan Panam
Description: The movie is based on the issue of black money. Nithyananda Shenoy is based in Kasargode and the film portrays his struggle to tackle black money.

Name: Georgettan's Pooram
Description: The son of a Christian priest is expected to follow in his father's footsteps, but grows in values opposite to the onus of priesthood.

Name: 1971: Beyond Borders
Description: The story of the 1971 war between India and Pakistan is told from the perspective of a soldier.

Name: The Great Father
Description: A businessman who is trying hard to be a good father to his daughter has a run-in with malevolent policeman.

Name: Take Off
Description: In 2014, a group of Malayali nurses was captured when terrorists took over the city of Tikrit in Iraq. This movie recounts the ordeal suffered by the nurses following their capture.

Name: Honey Bee 2: Celebrations
Description: Angel's brothers decide to get their sister married to Sebastian. As the story moves closer to the wedding, the huge contrast in the cultures of both the families leads to conflict of opinion.

Name: C/O Saira Banu
Description: In a bad turn of events, Joshua and Banu's life is shaken when Joshua becomes the convict in a court case. This is when Annie John Tharavadi, a reputed advocate becomes part of these happenings.

Name: Alamaara
Description: The life of a newly married couple revolves around a cabinet (alamaara) which the groom received as dowry.

Name: Oru Mexican Aparatha
Description: The film, set in a college campus, narrates how the students established the political party Students Federation of India.

Name: Angamaly Diaries
Description: Vincent Pepe who wanted to be a powerful leader of a righteous gang that ruled the city, like his seniors. And then there's the rival clan with the malicious gangsters of Angamaly a locale on which the film is based.

Name: Aby
Description: Aby is aspired to fly and make an aeroplane by his own without any formal engineering education. The movie depicts how the hero struggles to make his dream come true and the obstacles he faces on his way to success and achieve glory.

Name: Ezra
Description: A newly married woman brings an antique Jewish box into her home, unaware that the box contains the ghost of Abraham Ezra.

Name: Fukri
Description: An aristocratic family welcomes a long-lost heir, but the young fellow may be leading his relatives down the garden path.

Name: Sexy Durga
Description: Durga, a north Indian migrant and a Keralite youth named Kabeer are running away on a midnight. The hapless Durga encounters a cross section of the society through the rest of the night.

Name: Munthirivallikal Thalirkkumbol
Description: This onscreen adaptation of the story 'Pranayopanishad' (The Upanishad of Love) follows Ulahannan, a middle aged government servant, through his emotional journey of misconceptions and love.

Name: Jomon's Gospels
Description: The son of a wealthy man works through his relationships with his brother and sister.

Name: Ore Mukham
Description: An array of ex-college mates are being murdered by a common friend, Zachariah Pothen. Meanwhile, the police tries to stop the murders and a journalist tries to uncover the truth.

Name: 10 Kalpanakal
Description: Movie progresses through three different phases in the life of Davis George, a forest officer. He leads a contented life with his wife Sara and son. Certain unexpected tragedies wreck the smooth flow of their life.

Name: Kattappanayile Rithwik Roshan
Description: A young man struggles to break stereotypes and get into the film industry.

Name: Swarna Kaduva
Description: Rini Iype Mattummel, is a man whose sole aim is to make money within the short span of time. He will do anything to make money.

Name: Aanandam
Description: A coming of age drama exploring love, life and friendship as a class of second year engineering students set out on their very first college tour to the exotic lands of Hampi and Goa.

Name: Kavi Uddheshichathu..?
Description: Kavalam Jimmy and Vattathil Bosco are rivals from their school days and Minnal Simon always tries to benefit from this situation.Three of them have their own intentions and they back stab each other to attain their own aims.

Name: Pulimurugan
Description: When a small village near a forest is under the threat of man eating tigers and a drug mafia, the villagers seek the help of an unstoppable force, a hunter invincible.

Name: Thoppil Joppan
Description: Joppan's failed romance excuses him to be an alcoholic. Hoping to start a new life, he seeks out for some love but would fate favor him this time?

Name: Olappeeppi
Description: Malayali family's ordinary life in Kerala from 1970s-2000s told through young Unni and grandmother's perspectives, recalling past eras.

Name: Oru Muthassi Gadha
Description: It narrates a story of a wealthy grandmother who helps to change her daughter's older mother in law's repressed behavior by fulfilling her bucket list. Later they start a online group to fulfill wishes of elderly people.

Name: Kochavva Paulo Ayyappa Coelho
Description: Ayappa strongly wishes to travel by airplane. Kochavva helps the child achieve this through his optimistic and practical ways. Ayappa learns that who and what you love is more important than what you wish in life.

Name: Welcome to Central Jail
Description: Unnikuttan is a young man, who was born in the central jail. He considers jail as his second home. As a good Samaritan he takes on the punishments for petty crimes committed by others.

Name: Oppam
Description: A blind man tries to protect a girl from a psycho killer.

Name: Oozham
Description: After witnessing a tragic demise over a video call, Surya, a demolition expert decides to avenge their deaths. He finds support in his fiancé, Gayathri, who is mourning her brother's death.

Name: Once Again
Description: Purushothaman Nair is jobless while his wife Devi is a teacher and they have a daughter. The film speaks about love, romance, and the bonds between family members.

Name: IDI: Inspector Dawood Ibrahim
Description: Inspector Dawood Ibrahim who dreams of becoming a cop. His sole aim is to catch lawbreakers. The movie is all about how he fulfills his dreams.

Name: Pretham
Description: Three friends run a beachfront hotel leaving their jobs. Now their hotel is haunted by paranormal phenomenons. A cold reading psychic John Don Bosco enters their life and Clara's phantom realm to solve the troubling mystery.

Name: Marubhoomiyile Aana
Description: An unemployed youngster from Kerala who leaves for the Gulf to seek his fortune. The fortune he finds is a Sheikh who comes with him back to Kerala. The various escapades of the Sheikh in Kerala is what the movie is all about.

Name: Guppy
Description: The story of a 12 year old boy who sells guppy fish for a living in his colorful beach side colony. When an engineer is summoned to construct a bridge, the contrasting characters cause great tension and turmoil.

Name: Ann Mariya Kalippilanu
Description: Ann Mariya, a jovial kid hires a goon, Gireesh due to an incident at school. Her kindness causes Gireesh to change his morals and they become great friends. Family problems and her desire to be no. 1 at long jump form the rest of the story.

Name: Kismath
Description: The friendship between B.Tech student Irfan and research student Anitha and the lives around them form the plot of the film. Various incidents that take place in one day are narrated in the movie.

Name: White
