Description: A romantic story of a middle-aged billionaire and a younger woman in London.

Name: Anuraga Karikkin Vellam
Description: The equation of Raghu and his son Abhi passes through various stages, and Raghu his son making the mistakes he did once. With a bit of help from someone new in their lives, the family passes through a turf of transformation.

Name: Kasaba
Description: Rajan Zachariah, an Inspector of Police working in the Palakkad District on the Kerala-Karnataka border, investigates a murder case that is very important to him.

Name: Karingunnam 6's
Description: Vandana and Aby are outstanding volleyball players. An accident changed Aby's life forever. Aby is so disheartened that his dream will never come true. Vandana sets off to Central Jail to select efficient players to fulfill Aby's wish.

Name: Shajahanum Pareekuttiyum
Description: Jiya is a rich girl who has a distinctive personality and has great hopes and dreams. An unfortunate incident shook her life. At this juncture two guys Pranav and Prince enter Jiya's life with definite intentions.

Name: Oru Murai Vanthu Paarthaya
Description: Prakshan runs an electrical hardware shop and is known by all the people of that village. As the story progresses, the entry of a mysterious girl in Prakshan's life unfolds a lot of suspense and comical moments.

Name: School Bus
Description: Joseph and Aparna are a couple with two children. Their son Aakash is a troublemaker and often rebuked for it. The intervention of certain characters makes their life highly complicated and the children too get affected.

Name: Kammatti Paadam
Description: Krishnan, who has been living away from his family and friends in Mumbai, gets a call from his friend Ganga in Kerala, out of the blue. He senses danger, and leaves for Kammattipadam, where both of them grew up.

Name: Happy Wedding
Description: Hari gets infatuated three times and and with the third one his love lorn curse ends by intervention of a marriage consultant who works for a prime fee without any strings attached afterwards.

Name: Aadupuliyattam
Description: King Udayapandyan ruled some provinces of Tamil Nadu, 600 years ago. He fell in love with a huntress named Mathangi (Ramya Krishnan), married her and built her a bungalow near the forest. When Udayapandyan is defeated in a war, he takes shelter at Mathangi's bungalow and she vows to take care of the king. She sacrifices her life before the deity Bhadrakali, to save the life of King Udayapandyan. However, Mathangi's spirit continues to stay on and a yogi (Om Puri) performs certain rituals to rein in her spirit. When this myth continues, it affects the life of a well-known businessman Satyajith (Jayaram), who leads a happy life with his family.

Name: Mudhugauv
Description: Movie is narrated through three different tracks. The romance between two students forms the first track, story of a villain forms the second track and third track played by two friends. Confluence of these three tracks completes the plot.

Name: Valliyum Thetti Pulliyum Thetti
Description: Movie is set in a village in Palaghat. A C-class theater and a festival that lasts for a period of ten days form the background of the story.

Name: James and Alice
Description: James and Alice marry against their parent's wishes and the movie revolves around the misunderstandings between them caused by their busy lifestyles. Things take a turn when James meets with a freak car accident.

Name: Leela
Description: Kuttiyappan is an unmarried 40 something, who lives a careless life, loves to create one-night relationships with women.

Name: Jacob's Kingdom of Heaven
Description: The struggles faced by a business man and his family in Dubai to stabilize themselves after getting cheated by a fraudster.

Name: King Liar
Description: After falling in love with an aspiring fashion model, a conman attempts to get her work with India's top fashion design company.

Name: Kali
Description: A young wife hopes to convince her husband to change his short-tempered attitude toward life, but an incident on a remote highway may finally decide the matter.

Name: Ithu Thaanda Police
Description: Movie narrates the interesting story of the incidents that occur when a male Police Officer joins as the driver of an all woman Police Station.

Name: Darvinte Parinamam
Description: Anil Anto and his wife Amala have to shift to Kochi from Kottarakkara at a particular circumstance. Anil works in the Cable TV office and Amala works in a press. There they come across Darwin who thinks that Kochi is in his hands.

Name: Vettah
Description: Two police officers trapped in a web of deception and lies from everyone they trust after they take up a case involving a mysterious man who is arrested for a double homicide.

Name: Hello Namasthe
Description: When roommates Madhav and Jerrin bought two adjacent villas and started living with their families, they never thought that their friendship will be affected in any way.

Name: Puthiya Niyamam
Description: A story about Louis Pothen, a divorce lawyer and his wife Vasuki Iyer, a kathakali dancer.

Name: Maheshinte Prathikaaram
Description: Mahesh, a studio photographer and studio owner gets into a fight and loses. He ends up taking revenge which leads to certain realizations in his life.

Name: Action Hero Biju
Description: The life of an honest and determined police officer Biju and the various criminals he puts behind bars.

Name: Jalam
Description: Jalam is about a widowed mother struggling to raise her child in the city alone. After losing her husband in an accident, the widow must face many challenges with her child in the city, for a piece of land to live.

Name: 2 Penkuttikal
Description: 2 Penkuttikal or 2 girls discuss about the problems faced by women in our society in a bizarre way through the viewpoint of two small girls. This movie portraits the issues of the women all over the world through the thoughts of two 6th grade students named Achu and Anagha. They have already passed through a lot of restrictions that are only meant for girls.

Name: Monsoon Mangoes
Description: D.P Pallickal, an amateur film maker who claims he is the next film legend. D.P has great passion, but lacks talent. His family and friends constantly make fun of his amateurishness of his masterpiece short films.

Name: Paavada
Description: Joy a young man who leads a carefree life. Joy acquaintance Babu Joseph, an English professor, and they reminiscence some seemingly forgotten memories.

Name: Maalgudi Days
Description: The movie is set in the backdrop of an imaginary school named Malgudi Residential School. The movie revolves around a mysterious man Zephan Solomon and two students of this school.

Name: Style
Description: Tom, a young mechanic, gets into a fight with Edgar, a rich businessman, after he slaps Tom's girlfriend over a minor accident. Defeated in the fight, Edgar vows to ruin his life.

Name: The Indian Priest
Description: What can a Catholic missionary priest from India achieve in a modern, secular country?

Name: Adi Kapyare Kootamani
Description: The story revolves around a bunch of college students when a young woman gets stuck inside the boys hostel with no way out.

Name: Two Countries
Description: Ullas will do anything to make money and never hesitates to cheat people. His life takes a turn when he decides to marry an Indian woman who is settled in Canada.

Name: Charlie
Description: A young, nonconforming woman named Tessa gets entangled in a cat-and-mouse chase in the by-lanes of Kerala, hunting for a mysterious artist who previously lived in her apartment.

Name: Jo and the Boy
Description: An aspiring animation creator's dreams start coming true when she is met with a charismatic young boy.

Name: Waiting
Description: While visiting his comatose wife in the hospital, a serene old professor befriends a vibrant young woman whose husband has also fallen into a coma.

Name: Su Su Sudhi Vathmeekam
Description: The movie narrates the story of Sudhi, who has a stuttering problem, from the ages of 4 to 40.

Name: Rajamma @ Yahoo
Description: 2 brothers, Michael Rajamma aka Rajamma and Vishnu Yohannan aka Yahoo are born to an inter caste couple. After sudden demise of their parents they live in a bungalow and later the duo plans to rent out their bungalow to different families.

Name: Anarkali
Description: The story of a Naval officer who falls in love with the gorgeous daughter of a harsh and disapproving Vice Admiral.

Name: Ben
Description: The story of a boy named Ben who enjoys his simple countryside life and is forced to move to a highly ranked school where he doesn't fit in. The rest of the movie shows how Ben is driven mentally insane by his selfish mother.

Name: Salt Mango Tree
Description: The struggles of a middle-class couple to admit their 4-year old kid into a reputed school, which involves huge monetary donations, parent interviews, and other activities.

Name: Ozhivudivasathe Kali
Description: Inner demons begins to unravel when 5 friends get together for a booze party in a remote location.

Name: Rani Padmini
Description: The story revolves around two women Rani and Padmini who are on a journey from Kochi to Himachal Pradesh with different purposes.

Name: Kanal
Description: The film revolves around two families hailing from the South Indian state of Kerala who have spent some important years of their lives in the Middle East.

Name: Amar Akbar Anthony
Description: Amar, Akbar, and Anthony are close friends enjoying a carefree life in Kochi. Their perceptions and beliefs are shattered by an unexpected event; the resulting story forms the plot of the movie.

Name: Lord Livingstone 7000 Kandi
Description: Film features the story of a group of people and their adventures to protect a village which is under exploitation by trade groups

Name: Chaayam Poosiya Veedu
Description: Gautam, a lonely old writer, comes face to face with the seductive Vishaya and the mysterious young man Rahul. A series of events are unleashed which make the old writer question every belief he has held about himself.

Name: Pathemari
Description: Narrates both the hardships and happiness that Gulf life has provided to Malayalees. The period from 1960 to the present form the context of the story.

Name: Kohinoor
Description: The story develops during the 1987-88 period. It was a time when Mohanlal's 'Rajavinte Makan' and Mammootty's 'Athirathram' were such a rage among youth. Louis wishes to be like Vincent Gomas and Tharadas, the heroes in these movies.

Name: Ennu Ninte Moideen
Description: Based on the real-life love story of Moideen and Kanchanamala, which happened in the 1960s in the backdrop of Calicut.

Name: Urumbukal Urangarilla
Description: Kelu and Benny, who are thieves, meet accidentally in their walks of life. They face many challenges as they go around to steal.

Name: Life of Josutty
Description: The life of a simple village boy, his first broken childhood relationship and his ridiculous adventures in New Zealand after getting marriage.

Name: Kunjiramayanam
Description: Kunjiraman (Vineeth) lives in a remote, old world village in Kerala named Desam, surrounded by greenery, myths and legends.

Name: Double Barrel
Description: Two thugs accidentally set off a gang war over a pair of diamonds.

Name: Utopiayile Rajavu
Description: Swathanthran is an innocent, honest young man from the village of Kokrangara. This film depicts the current social and political scenarios of Kerala in a humorous way.

Name: Jamna Pyari
Description: Vasoottan an auto driver by profession, who is very good at heart and meanwhile he is an impetuous person. Once a MBA student happens to travel his auto with some hidden purposes.

Name: Loham
Description: A gold-smuggling deal goes awry, and an array of characters becomes involved.

Name: Ayal Njanalla
Description: This film revolves around a businessman named Prakashan, whose family moved to Gujarat 15 years ago.

Name: Jilebi
Description: 'Jilebi' is the story of a confrontation between villager Sreekuttan and his city-bred nephews. Sreekuttan has happily confined his life to his farm and his pet crops. There is a family crisis far away in Dubai, and he is forced to take responsibility for his two Dubai-bred nephews. The kids hate leaving Dubai and are determined to make life miserable for Sreekuttan so that he will send them back to Dubai. The confrontation begins and leads to surprises--some sour, some sweet..

Name: Love 24x7
Description: A love story set in the backdrop of media.

Name: Acha Dhin
Description: Set in the backdrop of God's own country, Kerala, Acha Din is the story of a family from Jharkhand who is now settled in Ernakulam, the buzzing business hub of Kerala.

Name: KL 10 Patthu
Description: The story of 'KL 10 Pathu' basically revolves around too many incidents like a Panchayath Election, a local football tournament final, and an eloping of the hero and heroine. What makes things all the more complicated is the repercussion of the eloping which eventually affects the results of the football tournament and the election result. Because the hero is the son of the candidate in the panchayath election and a player of the football team which plays in the final.

Name: Madhura Naranga
Description: Jeevan (Kunchacko Boban) and Salim (Biju Menon) are taxi drivers in Gulf.They live in a small apartment which they share with Kumar (Neeraj Madhav). A Sri Lanka Native Thamara Enters their life and they are forced to accommodate her in their apartment . The events happened in their life is the plot of Madhura Naranga. The Major locations of the film is UAE and Sri Lanka.

Name: 32aam Adhyayam 23aam Vaakyam
Description: A book gifted to a couple engraves "23" in the husband's (Freddy) mind and he starts seeing it everywhere. When he discovers a striking similarity of the story with people in his life, he starts investigating.

Name: Thinkal Muthal Velli Vare
Description: Jayadevan is a most-wanted writer in the Malayalam Television industry, who pens the scripts for all major soap operas. Marriage brings a lot of changes to Jayadevan's life, and this forms the crux of the story.

Name: Nirnnayakam
Description: Nirnayakam is a strong family drama dealing with a major social issue, shot at the National Defense Academy Pune, Mysore and Cochin. It is the story of a young man and the bond he shares with his parents.

Name: Lukka Chuppi
Description: The film exhibits a get together of a group of friends after a long interval of 14 years. They discusses their naughty works, silly love stories, etc that happened during their college life with their life partners.

Name: Ivide
Description: Ivide is a crime-drama starring Prithviraj Sukumaran who plays an investigation officer named Varun Blake. Nivin Pauly who is Krish Hebbar, a CIO of a leading Techie company. A string of incidents in Atlanta, sets the pace of the film as the life of Varun and Krish gets entangled in the midst of it.

Name: Premam
Description: A young man has three opportunities to find love. Will the third time be the charm?

Name: Kumbasaaram
Description: Alby is an autorickshaw driver andis wife is Meera (Honey Rose). They pin all their hopes on their only son Jerry whose close friends are Rasool, Tinu, and Malu. The movie narrates the deep friendship shared between these friends and the unexpected events in the life of Alby.

Name: Nee-Na
Description: A married couple finds tension in their relation and life due to the intervention of an alcoholic and impulsive young woman.

Name: Sir C
Description: Sir CP is a story about a fraud college owner who specializes in providing any degree, which is available in any university across the world, to his students. His work lands him in deep trouble and how he comes out of it forms the plot.

Name: Lailaa O Lailaa
Description: Jayamohan is a business magnate who leads a hectic life. Things start going topsy-turvy when he gets married to Anjali. He begins facing problems that affect his business as well.

Name: Oru Second Class Yathra
Description: Two Police Constables with a prisoner in search of an escaped prisoner while conveying from Kannur to Trivandrum.

Name: Samrajyam II: Son of Alexander
Description: The film is a sequel to evergreen Mammooty's gangster film Samrajyam that came out in 1990. The film plots the eventful life of Jordan who is forced to take charge of his father's empire after 23 years.

Name: Chandrettan Evideya
Description: Chandramohan keeps receiving calls from his wife asking for his whereabouts, much to his annoyance.

Name: Chirakodinja Kinavukal
Description: After 18 years, Ambujakshan decides to make hear his 'Thayyalkaran-Sumathi' love story to a director and producer after amending and modifying it, in order to make it a 'New Generation Film'.

Name: She Taxi
Description: A movie which portrays the role of women in fields men dominate, the movie emphasizes on woman as taxi drivers.

Name: Bhaskar the Rascal
Description: Aadhi and Shivani are children of single-parents who want to enjoy the happiness of a complete family. In order to achieve this, they try to unite their parents but end up in trouble.

Name: Ivan Maryadaraman
Description: The lead character Raman, enacted by Dileep, is an employee in a rice mill in Pune. He used to carry goods from the mill to other places on a bicycle. Later he decides to buy an auto rickshaw and goes to his village to get money that his parents has invested in his name before their death. But once he reaches his village, he is shocked to find a gang of people waiting there to kill him. The rest of the events form the crux of the plot.

Name: Oru Vadakkan Selfie
Description: When his father asks him to manage their grocery store, Umesh leaves for Chennai to become a filmmaker. His life changes, after he takes a selfie with his neighbor and posts it online.

Name: Ennum Eppozhum
Description: An irresponsible journalist tries different way to interview a fiery lawyer who stood up for a social cause.

Name: 100 Days of Love
Description: A man, who just got dumped, falls in love with another girl who he bullied in his childhood.

Name: You Too Brutus
Description: Arun, Tovino and Vicky are bachelors who lead a carefree life. However, their lives are turned upside down when they fall in love with three young women.

Name: Haram
Description: Balu realize that the helping hand that he offers to Isha, a colleague in distress, ended up in marriage. The initial euphoria over, as the couple settles down to a comfortable life, disagreements start crawling in.

Name: Fireman
Description: The leakage of a massive LPG tank causes a group of brave firemen, police and local people to put their life on the line when a total city evacuation is impossible because a prison lies in the radius.

Name: Aadu
Description: Triumph in a local Tug-of-war tourney gifted Shaji Pappan and his gang, a cute but naughty little goat 'Pinky'. Their attempts to dump the goat, unknowingly, interrupts few groups of smugglers, who are in race for the 'Neelakodiveli'.

Name: Picket 43
Description: The film deals with the story of an Indian army officer guarding a picket alone in Kashmir, and his friendship with a Pakistani soldier.

Name: Mili
Description: The story of Mili, an introvert girl who grows up to be a self made woman.

Name: Rasam
Description: Menon decides to have a grand traditional Kerala sadya for his daughter's marriage. During the days of marriage arrangements, some unexpected events happened and the rest is plotted in the movie.

Name: Mariyam Mukku
Description: Felix lost his parents at a young age. Salomi, daughter of a white man from Portugese arrives with her father at Mariyam Mukku falls in love with Felix.

Name: Ormayundo Ee Mukham
Description: A young businessman falls for a girl with short-term memory loss.

Name: Aamayum Muyalum
Description: The people living in a poverty-stricken village become suspicious of one another after a man is found dead in the village.

Name: Cousins
Description: Sam is stuck somewhere in the past, courtesy a mishap that occurred six years back, that had almost cost him his life. The psychiatrist suggests that he goes on a trip to Manipal where he was when the tragedy took place, so that his recent memories might be recovered. Off he goes on the journey with his cousins Georgy, Pauly and Tony hoping to find out what had actually transpired during his life at Manipal.

Name: Seconds
Description: Four strangers gets involved in a murder which took place inside an elevator.

Name: Ottaal
Description: Ottaal (The Trap) is an adaptation of one of Anton Chekhov's timeless works, Vanka. A story of the 18th century, but one that has travelled the time and space to be retold in the present day at a small village in the South of India. Kuttappayi, a young boy, is miserable and desperate as he starts writing a letter to his grandfather from a place, dim and dark. Kuttappayi's recollections takes us to the picturesque locations of Kuttanad, where Kuttappayi and his grandpa, Valiyappachayi, are arriving with their ducks. The village is as pleasant as it can be even though what brings him there is the death of his dearest parents. With hope and freedom, he is about to start his life afresh among the village's letterless postman, the nameless dog, the rich lad, Tinku and many more.

Name: Angels
Description: Hameem Haider (Indrajith) is a police officer who meets with an accident while investigating a series of murders and is forced to take a break from his duties. Years later the unsolved murders are picked up by a reality TV show.

Name: Mylanchi Monjulla Veedu
Description: Kasim's daughter Vahida elopes with her boyfriend Madhavan on the day of her wedding. Years later, Madhavan, in the disguise of a Muslim man, goes to treat the paralysed Kasim.

Name: Ithihasa
Description: A male small-time crook and a female IT professional find themselves trapped in each other's body due to the magic of an ancient ring. Confusion and chaos ensue.

Name: Lal Bahadur & Shastri
Description: Lal (Jayasurya) is a young man who is in search for a job, Bahadhur (Nedumudi Venu) who have an obsession towards liquor and women, and Shasthri(Aju Varghese) is a young farmer who struggles to get some document approved from a Government sector. The three men, who are total strangers travels to Ernakulam in a KSRTC bus. Bahadhur buys a lottery ticket from a boy and the boy gives another ticket to Lal as he doesn't have change. The trio part ways after reaching Ernakulam; but later come to know that the lottery ticket which Lal got has won one crore rupees. Then Lal, Bahadhur and Shasthri join hands and goes in search of the missing ticket. This forms the crux of the story.

Name: Iyobinte Pusthakam
Description: Set in the pre-independent India, Aloshi returns from the war to his estranged family and childhood love, only to find his elder brothers taking the side of a ruthless business man to overthrow their father.

Name: Varsham
Description: Venu (Mammootty) leads a happy and contented middle class life with his family. He starts a small scale finance firm, as a service and soon his business flourishes well. This does not go well with his competitors and they join together against him.

Name: Names Unknown
Description: Film tells the story of marginalized people in Kerala through the life of a father who working as a temporary cleaner and his Eight year old son.

Name: Tamaar Padaar
Description: Tubelight Mani and Jumper Thambi, two harmless, self-employed circus performers, gets misunderstood as two terrorists by ACP Pouran. He later understands the truth and now wants them released at all costs.

Name: Homely Meals
Description: There are lot of people who are waiting for a chance in Television and film industry. Homely Meals is the story of one such character Alan. The movie is all about the life, dreams and passion of current generation.

Name: Money Ratnam
Description: Neil comes across an unexpected incident, while returning after the New Year party. He tries to escape from the scene by getting into a bus where he gets a bag containing money left by someone else.

Name: Vellimoonga
Description: A happy-go-lucky politician is smitten by a girl half his age and tries his luck winning her hand.

Name: Njan
Description: The movie is based on the acclaimed novel K T N Kottur Ezhuthum Jeevithavum by T. P. Rajeevan, which is set in the backdrop of India's freedom struggle and depicts a magical history of a Kerala village.

Name: Sapthamashree Thaskaraha
Description: Seven men, after getting acquainted in prison and finding out that all of their lives have been affected by the same con man, decide to raid the fraudster's life savings.

Name: Rajadhi Raja
Description: Shekaran,a humble and pretty man has a dark past in Bombay.His dark underworld side slowly resurfaces when his enimies from past attacks his family

Name: Bhaiyya Bhaiyya
Description: A Malayalam Comedy about togetherness and brotherhood, portraying the importance to a group of people whom we refer to as 'Bengali Babus' in our social life. Babumon (Kunchacko Boban) and Bengali Babu (Biju Menon) have a peculiar relation which dates back to the day the elder one among the two, came to Kerala. The film revolves around a journey to Bengal carrying the mortal remains of a laborer.

Name: Villali Veeran
Description: Siddharthan is a noble-hearted merchant who is burdened with lot of responsibilities in his life. His pursuit for money lands him in trouble and the film traces as to how he deals with his adversaries.

Name: Peruchazhi
Description: The film is about how Jagannathan a young politician from India ends up being the chief political adviser to the California state Governor's election campaign and his use of tactics standard of Indian politics to win the election.

Name: Munnariyippu
Description: Anjali, a freelance journalist meets C.K. Raghavan, an interesting inmate who's outstaying his sentence in jail for a crime he says he didn't commit. His vastly different views peak her interest and she documents his life and happenings.

Name: Njan Steve Lopez
Description: A college student witnesses a gang attack and as his curiosity behind the encounter tries to get the better of him, he realizes that his dad and the police are involved.

Name: Apothecary
Description: A doctor is haunted by his conscience, when puppeteer-ed by his superiors.

Name: Avatharam
Description: When Madhavan gets to know that Moorthy, a criminal, is responsible for his brother's death, he kills him without leaving any trace of the crime.

Name: Manglish
Description: A fish auctioner's life changes after meeting a mysterious Jewish girl and his struggle to communicate with her in English.

Name: Hi I'm Tony
Description: "Hi, I am Tony" is a horror thriller based on happenings in a day in Bangalore. Sameer (Asif Ali) and Tina (Mia) elopes to Bangalore after their days of love. They live in a flat owned by Achayan (Biju Menon). Tony (Lal) comes to their flat after he had an encounter withthem. Later he befriends them and gets in their flat where he start torturing Sameer and Tina. He ask them questions based on his Life. Tony killed his wife and put her in a bag. It is finally revealed that Tony Comes to Sameer In search of his wife's extra marital affair whom she affectionately calls Sam. As Sam is the short name for Sameer, he gets in a fight with Sameer and later he is killed by Sameer. Achayan Comes to their flat and sees the flat destroyed and Tony killed. Achayan goes out and buries the body. It is shown later that the body which is buried isn't Tony's Body but is Achayan's. A flashback shows that when Achayan tries to bury Tony's body, he gets up and attacks Achayan. Now Tony is going for taking revenge with Sameer when a Truck hits Tony and he is killed. Later, we see Achayan's house where his wife is in front of a wedding Anniversary cake of them. Their children asks her when will Dad come and she says he will come soon. The frame moves from their room and goes out of their house and finally to the name board of their house which says " Samson James"

Name: Vikramadithyan
Description: Adithyan, the son of a dishonored thief who committed suicide, must fight all the odds and compete with Vikraman for the post of a police officer.

Name: Angry Babies in Love
Description: Jeevan Paul is a freelance photographer by profession, and scoops away his lady love Sarah Thomas, from the church as another man gets all set to tie the knot with her. Jeevan and Sarah flee to Mumbai wherein they get busy designing a love nest of their own.

Name: Koothara
Description: Three engineering students whose life takes a twist after meeting a mysterious man who teaches them the real meaning of life.

Name: Bangalore Days
Description: A fun roller coaster ride about three young people, Aju, Divya and Kuttan who are cousins, reach Bangalore to dream, discover and explore.

Name: How Old Are You?
Description: A lady rediscovers her lost charisma for the good of the society overcoming strong odds from a patriarchal society.

Name: Mr
Description: A prominent person from Delhi reach a palace,which is well known for its tradition and royalty to solve an issue. Consequently, instead of a solution, the issue becomes more and more complicated.

Name: God's Own Country
Description: Several story lines intertwine, linked by cold hard cash and the quest for justice.

Name: Ulsaha Committee
Description: Apoorvan, a school dropout, aspires to become a renowned scientist and tries various experiments. While his friends Babumon and Chopra help him, the three often land in trouble due to their behavior.

Name: Law Point
Description: Sathya is a leading criminal advocate. After successfully winning a rape case against the victim Sainnabam he is now consulted to handle a compromising situation regarding the suicide attempt of Maya. Dealing with her and her father. Sathya comes to the conclusion that Maya is very intelligent and bold and it's not easy to convince her or her father. He keeps calm and asks her father to take her on a long drive.

Name: 1 by Two
Description: Hari and Ravi are identical twins who share a very delicate and special emotional bond. When Hari dies in an accident, Ravi goes into a strange state of psychosis. Yousuf, a cop tries to uncover the mystery involved in the case.

Name: Ring Master
Description: Follows the relation between a canine film star and its trainer.

Name: 7th Day
Description: A suspended crime branch officer gets involved in the investigation of a twisted case after he suspects a group of 5 friends of weird behavior.

Name: Gangster
Description: Akbar, a powerful man of Mangalore underworld, shares his business lead with Mani Menon and Uncle Sam. They share a good relationship until Anto, grandson of Uncle Sam, creates havoc.

Name: Polytechnic
Description: A Communist party member tries to start a new factory after the death of his father in the army

Name: Praise the Lord
Description: An immensely rich farmer lives a peacefully with his family in Pala and has no idea about the hectic metro life. He gets introduced to it when he hides a love-stricken couple in his house.

Name: Happy Journey
Description: A blind cricketer pursues his dream and tries to make an Indian blind cricket team a reality.

Name: Pakida
Description: Aadi meets a mysterious and concealing traveler George Koshy Anthrapper and travels with him from Kochi to Madurai. On their way, they come across Sunny and Kani who change their lives.

Name: Salaam Kashmier
Description: Sreekumar does all the domestic work in his family while his banker wife Suja is the breadwinner. All appears to be smooth until Tommy enters their life bringing back something which Sreekumar wants to run away from.

Name: Ohm Shanthi Oshaana
Description: A spirited young girl would stop at nothing to get the first love of her life, even if it takes seven years and several heartbreaks.

Name: Balyakalasakhi
Description: Majeed, who is from a rich family, loves his neighbour Suhara, and decides to help her financially. But when his father turns down his request to sponsor her studies, he leaves home.

Name: London Bridge
Description: A millionaire in London fall in love with two girls at the same time and finding the lifepartner
The story of Rameshan who has a huge craze for Cricket, and his final attempt to realize his cricket dream through his son.

Name: Mosayile Kuthira Meenukal
Description: An unusual friendship between two escaped convicts is formed during a cat and mouse chase, which leads them to the beautiful islands of Lakshadweep.

Name: Mannar Mathai Speaking 2
Description: Mannar Mathai has started a travel agency but he retains his love for theater. He wants to return to the world of thespians, but is he successful in doing so?

Name: Salala Mobiles
Description: After his uncle helps Afsal to start a mobile shop, he gets happy and hopeful about future. However, things get complicated to him after he meets, Azhagarsamy, a creator of mobile applications.

Name: Oru Indian Pranayakatha
Description: Aymanam Sidharthan is a local politician who hopes to become big some time in his life, but faces some setbacks in his political career. He meets Irene, a Canadian citizen with roots in Kerala.

Name: Ezhu Sundara Rathrikal
Description: Ezhu Sundara Rathrikal is the story of Eby , an ad-film maker. He decided to tie the knot, Suddenly some problem occur on Eby before seven days of his marriage. So he has to solve the problem before his marriage.

Name: Drishyam
Description: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

Name: Vedivazhipadu
Description: Three friends decide to hire a prostitute on the day of the Aatukaal Pongala (a Hindu festival in Trivandrum) when their wives are busy.

Name: Silence
Description: Arvind Chandrasekhar is a very successful lawyer with a good track record, is appointed judge in the Karnataka High Court. He starts getting anonymous calls and is threatened by anonymous people too. As the film progresses, with the help of his close friend Neil George, an IPS officer, an old murder case is reopened and Arvind's past now becomes crucial and new revelations tumble out.

Name: Red Rain
Description: Mysterious deaths of cattle and strange lights in the sky get a young scientist curious.

Name: Bicycle Thieves
Description: Kunchako (Asif Ali) lost his parents at an early age and has been living with relatives who dislike him. Fed up with life there, Kunchako leaves their home after stealing their bicycle.

Name: Punyalan Agarbattis
Description: The story of a Thrissur based man named Joy Thakkolkaran. He aspire to become an established businessman. On his research, he finds the business possibilities of agarbattis. He also found that elephant dung can be effectively used as a raw material for making agarbattis. Likewise, he decided to start his business on making agarbattis from the dung. For that he made a contract with the Devaswom Board for getting the dung. Everything was going perfect with Joy until a new Chairman joined the Devaswom who suspended his contract with them. Things get worse for Joy without the dung and desperate Joy runs hither and thither in search of the required raw material.

Name: Vishudhan
Description: A priest and nun face the consequences of their action against a corrupt business man.

Name: Nadodi Mannan
Description: Padmanabhan is a youth who earns by participating in any protest by any political party. After a work in Trivandrum, he became a popular figure there and became the Mayor of Trivandrum.

Name: Thira
Description: Rohini Pranab, a cardiac surgeon and a social worker, sets out to find the girls kidnapped from her NGO. She is joined by Naveen, who is looking for his kidnapped sister. The duo goes deeper into the human trafficking mafia in Karnataka.

Name: Geethanjali
Description: A Famous Psychologist Dr.Sunny is trying to solve mysterious supernatural problem arises in traditional family.

Name: Idukki Gold
Description: A guy comes in search of his 4 best friends after 35 years to relive old memories

Name: Pattam Pole
Description: A trad guy and a rad gal must make it work.

Name: Sringaravelan
Description: Kannan falls in love with Radhu, the daughter of a ruthless city gangster who is responsible for many deaths. In order to marry her, Kannan must face danger and overcome many challenges.

Name: Zachariayude Garbhinikal
Description: The film narrates the incidents in the life of a gynaecologist and five women who come into his life each with unconventional/illegitimate pregnancies. Lal acts as the gynaecologist and Asha Sharreth does the role of doctor's wife. Sanusha plays the role of an eighteen-year-old girl who refuses to abort her child and reveal the child's father. In the end, she gives her baby to the gynaecologist and his wife who don't have children of their own. After some months, she visits the doctor's house and leaves him a book. And from reading one of the story in the book that she specially marked he figures out that she bore the child of her father. Rima's character is a nurse, while Geetha plays an elderly woman who gets pregnant through artificial insemination.[7] Aju Varghese appears as Ajmal who has strong feelings for Fatima. However, due to their height difference, he is unable to confide his love for her.

Name: North 24 Kaatham
Description: Harikrishan, a software engineer who suffers from obsessive-compulsive personality disorder is asked to go on an assignment to Trivandrum, as his colleagues are not able to stand his behavior.

Name: D Company
Description: Different shades and motives of violence are manifested through completely dissimilar characters.

Name: Daivathinte Swantham Cleetus
Description: A skit on Jesus Christ brings out a change in good-hearted rowdy Cleetus along with revealing few surprises of his nature and his relationship with a neighborhood tailor.

Name: Artist
Description: Gayatri meets Michael and starts living with him in spite of his arrogance. She avoids all the negatives and tries to deal with him but things change when Michael loses his eyesight in an accident.

Name: Arikil Oraal
Description: A creative executive at an advertising agency and his girlfriend try to solve the mystery of their friend Icha who seemingly starts to appear at two different places at the same time.

Name: Kunjananthante Kada
Description: The movie focuses on the marital relationship of a grocery store owner.

Name: Memories
Description: Sam Alex, a drunkard ex-cop, is forced to investigate a series of murders which are committed in the same pattern. His search leads to a serial killer, and something more than what he expected.

Name: Pullipulikalum Aattinkuttiyum
Description: The film tackles social issues in Kuttanad through the tale of a hapless youth.

Name: Neelakasham Pachakadal Chuvanna Bhoomi
Description: Kasi and Suni go for the ride from Kerala to Nagaland in search of Kasi's girlfriend. En route, they encounter different people who change their lives forever.

Name: Kadal Kadannu Oru Maathukutty
Description: Mathukutty, an unemployed man, lives in Germany with his bossy wife. He is given a chance to travel to Kerala to invite famous actors for an event, but all hell breaks loose after his arrival.

Name: 101 Chodhyangal?
Description: Story of a 12 year old boy given a task of framing 101 questions by his teacher, without worrying about the answers. The story moves around his life and the questions that are intertwined together. He successfully completes the task but wants the answer for only the 101st question.

Name: 5 Sundarikal
Description: A film comprising of 5 short stories by 5 directors. Each story is about a women.

Name: Bharya Athra Pora
Description: Satyanathan is a school teacher and his wife Priya is a bank employee, lead a happy life together until he becomes an alcoholic and ends up completely avoiding his family.

Name: Honey Bee
Description: The story of how two very close friends realize their love for each other, how they elope on her wedding day and the many struggles they face when they fight for survival.

Name: ABCD: American-Born Confused Desi
Description: The journey of two young American Malayalees to their Motherland.

Name: Left Right Left
Description: In this interlinked story, three men (an evil politician, an eccentric cop and a former revolutionist) develop different perspectives on life due to a childhood encounter with death.

Name: Neram
Description: Can a young man escape from the clutches of a loan shark on time?

Name: Mumbai Police
Description: ACP Antony is the only one who knows the truth behind ACP Aaryan's murder. Antony meets with an accident, losing his memory and is unable to reveal the killer. He is forced to investigate the murder again hoping that he remembers something.

Name: Hotel California
Description: A mix of incidents such as a kidnapping,identity theft,counterfeit DVD exchange ,pimping out a TV actress etc happens at the time of the release of a much awaited movie.

Name: Ladies and Gentleman
Description: Chandrabose becomes an alcoholic after his wife's death. His life, however, takes an interesting turn after he dissuades a young IT professional from committing suicide.

Name: Immanuel
Description: Immanuel's life takes an odd turn when the publishing firm that he works for shuts down. He gets a job in an insurance company but faces severe hardships, which end up changing him as a person.

Name: Sound Thoma
Description: Thomas is a smart and eligible bachelor. But anyone who hears him speak will dislike him. Because of his disability in speech, he suffers much from his villagers and even near and dear ones.

Name: Amen
Description: Amen tells the story of people around an ancient Nasrani Church. The plot is set in a village, Kumarankary, where its inhabitants are always garbed in white - a motif which the film deftly employs to meld the elements of fantasy and spirituality. A young, handsome cleric (Indrajith Sukumaran) arrives as the Kathanar (Syrian priest) of the church, whose senior Kathanar is Fr. Abraham (Joy Mathew), a grumpy fellow. The village has a mix of issues, which range from the love between Solomon (Fahadh Faasil) and Sosanna (Swati Reddy) to the fate of a band crushed by frequent failures in contests. The movie sets itself a lot of targets like the fate of Solomon's love, his dazzling self-discovery of a trait not known to him before and some sober spiritual and religious conflicts. Amen promises a luxuriant plot replete with music, faith, fantasy and romance and an amazingly varied set of characters. As the parish seriously discusses whether to retain the church's band that had lost to the rival group in the earlier band competition, a young priest Fr. Vincent Vattoli (Indrajit) takes charge under Fr.Ottaplackan. He is stylish, dares to defy conventions and is in support of the romance between Solomon and Sosanna. His actions irk the senior priest and things take a serious turn after a while. The people agrees to a pact that sets the fate of Solomon's love with Sosanna, and the Kumarankary church band's future. The band goes on to win the competition, and the film ends on a truly surprising climax.

Name: Red Wine
Description: Ratheesh Vasudevan, Assistant Commissioner of Police, is investigating the murder of Anoop, a part time actor in local plays. Investigation reveals other faces of Anoop, who is a leftist activist and an engineer by qualification.

Name: 3 Dots
Description: Three ex-convicts live together and try to start their lives afresh, but in vain. They reach out to their prison counselor; as per his advice they start their own work with his support until his true intentions are revealed.

Name: Papilio Buddha
Description: A band of displaced untouchables in Western Ghats of India embrace Buddhism in order to escape from caste oppression.

Name: Lucky Star
Description: An ambitious couples got in to trouble when a surrogate plan went wrong but luck comes when the baby comes to their life.

Name: Kili Poyi
Description: Chacko and Hari, tired of their advertising jobs, take a trip to Goa. They return with a mysterious bag which change the life of both .

Name: 10:30 A.M
Description: When a happily married Alby is confronted by his old love for help, things go wrong and a string of serial murders form the rest of the plot.

Name: Celluloid
Description: The story of J C Daniel, who made the first ever Malayalam film 'Vigathakumaran' in 1928, resulting in his exile and eventual downfall.

Name: Natholi Oru Cheriya Meenalla
Description: Preman faces strange and unexpected events in his flat and decides to write a story about his flatmates. His life changes when the characters in his book develop personalities of their own.

Name: Lokpal
Description: Nandagopal, a chef, becomes the savior of people in distress and fights against corruption. He has an unnerving past that explains his current state of mind.

Name: Kammath & Kammath
Description: Raja Raja Kammath and Deva Raja Kammath are two brothers who owns a chain of restaurants that specializes in making Dosa. The story begins when they come to Palakkad to open a new restaurant.

Name: Romans
Description: Two escaped convicts arrive at a remote village in Kerala near the border with Tamil Nadu. Villages mistake them as Catholic priests sent from Rome to reopen their long closed church.

Name: Annayum Rasoolum
Description: The story of how Rasool, a Muslim falls in love with a Christian girl, Anna and how her family's strong disapproval makes their relationship change for the worse.

Name: Nee Ko Nja Cha
Description: Three friends travel to Goa as one of them broke up with his girlfriend. They meet two girls there, become friends, but soon get into trouble.

Name: Shutter
Description: A family man (Rasheed) is locked with a prostitute in a commercial space by his friend. When the friend gets tangled in an inescapable web, unexpected events unravel over days and nights with them locked inside having no way out.

Name: Karma Yodha
Description: A mumbai based investigating officer set out to find a group of kidnapped teenege girls in a sex racketing and one among is his own daughter

Name: Da Thadiya
Description: The big, fat, cute Luke John falls in love with his childhood crush Ann. Realizing she is not so fond of his fatness, Luke embarks on a 'quest' to loose his weight.

Name: I Love Me
Description: Ram Mohan, an eminent businessman in Bangkok, has discovered that his business empire and personal life are in danger. To save himself, he hires two small-time crooks from India to murder a person.

Name: Chapters
Description: Different people who are in serious crisis see a ray of hope when their lives get interlinked in an unexpected turn of events

Name: Face 2 Face
Description: A suspended cop finds himself entangled in the murder of a youth and is drawn towards the case

Name: Chettayees
Description: Friends John, Kichu, Roopesh, Bava and Babumon decide to have a party on New Year's Eve. However, a series of events leads to a lot of unpleasantness and a rift between John and Kichu.

Name: Poppins
Description: An adaptation of the Sahitya Akademi award-winning play 8 Natakangal by Jayaprakash Kuloor. It is centered on man-woman relationships, exploring different aspects of the institution called marriage.

Name: 101 Weddings
Description: 101 Weddings is a humor based story set against the backdrop of a mass marriage ceremony which are taking place together at one platform as part of a mass marriage ceremony.

Name: Idiots
Description: A rich heiress enlists the help of an assassin to create the illusion that she has been murdered so she can put the blame on her boyfriend who ended the relationship with her.

Name: Bavuttiyude Namathil
Description: Bavootty is a man of limited dreams and has not attained anything in his life.

Name: Theevram
Description: A missing auto-rickshaw driver and unidentifiable mutilated body parts found at different places stir up an investigation revealing the history of the auto-rickshaw driver and his murderer.

Name: My Boss
Description: Manu's boss in an IT firm is Priya, an evil woman, who verbally abuses and criticises her subordinates. However, Manu's life takes a turn when Priya forces him to act as her husband to avoid going back to Australia.

Name: Jawan of Vellimala
Description: According to the demands of the villagers of Vellimala, the government is forced to build a dam there. But as it becomes unsafe, the government decides to destroy it, sparking a violent protest.

Name: Ayalum Njanum Thammil...
Description: A story on how a brilliant and dedicated senior doctor molds an irresponsible amateur doctor into one much like him, and how a forbidden relationship comes in between.

Name: Banking Hours 10 to 4
Description: A busy bank branch is under observation by a group of police officers during the banking hours under information of a possible bank robbery. However, they are in for a surprise.

Name: Puthiya Theerangal
Description: The story is about an orphan girl, Thamara, who lives on the shores of a sea with her 3 best friends who are boys. One day, they chance upon a man drowning in the sea, (suicide attempt) and they set out on a journey to find out who he really is... This movie is of a different type - it portrays the simple life of fishermen family and is pretty funny and enjoyable watch.

Name: Trivandrum Lodge
Description: A small residential lodge at Kochi becomes the witness for many stories, of many people, their search for love, money, sex, and true meaning of life.

Name: Husbands in Goa
Description: Husbands in Goa is a story of three friends - Jerry Thomas (Advocate), Murali Govind (Chartered Accountant) and Arjun (Interior Designer). The three of them are faced with a common dilemma, as they are all harassed by certain behavioral traits of their wives. To get away from them, the three friends plan a pleasure trip to Goa. On their journey to Goa they meet Sunny who they befriend but fail to realize the trouble that he attracts due to his usual drunkenness. Theirshort holiday turns into a crazy ride as they keep trying to get themselves out of comedic situations.

Name: Molly Aunty Rocks
Description: Molly is a strong-willed woman who has experienced a world outside India. Pranav, a highly-egoistic IRS officer, brings up a major issue with Molly that could destroy her life. Who will come out on top when these two clash?

Name: Ozhimuri
Description: A 55-year old woman files a divorce petition against her 71-year old husband, after over 30 years of married life. Their son, and a female advocate searches for the reason and circumstances, changing their perception about some people.

Name: Mr
Description: Ashok Raj, though a lawyer by profession has indeed dedicated his life to revive the lost glory that the drama troupe Bharatha Kalakshetram has once enjoyed.

Name: Run Baby Run
Description: A reporter and a cameraman become try to uncover a political scam, but find themselves in trouble as they become involved in a grand political conspiracy.

Name: Thappana
Description: A local petty thief is out from jail. On his journey back, he meets a girl who is also a convict coming out of jail. He decides to help her on his way back.

Name: Friday
Description: The messed up life stories of 5 different groups of people on Friday 11 November 2011 within the same town.

Name: Cinema Company
Description: Cinema Company is a 2012 Malayalam romantic comedy drama film written and directed by Mamas, and starring mainly newcomers. Basil, Sanjeev, Shruthi Hariharan and Badri play the roles of four close friends who dream of making a film.

Name: Akam
Description: sreenivasan is an engineer. he meets with an accident and his friend leaves him. he married new women and suspects her for her loving him even after his disfigurement.

Name: Thattathin Marayathu
Description: The struggles faced when a Hindu man falls in love with a Muslim woman and the disapproval of her family.

Name: Ustad Hotel
Description: Faisi wants to go to UK to become a professional chef but circumstances force him to assist his grandfather in a small restaurant in Kozhikode city, changing his outlook on life forever.

Name: Bachelor Party
Description: Five gangsters who are childhood friends reunite after many years to do a mission. However things go wrong.

Name: Spirit
Description: Raghunandan is an ex-Bank of England employee who resigned his lucrative job because he was bored with the rather sedentary and mundane nature of his work. he chose journalism as his next career and worked in different cities in India. He now works for a TV news channel as an interviewer in a popular show named "Show the Spirit". In the mean time, he is in the process of writing an English novel too. He is essentially a loner but is a compulsive alcoholic and has an expensive collection of vintage drinks at home. It was his excessive drinking that resulted in his divorce some years back, but he shares a healthy friendship with his ex-wife Meera and her current husband Alexy. The couple have custody of Raghunandan's and Meera's son Aditya a.k.a Sunny, who is deaf and mute. Raghunandan's fatal addiction towards alcohol takes a heavy toll on his personal and professional life. However, good sense dawns, albeit late, when he comes across a man who is worse than him because of his drinking problem.

Name: Hero
Description: A stuntman who falls in love with an actress gains the hatred and jealousy of a superstar.

Name: Thiruvambadi Thamban
Description: Thiruvambadi Thamban (Jayaram) hails from a family that have been supplying elephants for temple processions for years. To add some romance to the story, Jayaram is given company by Haripriya who plays a Brahmin girl in the film. On the way back to Kerala from the Gajamela at Sonepur, Thiruvambadi Mathan Thrakan (Jagathy) happens to confront Shaktivel (Kishore) in Madurai, Tamil Nadu. Shaktivel is a cruel politician and landlord and the character of Jagathy fails to understand that he rules the place and accidentally kills his younger brother. Soon, in a fast tracked series of events, Shaktivel and his men go in search for Mathan and his people to avenge the death of his brother. Thiruvambadi Thamban follows a never ending travail of son trying to save his father from an extremely dangerous enemy.

Name: English: An Autumn in London
Description: English is a Malayalam film written by Ajayan Venugopalan and directed by Shyamaprasad. A drama with slight tinges of black humour and satire. The film tells the story of the lives of the Malayalees living in London.

Name: Arike
Description: Anuradha plays cupid and brings Shantanu and Kalpana together but a freak accident distances Kalpana and him. Shantanu then realizes that Anuradha is the one who truly loves him.

Name: Diamond Necklace
Description: The story of a young doctor who lives a luxurious life based on credit cards, chasing girls and his bad intentions once he goes bankrupt.

Name: Grandmaster
Description: A veteran cop chases a cold blooded serial killer, who murders his victims in alphabetical order.

Name: 22 Female Kottayam
Description: A 22 year old nurse who was betrayed and raped exerts some extreme revenge on her tormentors.

Name: Mayamohini
Description: Balakrishnan is cheated by his girlfriend, in order to make the family happy, he hires a girl, Mayamohini and pretends to be in love. Things take a turn when they realize that Mayamohini is a man.

Name: Cobra: Kottayam Brothers
Description: Even though twins, Raja and Kari wouldn't pass for twins in anyone's eyes. Their quest for suitable brides lands them in the house of a single father with two daughters.

Name: Masters
Description: A young police officer investigating a series of seemingly unrelated murders thinks that there is more than what meets the eye.

Name: The King and the Commissioner
Description: Two detectives investigate the death of an intelligence agent found in a river after she discovered a Pakistani plot for a terrorist attack.

Name: Ordinary
Description: An accident interlinks the life of a driver and conductor of a KSRTC ordinary bus running from Pathanamthitta to Gavi with the lives of people of Gavi.

Name: Thatsamayam Oru Penkutty
Description: Manu, a village girl, is selected as a contestant in a reality show that broadcasts her everyday life for a month. Unaware of the world of reality television, Manu faces many obstacles in her way.

Name: Ee Adutha Kaalath
Description: The movie features the lives of six different persons from different strata of the social life of the city, interconnected due to unexpected events beyond their control.

Name: Nidra
Description: Raju (Siddharath himself), who was in Germany to do some research, was not informed of his mother's demise, and has a nervous breakdown when he gets the news. He takes a couple of years to recover, and after that he marries his childhood sweetheart Ashwathy (Rima Kallingal), the family chauffeur's daughter. But his near and dear ones look at every action of his through the prism of his past illness, which frustrates him. His rather short temper doesn't help. To add to the oddities, he has converted his bedroom into a space research lab and dreams of building an organically self-sustainable world for himself and his wife in the middle of the family's rubber estate. But his elder brother Vishwan (Jishnu), has plans to build a resort catering to foreign clients. All this makes Raju very angry and violent, and people start to think that his illness has resurfaced.

Name: Akashathinte Niram
Description: Color of sky is a movie about the relationship of man, nature and life.

Name: Second Show
Description: Lalu's life changes after gangster Vishnubuddhan makes him a part of his gang. However, when Vishnubuddhan murders his friend, Lalu sets out to seek revenge.

Name: Casanovva
Description: An International businessman and playboy tries to avenge the death of his girlfriend, who was murdered by a gang of robbers, by entrapping them through a reality TV show.

Name: Spanish Masala
Description: Charlie works at an Indian restaurant in Spain. Skilled in imitating voices, he becomes close to his employer's blind daughter by imitating her lost boyfriend's voice and tries to reunite them.

Name: Padmasree Bharat Dr
Description: The movie is a satirical comedy which revolves around Saroj Kumar, a famous actor and his antics.

Name: Asuravithu
Description: Don Bosco and his friends become one of the deadliest gangs in Kochi.

Name: Kunjaliyan
Description: A man pretends to be a winner of dhubai lottary is nothing and is a lie by his friend to save him from his greedy family members.can he survive for long or what if it exploses

Name: Vellaripravinte Changathi
Description: A man tries to release a stalled movie made by his father 35 years ago, and find the actors worked in it.

Name: Venicile Vyapari
Description: Pavithran, a police constable, has been assigned to investigate the murder of union leader Ajayan. He disguises himself as a coir merchant to unravel the case.

Name: The Arab, The Camel, and P
Description: Madhavan finally falls in love and decides to marry his girl. But a late night incident forces Madhavan to take a crazy journey.

Name: Beautiful
Description: An extra-ordinary friendship between a physically paralyzed millionaire and a small time singer.

Name: Swapna Sanchari
Description: Ajayachandran immigrates to the Gulf and he makes his fortune and returns to Kerala for a holiday. Ajayachandran flaunts his wealth to gain social acceptance. Rashmi, Ajayachandrans wife, a grounded young woman who is not too comfortable with her husbands new, flashy lifestyle. However, soon, all of Ajayachandrans calculations about life go wrong. An incident occurs and changes his life forever.

Name: Krishnanum Radhayum
Description: It focuses on the love life of John and Radha who admire each other despite belonging to different religions.

Name: Indian Rupee
Description: An unemployed youth Jayaprakash, dreams big fortunes in the field of real estate business, and therefore, faces a lot of obstacles in the path towards his goal.

Name: Snehaveedu
Description: Ajayan is back home after a long time away and he is hoping to be with his mother for the rest of his life, but things go wrong when a young boy claims to be his son.

Name: Doctor Love
Description: Vinayachandran is busy trying every trick of the trade to make both ends meet. He writes and publishes bland love stories that he sells off for a cheap price. One day, he meets a Professor who mistakes him to be an expert in resolving issues of love. Vinayachandran follows him to college, and in no time he is known on campus as Dr. Love.

Name: Ulakam Chuttum Valiban
Description: As Jayashankar has huge debts, he seeks training under his uncle and becomes a smart thief. However, situations get tricky and hilarity ensues when he lands up becoming a sub-inspector.

Name: Pranayam
Description: Grace meets her ex husband Achutha Menon after a long period of time.

Name: Sevenes
Description: A team of seven young sevens football players gets involved in crime as a means to quick money.

Name: Teja Bhai and Family
Description: A gangster in Malaysia falls head over heels in love with a simple woman. He hides his real identity to impress her but finds himself caught up in hilariously strange situations.

Name: The Way Home
Description: The plot revolves around a doctor with a haunting past. Now working at a Prison Hospital, the Doctor is assigned the case of a woman a surviving member from a notorious terrorist group. .Before dying she entrusts him to find her five-year-old son and unite him with his father who is the head of terrorist group. Finding the boy from a village the Doctor and child set out on a journey to find his father.The journey is happening through the contemporary and mysterious path of the terrorist network in the vast country with many incidents.

Name: Manushya Mrugam
Description: The movie features Baburaj, a lorry driver, with an unmanageable lust. He is nabbed by the police for rape and murder of the two young girls, including his daughter and also for stabbing his own wife to death. The stories are effectively cooked up by the police.

Name: Chaappa Kurish
Description: A lost cellphone connects two men from the two extremes of the society and affects their life beyond which they could have imagined.

Name: Salt n' Pepper
Description: The story of a few foodies, whose fondness of food bonds them together.

Name: Three Kings
Description: Three unemployed men discover the map to an unearthed treasure... And thus begins a funny description of how they reach their destiny

Name: Bombay March 12
Description: Mammootty in Bombay March 12 Bombay March 12, which is Babu Janardhanan's debut directorial venture, has Mammootty in the lead and goes back in time, to the early 1990's. The film zooms in on the Mumbai riots of 1993 and strives to talk about the sufferings of the common people during those turbulent times.

Name: Abu, Son of Adam
Description: A poor aging couple struggle to fulfill their lifelong dream of going to Mecca for pilgrimage.

Name: Janapriyan
Description: Priyadarshan is from a small village who lands at Kochi to join the temporary job in the Taluk Office, in the place of Vaishakhan, who is forced to go for a long leave. Vaishakhan doesn't care about completing pending works in the office, as he believes that his future is as a successful filmmaker.

Name: Manikyakallu
Description: A young teacher who arrives at a village school, who tries to make a definite change in student attitude.

Name: The Train
Description: The lives and dreams of a few Keralaites in Mumbai who disappeared in the Mumbai train bombings of 11 July 2006. To add masala to the situation, the whole incident could have been stopped if the superiors had listened to Mamootty, a super cop who is a keen observer.

Name: Seniors
Description: Four 'not-so-young' friends re-join college to relive the awesome moments they had 12 years ago. But things are not what they seem.

Name: Rathinirvedam
Description: A man falls for an older woman, but their affair seems doomed.

Name: The Address
Description: A single yet brilliant court martial session of a dalit soldier accused of killing a Captain and attempting to kill another captain

Name: Chinatown
Description: Three best friends got separated at childhood is united by a man to hand over a casino where profit should be shared equally. Problem starts when the MLA candidate who killed their father try to exploit them. They rather set out to hunt him down.

Name: Doubles
Description: Giri and Gowri are twins who set up an accident rescue unit. Their lives change when they rescue a mysterious girl named Saira.

Name: Urumi: The Warriors Who Wanted to Kill Vasco Da Gama
Description: Chirakkal Kelu Nayanar, a warrior in 16th century Kerala wants to avenge his father killed in a confrontation with Vasco da Gama and his troops and is assisted by his best friend Vavvali and warrior princess Ayesha.

Name: August 15
Description: When the Chief Minister of Kerala V. G. Sadanandan, popularly known as VG, is poisoned, the investigation is assigned to ace cop Perumal. He has to apprehend the criminal who is a master of disguises and is known not to leave any witnesses.

Name: City of God
Description: In the city of Cochin, a series of incidents connects the lives of a Tamil laborer couple, an actress, a builder, a criminal, and the wife of a businessman.

Name: Christian Brothers
Description: Christy (Mohan Lal) is framed for killing the kidnapper of the home minister's daughter while trying to save her and now he has to prove his innocence to his father.

Name: Race
Description: The story depicts how some dramatic events in a 24-hour time frame collapses the peaceful ambiance of this little family.

Name: Payyans
Description: The film explores the relationship between a mother and a child. The central character Josy (Jayasurya) is brought up all by his mother Padma (Rohini). Josy's problems start with the return of his father (Lal).

Name: Makeup Man
Description: Balu and Soorya, who get married and then realize that they have to start their dream life. As luck would have it, Soorya becomes an actress, and Balu pretends to be her makeup man.

Name: Khaddama
Description: The story of a woman who moves to Saudi Arabia as a maid.

Name: Arjunan Saakshi
Description: Roy Mathew is mistaken to be Arjunan, the only witness of the scandalous murder of Firoz Mooppan. With people out to kill him, Roy takes the identity of Arjunan in hopes of bringing Firoz to justice.

Name: Traffic
Description: The lives of some different people get intertwined when a girl is in urgent need of a heart transplant with the only heart donor being many miles of traffic away.

Name: Thanthonni
Description: Vadakkanveettil kochu kunju is neglected by his family members due to life style and attitude. All others are in high profile.The family has huge wealth but really kochukunju is not a person as he seems.

Name: In Ghost House Inn
Description: Thomaskutty invites his friends to his newly bought Bungalow to stay there for a while and change the native people's concept of being thought as a Haunted mansion.

Name: Oru Naal Varum
Description: Nandhakumar, an honest police officer, lays a trap to capture Gopi Krishnan, a corrupt town planner. Though his attempts fail, Nandhakumar is not ready to give up.

Name: April Fool
Description: Rakesh and his friends own a club where they call amateur artists to perform and make fun of them. However, when they call Krishnanunni, an income-tax officer, to sing, things take a turn.

Name: Oridathoru Postman
Description: Raghu, a responsible youth, faces the wrath of the villagers as he is the son of a lazy postman. However, Raghu's life takes a turn when he encounters Yasin Mubarak, a notorious man.

Name: Marykkundoru Kunjaadu
Description: Solomon, a simple village man who is afraid of almost everything around him. His life changes when he becomes a good friend with a tough man.

Name: Tournament - Play & Replay
Description: Tournament is a road movie in which the story progresses as the main characters embark on a journey. Viswam, Usman, Balu, Bobby, Chilambu and Subu start from Kochi for a Cricket match selection. Lekshmi, their friend, also joins them. Since they miss the flight from Cochin, they decide to travel by road.

Name: Kandahar
Description: Another mission with Mahadevan and crew, as they deal with international terrorism with a flight being hijacked by hardcore terrorists.

Name: Best Actor
Description: A school teacher's journey to fulfill his long-time dream, to become a movie star.

Name: The Thriller
Description: Simon is the son of Joseph Palathinkal, a business multi millionaire. One night during the night patrol, Niranjan finds Simon stabbed and murdered on a highway. Who killed him? and why?

Name: Best of Luck
Description: Four youngsters, Surya, Manu, Neethu and Dia, who have no-one but each other in life. As luck would have it, some rich Nayikar in some distant village reveals a secret on his death bed that Surya is his son.

Name: Kaaryasthan
Description: Krishnanunni tries to settle the dispute between two feuding families. In the process of doing so, he ends up falling in love with Sreebala, who belongs to one of the families.

Name: Four Friends
Description: Four cancer patients fly to Malaysia in order to fulfill their last dreams.

Name: Cocktail
Description: The lives of an architect and his wife are turned upside down when a stranger kidnaps their daughter and blackmails them to do some crimes for him.

Name: Anwar
Description: The revenge of anwar against the terrorists who killed anwer's family in a bomb blast. After the Blast anwar plan a secrete mission to find the faces behind the Blast.

Name: Pranchiyettan and the Saint
Description: Pranchiyettan is a successful businessman who often has talks with an imaginary St. Francis of Assisi. The story deals with how he goes about changing his embarrassing image to making a name for himself using wealth and contacts.

Name: Elsamma Enna Aankutty
Description: The difficulties of a young girl who tries to raise her family.

Name: Shikkar
Description: A lorry Driver who was a police officer tries to protect his daughter from an unknown man who is hunting them.

Name: Yakshiyum Njanum
Description: Unaware of her reality, Shyam falls in love with Aathira, a ghost who wants to avenge her and her lover's deaths by killing a minister. However, when Shyam discovers the truth, he decides to help her.

Name: Sakudumbam Shyamala
Description: Shyamala marries against the wishes of her family and gets abandoned by them. After 25 years, history repeats itself when her son, Akash, marries the girl of his choice and she disagrees to it.

Name: Malarvaadi Arts Club
Description: Five friends are disappointed about the way their favorite hangout Malarvaadi Arts Club is headed. They take the responsibility of reviving the club in their own hands.

Name: Apoorvaragam
Description: Apoorvaragam is the story of three youngsters Roopesh (Nishan), Nancy (Nithya) and Tommy (Asif Ali). Roopesh has always been in love with Nancy, but has never had the nerve to express it. For Nancy, love is something that is beyond words. Tommy is the perfect Cupid, who would make things happen for these two. After a lot of unexpected happenings and dramatic twists, it is proven that only true love can endure.

Name: Mummy & Me
Description: The film revolves around a family of Jewel. She is a college student and likes independence. She has a very caring mother, who fears everything jewel do and a loving father. She hates her mother who criticize for everything. Meanwhile her family friend falls in love with her. Soon she met a guy through chat and he makes her to leave her worries and encourages her. She began to love her mother and brother. Thus the family feels happy. She fell in love with the chat friend and film ends with whom she decides to marry. Great family story.

Name: Pokkiri Raja
Description: Madhavan Nair unknowingly kills a teenager. Raja, his eldest son, takes the blame and is sentenced to jail for five years. After jail, Raja rescues the daughter of a village land lord in Madurai, becomes his right hand Pokkiri Raja.

Name: Alexander the Great
Description: Watch the full movie, Alexander The Great, only on Eros Now. Alexander The Great is a 2010 Indian Tamil film, directed by Murali Nagavallyand produced by V.B.K. Menon. The film stars Mohanlal, Bala and Aswathy in lead roles. The film had musical score by M. G. Sreekumar.

Name: Kadha Thudarunnu
Description: Vijayalakshmi struggles to lead a normal life after the sudden death of her husband. However, meeting Preman, an auto rickshaw driver changes her life for the better.

Name: T.D
Description: The story of a mother and a son in a village. Chndrika, the mother, and Dasan is her son who is eleven years old. Chandrika's husband Divakaran had deserted her and her son, when Dasan was merely an year old. Ever since Chandrika had lost contact with her husband, and had over the years learned to fend for herself and her son. Dasan on the other hand, is never able to stop dreaming about his father. So, when he accidentally comes across Divakaran's address in Chandrika's cloth box, Dasan writes a letter to his father, without letting his mother know about it. Does the letter reach Divakaran?

Name: Paappi Appachaa
Description: A notorious father-son duo shares a friendly rapport. Things take a turn when a village woman stands against them and circumstances force them to go their separate ways.

Name: Janakan
Description: The story of Vishwam, who tries to revenge those people, who destroyed his only daughter, with the help of a kind lawyer and Vishwam's two close friends.

Name: Pramani
Description: A corrupt politician do whatever to make illegal wealth but in the name of his family members.The story takes a turn when his beloved family members throw him

Name: Nayakan
Description: A docile Kathakali artist loses his father and sister and sets out to seek revenge on the criminal responsible for their deaths.

Name: Aagathan
Description: Shreya introduces Gautham to her father, Ret. Gen. Hareendranath Varma, and family. He appears to be an adorable and lovable person until a cat-and-mouse game begins between the general and Gautham, who hides a big secret.

Name: Dhrona 2010
Description: A realtor is lured into buying a haunted house by a vengeful enemy. However, he is killed under strange circumstances. His brother, a tantric and a Sanskrit professor, comes to investigate the matter.

Name: Bodyguard
Description: Ammu,the daughter of a wealthy man fall in love with her bodyguard anonymously.

Name: Happy Husbands
Description: A bar singer impacts the lives of three people, and through a series of mishaps, they all come together during a vacation in Malaysia.

Name: Neelathamara
Description: A woman, seduced by the legend of the blue lotus into believing that her lover truly cares for her, learns hard lessons from life and in the end blossoms as if she herself is the lotus of truth.

Name: Puthiya Mugham
Description: A simple college student suffering from a mild psychological disorder finds himself against a family of criminals.

Name: Winter
Description: A doctor along with his wife and child goes to his old closed benglow to refresh for some days which leads to many misterious incidents there

Name: Moz & Cat
Description: Two orphans share a strong bond and hatch mischievous plans to earn their livelihood. However, their life takes an unexpected turn when they meet Nandana.

Name: Gulumaal: The Escape
Description: Jerry is a con man whose actions have led to separate from his family. One day, he helps Ravi, an escaped convict, evade the law and soon teams up with him to carry out a big heist.

Name: Colors
Description: Dr Rajalakshmi lives happily with her two daughters, Pinki and Pooja. However, when she detects fraudulent activities regarding the sales of medicines, she earns some enemies who want to destroy her.

Name: Kaana Kanmani
Description: A girl along with her parents come to a haunted mansion to celebrate holiday.slowly they understood that her daughter is caught by an evil spirit of a child they aborted

Name: Aayirathil Oruvan
Description: Aravindan borrows a huge sum of money for his sister's marriage. Soon, as he strives hard to repay the moneylender, he finds himself in the middle of a vicious debt trap.

Name: My Big Father
Description: The film exhibits a deep bonding between a son, Alby (Jayaram), and his father, Kunjumon (Ajaykumar), a dwarf. Things changes after Kunjumon faces a critical accident , which affects Alby's marriage-life.

Name: Swa Le
Description: From 1984 to 2009 it revolves around a news reporter,how he survived all these years

Name: Ividam Swargamanu
Description: a farmer's family fight against the land maffias

Name: Chattambinadu
Description: A man having a dirty connection with a village in the past returns to proper the place which is ruled by a local gangster.

Name: Paleri Manikyam: Oru Pathirakolapathakathinte Katha
Description: A woman is found dead in mysterious circumstances. Several discrepancies arise in the findings, which eventually leads to the closure of the case. Years later, Haridas decides to reopen the case.

Name: Kerala Varma Pazhassi Raja
Description: Kerala Varma Pazhassi Raja is a 2009 Malayalam historical drama film based on the life of Pazhassi Raja, a Hindu king who fought against the British in the 18th century.

Name: Angel John
Description: Maradonna is an aimless youngster who likes to waste his time doing practically nothing .His life is turned upside down when an angel decides to teach him a lesson.

Name: Kerala Cafe
Description: A series of related and unrelated tales together linking them in subtle ways and discuss different shades of life.

Name: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
Description: Venki is an entrance coaching professor by day and robs ATM's using fake debit cards by night. He has been operating out of Kochi for the past three months and the Imperial Bank of India (IBI) is the target of all these robberies.

Name: Loudspeaker
Description: The movie is all about the relationships between two rare bred men from extremely different strata of society, but more in common than is apparent from the first look.

Name: Kutty Srank: The Sailor of Hearts
Description: Kutty Srank is a short-tempered, lonely, but law-abiding boatman whose work leads him to travel the back waters of Kerala. One day, when the local police station discovers an unidentified body washed ashore, three women come forward claiming it to be the dead body of Kutty Srank. Each of the three women - a rich women aspiring to be a Buddhist nun, a convict, and a mute - all claim to be Kutty Srank's wife. Kutty Srank ultimately leaves behind a story of a man who convinced three very different women he was a committed and faithful husband while successfully keeping his other two lives a secret.

Name: Daddy Cool
Description: A lazy police officer and his son passes through a set of incidents with a cricket player linked to betting and match fixing which later becomes serious as his son is kidnapped.

Name: Ee Pattanathil Bhootham
Description: A great change occurs in life of poor children of a circus company when a spirit enters their life.But an evil megician wants spirit in his control and he is in search of it
