Name: Bhramaram
Description: A jeep driver finds his old schoolmates to prove his innocence after 30 years.

Name: Ivar Vivahitharayal...?
Description: A youngly married couple cannot attach themselves.but will they join finally?

Name: Currency
Description: A mentally disabled man along with an outsider makes fake currency refering some old damaged books,replace it with real money.They tries to transport it.anywhay a police force is behind to tackle them.

Name: Passenger
Description: When a reporter is framed for murder and her husband is kidnapped as part of a political conspiracy, the only person she can rely on is a common man.

Name: Bhagavan
Description: When a group of terrorists kidnap the home minister of Kerala and three newborn babies from his hospital, Dr Balagopal takes it upon himself to rescue them.

Name: Bhagyadevatha
Description: A cable operator pushes his wife out of his family when the required amount of dowry is not paid to him. Things change when she becomes winner of a lottery. Now he wants to pull her to his family by any means.

Name: I.G.
Description: A police officer fights against terrorism.

Name: 2 Harihar Nagar
Description: The four friends are back in town, to re-live the old days. But problems arise when one of them goes missing and an enemy from their past tries to hunt them down.

Name: Sagar Alias Jackie: Reloaded
Description: Sagar, known as Jackie, among the criminal underworld, is called by his friend Indu for rescuing her husband Manu from the Rozario gang who kidnapped him. Jackie rescues Manu with ease, but it ensues a gang war.

Name: Red Chillies
Description: A group of nine girls are accused of a murder as well as an accident killing 10. They are working in Red Chellies, FM station which is owned by OMR. OMR, who is a Singapore based oil merchant, is forced to come down to Kochi to find the truth.

Name: Heylassa
Description: Unnikrishnan, who is raised by Madhavan, is forced to go to the city after he beats up some thugs. There he begins working for a wheelchair bound man who is seeking his lost love.

Name: Love in Singapore
Description: Machu (Mammootty) was cheated by an Anglo-Indian (Nedumudi Venu) by promising him to marry their daughter. They escapes to Singapore and the plot forms when Machu also flies to Singapore to find out them.

Name: Makante Achan
Description: Viswanathan, an honest village officer, wishes this son, Manu, to become an engineer. However, Manu has no interest in pursuing his studies and aspires to make a name for himself as a singer.

Name: Lollipop
Description: The film shows a deep bonding between a brother and sister. The plot forms when the brother falls in love with his sister's foe.

Name: Parthan Kanda Paralokam
Description: Parthasarathy is loved by all his villagers as he works for the welfare of the people. He falls in love with his rival's daughter, unaware that she has ulterior motives.

Name: Mulla
Description: An orphaned baby brings a middle-class woman (Meera Nandan) closer to a goon (Dilip) and his people.

Name: Crazy Gopalan
Description: A double-crossed thief (Dileep) seeks revenge.

Name: Manjadikuru
Description: This is story of homecoming from the late 1970s. Ten-years-old Vicky arrives at his grandparents' home in rural Kerala to attend his grandfather's funeral. The disjointed family gathers together for the sixteen-day funeral period. During this period, Vicky discovers more about himself, his family, and his culture than he had expected to. The journey is narrated through the memories of an adult Vicky who returns to the same house to recount the experience.

Name: Pakal Nakshatrangal
Description: It is about the lives of a group of intellectuals in Kerala in the latter half of the 1990s.

Name: Twenty:20
Description: Devaraja Prathapa Varma, an underworld don and wealthy businessman wants payback for his brother Karthik Varma's murderers.

Name: Maya Bazar
Description: Rameshan, a business man, spends his income on the patients of a local hospital. However, things take a turn when Rameshan witnesses an accident in which the victim is his lookalike.

Name: Kurukshetra
Description: In the Kargil war of 1999, an Indian commander faces off against his Pakistani counterpart.

Name: Thirakkatha
Description: Film director Akbar, after his extremely successful first film, decides to base his second film on the life of a very popular yesteryear actress Malavika, whose present whereabouts are not known.

Name: Thalappavu
Description: The movie is based on a true story about the confession of a police constable about gunning down a Naxalite (Arikkad Varghese) in a fake encounter as per the order of his superiors in 1970.

Name: Akasha Gopuram
Description: Albert Samson, a successful architect, and Alice are leading an unhappy married life because of Samson's ambitious and egoistic nature. Hilda Varghese enters Samson's life and changes it completely.

Name: Minnaminnikkoottam
Description: The story is about seven friends working in a new age IT company. They earn money and have a good time as a group. Despite their diverse backgrounds, they blend well, even having romantic relationships at various degrees of fruition.

Name: Veruthe Oru Bharya
Description: Sugunan finds a lot of analogies between his life and the power supply. He also has a wife named Bindu and a daughter who's a ninth grader. Sugunan is a man who takes his wife for granted, and often doesn't think twice before he acts.

Name: Parunthu
Description: Purushothaman is a heartless financier who behaves in a rude and insulting way towards the people who owe him money. But his life changes when he faces many unexpected turn of events.

Name: Madambi
Description: A loan shark in rural Kerala must face hurdles from corporate, enemies and his own family to keep his enterprise going.

Name: One Way Ticket
Description: The story of crazy fans of superstars who go to any extent to promote their screen idols and their movies. They even sacrifice their own career trying to promote their favorite stars.

Name: Shakespeare M.A
Description: Pavithran, a renowned playwright famous for writing real life incidences, writes a play about a real-life girl and somehow, he also becomes one of the characters in the play.

Name: Annan Thambi
Description: Appu and Achu are twin brothers who do not get along with each other since childhood. When their enemies create misunderstandings between them, they bay for each other's blood.

Name: Innathe Chinthavishayam
Description: Gopakumar tries to sort out the problems of 3 families.Will he able to help them?

Name: Cycle
Description: Two friends get busted for drug possession and the illegal ways they go through to gather money for the bribe.

Name: College Kumaran
Description: Kumaran is running a canteen in a well-reputed college and is in good terms with the students. But, problems arise when he falsely accused of causing an accident which took the lives of many.

Name: Roudram
Description: A dedicated police officer investigates the death of a drug baron in spite of pressures from above and corruption within his police force

Name: Calcutta News
Description: Krishna priya (Meera Jasmine) get married to Harikumar (Indrajith sukumaran) and move to Culcutta with him.From there she understand that she was cheaten by his husband

Name: Romeo
Description: The life of a male nurse Manu takes a turn when a doctor, a reality show contestant and a village girl fall in love with him. He must look for ways to untangle the cobwebs that form as a result.

Name: Kangaroo
Description: A heart-wrenching tale of a man played by Prithviraj, who must find the father of the child he raised as his own.

Name: Flash
Description: Dr. Mithun Madhavan uncovering the murder mystery in a joint family and how he helps Dhwani overcome from some disturbing experiences.

Name: Kadha Parayumbol...
Description: A local barber, due to the immense pressure put by his family and and townspeople, tries to communicate with his old friend, who is a popular cinema actor.

Name: Rock N' Roll
Description: Story of a world renowned bassist Chandramauli trying to impress a singer named Daya by composing music.

Name: Paradesi
Description: Valiakath Moosa is an Indian who works in Karachi during the British rule. He finds himself alienated when his country does not consider him a citizen.

Name: Chocolate
Description: Shyam, an irresponsible guy joins a women's college, only to satisfy the wish of his mother who is also a lecturer there.

Name: Nasrani
Description: David and Sara's marriage gets canceled due to an unexpected tragic event. Years later, they continue to love each other and strive to protect an innocent girl from an ambitious politician.

Name: Naalu Pennungal
Description: A drama centered around four women at Kuttanad in Kerala's Alappuzha district.

Name: Nivedhyam
Description: Mohanakrishnan, who loses his father at the age of twelve, moves to the city to find a job. Rama Varma, an acquaintance, pretends to be rich, but has absolutely nothing to offer him. Watch the full movie Nivedyam online, only on Eros Now.

Name: Kichamani M.B.A.
Description: Kichamani gets people's work done in the government offices through bribery and corruption. However, while doing such dealings, he earns the enmity of Devanarayanan, a shrewd politician.

Name: The Sea Within
Description: A married woman falls in love with an Economics Professor and becomes pregnant and insane by the physical relationship outside her married life.

Name: Black Cat
Description: A police inspector gets beaten by the goons and loses his sanity and is taken care of by the village headman's daughter. But the inspector's girlfriend arrives from another village to take him back.

Name: Alibhai
Description: An notorious business man comes to eliminate alibhai and his people from palayam market science he has childhood enemies.

Name: Nadiya Kollappetta Rathri
Description: Railway Anti-Criminal Task Force (RATs) investigates three unrelated murders happened in a train.

Name: Mission 90 Days
Description: An investigation story set in the early 90's based on the Rajiv Gandhi assassination.

Name: Arabikkatha
Description: Mukundan, a hard core communist exposes the atrocities of Karunan, a politician. But, the society shuns him for his anachronistic views.

Name: Hello
Description: A drunkard, but intelligent advocate and his side-kick tries to protect a woman from the threats against her life.

Name: July 4
Description: Gokul Das, an ex-gangster tries to make a living by becoming the driver of a millionaire, whose daughter, Priya is the target of some killers. Das tries to save Priya, but things are not what they seem to appear.

Name: Khaki
Description: Khaki Vance Dubose is a Rodeo Girl. But then she gives up and becomes a Cheerleader.

Name: Time
Description: Appan menon is on his way to investigation. Susan who knew appan menon try to locate his more information which forms a twist

Name: Goal
Description: Sam, a football player, gets admission in a prestigious international school under sports quota. His life changes for the better when he falls in love with a girl from the same school.

Name: Big B
Description: Four brothers hunt for the killer and the truth behind their loving foster mother who was murdered in cold blood, .

Name: Chota Mumbai
Description: The daily lives of Vasco Da Gama and his friends in a fraction of Cochin, called Chota Mumbai is portrayed in this comedy.

Name: Vinodayathra
Description: Journey of Vinod from an irresponsible man to a sensible one, and of those who gets tangled with his life.

Name: The Speed Track
Description: Arjun, an athlete becomes a star of his college after he breaks another athlete Tinu's record. Unable to stomach Arjun's popularity, Tinu takes the competition between them to a personal level.

Name: Detective
Description: A detective investigates the death of the wife of an emerging politician. The death was first ruled as suicide, but he realizes this is not a suicide but a well planned murder in cold blood.

Name: Mayavi
Description: Mahi is nicknamed Mayavi for his ability to beat up baddies stealthily without revealing his identity. He often ends up in jail. While serving time he develops a friendship with Balan, another convict. Balan's brother is seriously ill in hospital and is in need of an expensive operation. Meanwhile Mahi is picked as the lone lucky prisoner to be pardoned and released on Independence Day. With Balan unable to provide the funds from inside the jail and since his release is a long way off, Mahi promises to find a way to procure the money.

Name: Inspector Garud
Description: A corrupt police officer takes bribes to make up the amount that he paid to get the job.

Name: Kayyoppu
Description: The movie tells the story about Balachandran, a person with passion for books and literature.

Name: Kanaka Simhasanam
Description: Kanakambaran(Jayaram) owner/actor of a failing theatrical company gets a chance to enact a real-life drama.

Name: Palunku
Description: Monichan and Susamma migrate into town area with their children for the better education of their daughters

Name: Notebook
Description: Three teenage girls in boarding school invite serious trouble when one of them gets pregnant.

Name: Baba Kalyani
Description: Very intelligent police officer comes to investigate in Kochi for terrorism and terrorist.

Name: Smart City
Description: Shekharan is a noble gangster and his trusted henchman is Madhvan. When the Kotturan brothers try to plot against Shekharan, Madhavan strives to save his employer from their evil intentions.

Name: Yes Your Honour
Description: Yes Your Honour,is an enjoyable film that reiterates the importance and relevance of moral values in today's world.

Name: Chakkara Muthu
Description: Aravindan is an innocent, kind hearted but mentally challenged tailor working in a tailor shop. He has an exceptional talent for tailoring, especially ladies garments. His services are indispensable to the shop owner. The other tailors who can't match his talent pick on him and taunt him every chance they get. Aravindan is secretly in love with his childhood friend Anitha who is also his staunch supporter. Anitha's family see him as nothing more than a simpleton and a mere handyman and has no insecurities about letting Aravindan into their home. His growing desire for Anitha puts a strain on their friendship.

Name: Karutha Pakshikal
Description: Widower Murugan moves to Kerala with his three children and irons clothes to make a living. While dealing with daily issues, he also aims to fund the operation of his child who is visually impaired.

Name: Vasthavam
Description: Balachandran from a poor family gets employed in Kerala Secretariat and his life changing incidents occur there.

Name: Photographer
Description: Dijo John, a wild-life photographer, has evidence against a corrupt police officer. His twin brother Joy John sets out to trace him when Dijo goes missing.

Name: Bada Dosth
Description: A honest Police officer join with an underworld don Geevargees/GV when there is no another option against him.But GV tries to kill him in a bomb blast

Name: Pothan Vava
Description: To proselytize to Christianity, Pothan Vava (Mammootty) visits his father by the advise of his mother. His father and mother were divorced before.

Name: The Don
Description: Kasim is a mafia boss and Unnikrishnan becomes his most trusted man. Later, when Kasim is found murdered, Unnikrishnan is charged with the crime and must prove his innocence.

Name: Mahasamudram
Description: Isahak, a fisherman and football player, falls in love with Devi. But their married life is shattered when Devi gets arrested for murder on their wedding night.

Name: Classmates
Description: College classmates meet for a 10-year reunion, which does not go as smoothly as planned. Love is discovered, friendships are broken and secrets about tragic events in the past are revealed.

Name: Moonnamathoral
Description: Two girls rent a haunted palace, aided by a witchcraft manager. A cop's marriage turns eerie in a remote bungalow, revealing its dark history.

Name: Bhargavacharitham Moonnam Khandam
Description: Bhargavan is a dangerous criminal who gets anxiety attacks that prevent him from attacking anyone. However, when he meets a psychiatrist, Shantharam, his life gets transformed while he treats him.

Name: Chess
Description: Vijay Krishnan seeks to exact revenge on those responsible for his family demise.

Name: Keerthi Chakra
Description: Based on a real life incident that happened during the Kargil War.

Name: Prajapathi
Description: Devarmadam narayan(mamootty) is accused for false crime of killing his father at age 13 and has send to juwale home.he returns and becomes ruler of his village but finds that evils of village r own relatives now it is battle between them

Name: Vadakkum Nathan
Description: The film opens with a mother and son coming to Hardwar to perform last rites of her elder son who had run away from home and is believed to have died. But the mother sees her long lost son on the banks of River Ganga and takes him back to the family. He is Bharath Pisharody a brilliant Sanskrit professor who is respected and loved by everyone including his cousin and lover Meera. But on his day of marriage he runs away leaving behind a heart-broken Meera and her father. Now Pisharody is different man and his family and friends believes that he is on drugs. But actually, the man is mentally disturbed as he suffers from deep depression. Soon his brother discover papers relating to his treatment for mental illness from his locked suitcase. Now everyone starts seeing him in a different way, which leads to the final twist. How Meera helps him come out of this difficult situation in life forms the rest of the gripping tale.

Name: Balram vs
Description: Mammootty plays a duel role of a police inspector Balram and a smuggler Taradas, both are enemies. They fight until they both have a common enemy.

Name: Chinthamani Kolacase
Description: Story of a highly successful criminal lawyer (Suresh Gopi) who brings his own version of street justice upon his clients after freeing them.

Name: Thuruppu Gulan
Description: A kind-hearted street-rowdy manages his own problems while his fathers mate's daughter arrives. He promises to help her and succeeds in it.

Name: Pachakuthira
Description: 'Anandakuttan' a junior artist in films decides to take care of his autistic brother 'Akash' for his patrimony, at last develops a strong bond with his gifted brother.

Name: Rasathanthram
Description: Premachandran, a carpenter by profession, dreams nothing but a lovely and peaceful life with his father. After taking an ill-treated maid, Kanmani, into care, he realizes the need of a woman in every man's life.

Name: Kilukkam Kilukilukkam
Description: After witnessing her father's murder at the hands of enemies, Chandni escapes to Ooty. Soon, Joji and a group of friends decide to trace her and save her life.

Name: Vargam
Description: Solomon Joseph, a corrupt policeman, aids Ummachan in his narcotics business. However, things take a turn when he ends up accidentally killing his younger brother.

Name: Lion
Description: An honest man neglected by his family members who are high grade officials wins the election as an independent candidate against his father and becomes high grade minister, rises in the political field.

Name: Achanurangatha Veedu
Description: Achanuragantha Veedu (English: The House Where the Father Doesn't Sleep) is a 2006 Malayalam film directed by Lal Jose and written by Babu Janardhanan. The story came to Janardhanan's mind after he watched the Suryanelli rape case proceedings.It tells the tale of Samuel, a student who falls in love with a Catholic Christian girl named Lillikutty in the 1970s, Shortly after their marriage they convert to Pentecostalism. However, his wife dies at an early stage of their married life, and he must face hardships of raising three daughters alone. The main plot revolves around the mystery of his youngest daughter's disappearance, the crushing truths he faces when he finds out what really happened to her, and the impact on his other daughters as well as his mental stability. The film is unique because of the portrayal of the Pentecostal denomination quite extensively for first time on Malayalam cinema silver screen.[2] Critics described the film as Salim Kumar's "graduation from a comedian to a mature character." Watch the full movie Achanurangatha Veedu online, only on Eros Now.

Name: The Campus
Description: Rajeev, who is from a broken family, tries to find happiness in his college life. But Vishnu, Rajeev's opponent in college, plots against him.

Name: Junior Senior
Description: A rich man is a well known flirt who lures women by making them fall into his trap. His employee is forced to fight when he sees that his boss is trying the same to woo his girl.

Name: Bus Conductor
Description: Kunjakka, a bus conductor, who is loved and admired by all faces a great problem.

Name: Thanmathra
Description: Will an unexpected turn of events change Rameshan's life forever and prevent him from witnessing his dream where his son becomes a reputable IAS Officer?

Name: The Tiger
Description: The movie begins with the death of Varma (Murali) a senior government official who was about to on the verge of making a major anti-corruption bust. The case is handed over to Chandrashekharan IPS (Suresh Gopi) who goes by the nickname of "The Tiger". A turning point comes in the movie when a TV journalist Suhara (Gopika) disappears along with her Cameraman. Chandrashekhar finds a link between both the cases and is out to catch the mysterious assassin who is responsible for the death of Varma.

Name: Sarkar Dada
Description: After convicted to a murder Mukundan an heir of rich family gets released from prison just to know that all of his belongings are under the control of state government.

Name: Anandabhadram
Description: Following his mother's death, the protagonist returns from the US to his ancestral home to fulfill his mother's last wish. Upon arrival he understands that the world of black magic and sorcery he heard as stories were not far from real.

Name: Rajamanikyam
Description: The story of how a un-educated man Rajamanikyam, abandoned as a child, unites his step-father with the latter's children who are greedy for his wealth and possessions.

Name: Nerariyan CBI
Description: Years after a girl Mythili is murdered in a supposedly haunted mansion, Sethurama Iyer, a CBI officer, decides to find the culprit and solve the mystery.

Name: Naran
Description: Velayudhan is a good hearted drunkard local rowdy that lives in Mullankoli village. Gopinathan tries to ruin his life and does evil things to the village. Velayudhan has to get rid of him.

Name: Chanthupottu
Description: A fisherman's son grows up as a woman but things get complicated when she falls in love with a childhood friend.

Name: Bharathchandran I.P.S
Description: Bharatchandran IPS, a righteous City Police Commissioner who doesn't mind assaulting even his superior officers and powerful politicians while staging a one-man-fight against the corrupt political machinery prevailing in the state.

Name: Udayon
Description: Udayon movie revolves around 75 year old Suranadu Kunju and his son Papoyi ( Both are Mohanlal). Kunju thinks that the heartbeat of earth is in soil and not in maths. His beliefs on the land and agrarianism is good but his value system that farmers and farming is more important and better is not.

Name: Pandippada
Description: A financially backward man, who tries out different business plans gets involved in the land conflict between two powerful landlords.

Name: Ben Johnson
Description: Son of a notorious criminal becomes a police officer to erase the bad image of his father but things are not easy as he seems.

Name: Rappakal
Description: The story of a mom and her adopted son and how their life changes after a long-awaited reunion of the joint family.

Name: Police
Description: Shekhar and Anand get suspected for the murder of their senior officer. Solving that case lead them to more and more complicated situations.

Name: Krithyam
Description: Watch the full movie, Krithyam, only on Eros Now. Krithyam is a 2005 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Viji Thampi and produced by Sasi Ayyanchira. The film stars Prithviraj, Pavithra and Jagathy Sreekumar in lead roles. The film had musical score by Udayakumar.

Name: Thaskara Veeran
Description: Arakkalam Kochu Baby takes revenge on Eapen who murdered his father and vows to destroy his immense wealth

Name: Alice in Wonderland
Description: Alby and his mentally challenged sister, Alice, adore each other. But when two strangers, Sophia and Victor, enter their lives forming strong bonds with them, it leads to tension between the siblings.

Name: Kochi Rajavu
Description: Surya is released from jail and goes to college in an attempt to lead a normal life, but he can not evade his past.

Name: Chandrolsavam
Description: After a gap of 6 years, Sreehari has returned from Paris to his hometown at Chirakkal. He knows he must again leave his home one day. But before, he needs some mouths to be shut, some misunderstandings to be cleared and some wounds to be healed. To summarize, he has some scores to settle.

Name: Thommanum Makkalum
Description: The story deals withe life of 'Thomman' and his adopted kids 'Shivan' and 'Sathyan' who give up their thievery life and decides to lead a happy life, gets involved in village issues.

Name: Finger Print
Description: A patriarch (Nedumudi Venu) of a royal family whose descendant was murdered, assigns the task of finding the culprit to two of his police officer nephews - Vivek (Jayaram) and Kishore (Indrajith).

Name: Immini Nalloraal
Description: Jeevan is a huge fan of actress Sneha and when she arrives in his village for a shoot, he thinks that they are married and kidnaps her. Ultimately they fall in love and end up married.

Name: Achuvinte Amma
Description: The film exhibits how an interception made by a good but male, changed the life of a caring mother, when her only daughter fell in love with him.

Name: Udayananu Tharam
Description: Story of a talented Director's pain and troubles in career as well as in personal life when his magnum opus work is stolen while some of his mundane friends who struggled in daily life seemed to prosper all of a sudden.

Name: Vesham
Description: When businessman Appu's younger brother Hari is accused in a murder case, the former takes the blame to protect his sibling and also avenges the wrongdoing of his trade rival, Sivan.

Name: Rasikan
Description: Shivankutty earns a living by selling tickets in black. One day, he witnesses a policeman's murder in broad daylight and stands up against the culprit alone.

Name: Akale
Description: Margaret wants her daughter, who is differently abled, to get married. However, her dream shatters when she finds that the boy she chose for her daughter is already engaged.

Name: Perumazhakkalam
Description: A man accidentally kills his friend while fighting with a man who absconded with his money and is sentenced to death. His only way out is to obtain a letter of pardon from his friend's wife.

Name: Kadhavaseshan
Description: Renuka trying to find the reason for Gopi's suicude by going through his past.

Name: Black
Description: Shanmughan, a hitman, decides to lead a peaceful life when he finds his daughter. However, things turn worse when his friends start plotting against him.

Name: Maampazhakkaalam
Description: Puramanayil Chandran is forced to go to Abu Dhabi to earn and pay his late father's debts. His life changes when he falls in love with Indira and starts getting threats from her ex-husband.

Name: The Journey
Description: In Sancharram ("The Journey"), Kiran is mortified by her growing lesbian desire for the effervescent Delilah, in an idyllic Indian village where arranged marriage is the only acceptable form of coupling.

Name: Kaazhcha
Description: Madhavan, a villager, comes across Pavan, a young boy who lost his family in the Gujarat earthquake. He welcomes Pavan into his family and the rapport between them strengthens over time.

Name: Sathyam
Description: Sanjiv Kumar's selection to police force is delayed by then Police Commissioner under grudge against Sanjiv's father. All options out, Sanjiv locks up the Commissioner to get his job. Trouble begins when Commissioner breaks out.

Name: Vettam
Description: As Gopalakrishnan attempts to smuggle an expensive necklace, he crosses paths with a woman looking for her fiancé.

Name: Natturajavu
Description: Pulikattil Charly (Mohanlal) is a honest man who is forced to spend most of his time trying to sort out the mess left behind by his late father Pultikattil Mathan

Name: Manjupoloru Penkutti
Description: Nidhi a 16 year old teenager secretly tries to kill her abusive stepfather with the help of her friends.

Name: Aparichithan
Description: Three college girls, on their way to a hill resort, meet a stranger. Though he is a nuisance for them at first, later they become friends and by then he is missing...

Name: Wanted
Description: Five college friends badly in need of money kidnap a wanted criminal and get caught between the police and mafia.

Name: Mayilattam
Description: Devan an honest farmer and recipient of karshaka sree award is in a run for his life after getting into fight with local rowdy.His life changes when he finds out he has a doppelganger with exact opposite character of him and interchange their lives with eachother.

Name: Runway
Description: Unni, who his family thinks is an NRI, is actually a smuggler known as Valayar Paramasivam. Problems arise when his enemies start plotting against him and his brother becomes a police officer who is in pursuit of Paramasivam.

Name: Chathikkatha Chanthu
Description: Chanthu posts fake love letters to an imaginary girl Vasumathi, so that his landlord's daughter Indira who is in love with him won't pursue him. Things go awry when a real Vasumathi receives the letters and starts looking for Chanthu.

Name: Vajram
Description: Vajram is a 2004 Indian Malayalam Flim, directed by Pramod Pappan & produced by Haksar Syed.The flim star Mammootty, Kousalya & Vasundhara Das in lead roles.The music of the film was composed by Ouseppachan & S. P. Venkatesh.

Name: Vismayathumbathu
Description: A soul in search of herself.

Name: Vellinakshatram
Description: Vinod loves Aswathy, who belongs to a royal family with dark secrets. However, strange events occur after Aswathy mysteriously dies during childbirth and their daughter is believed to be possessed.

Name: Njaan Salperu Raman Kutty
Description: Ramankutty, a teacher with good reputation agrees to marry his uncle's daughter. His reputation goes for a toss when he changes his mind and take interest in another cousin.

Name: 4 the People
Description: Four Engineering students take it as their duty to fight against injustice in their own peculiar way believing that they have to react to any social prejudices that they come across.

Name: Kerala House Udan Vilpanakku
Description: Trouble starts for Dinesh (Jayasurya) when he sells a house located on the Kerala-Tamil Nadu border.

Name: Sethurama Iyer CBI
Description: Sethurama Iyer and the CBI re-open an old case upon hearing from a death-row criminal that he didn't commit one of the seven murders he was convicted of.

Name: Vamanapuram Bus Route
Description: Johnny, a bus conductor, is sent to Vamanapuram to clear a bus route, where he falls in love with his boss' daughter, who is already engaged. Johnny is now at cross roads.

Name: Chakram
Description: A lorry driver (Prithvi Raj) learns that gambling can bring big fortunes, as well as big losses in life.

Name: Manassinakkare
Description: Old Kochu Thresia's family is irked by her childlike behavior and does not comply with her bizarre demands. She finds an unusual friend in Reji, a down-to-earth young man, who fulfills her demands.

Name: Pulival Kalyanam
Description: Hari's and Ganga's mobile phones got exchanged accidently and they started getting misleading calls....

Name: Pattanathil Sundaran
Description: Shows the difficulties of a family in which the wife (Navya) works and the husband (Dileep) is left to take care of the house.

Name: Hariharan Pillai Happy Aanu
Description: Hariharan, a construction company owner, builds a house for Satyapalan, who refuses to pay him. However, things take an unexpected turn when Satyapalan's daughter falls in love with Hariharan.

Name: War & Love
Description: Captain Gopinath, along with Serina, the daughter of a Pakistani army general, must derail Pakistan's plans of using a nuclear bomb against India in the wake of their lost war.

Name: Ammakilikkoodu
Description: Saranalayam is an old-age home run by Eradi. He appoints Vivek as the new manager to help him evict the inmates as he wants to sell it.

Name: Mizhi Randilum
Description: Bhadra, a nurse, has to look after her family. Due to her brother's debts, she sells her house to Krishnakumar but later, she meets Krishnakumar's sister who offers to help her get the house back.

Name: Pattalam
Description: Deals with sweet,funny&hillarious incidents that takes place in a village when a miltry squards tend in a village as a report of terrorist attack.

Name: Swapnakoodu
Description: Three college friends, entirely different behaviors, are allowed to live on rent in a lodge ran by a mother, and her two daughters, reluctantly, to sustain daily living.

Name: Balettan
Description: Balettan (Mohanlal) is a man who sacrifices to help everyone he can , but when a time in need comes no one is there to help him.

Name: Meerayude Dukhavum Muthuvinte Swapnavum
Description: The story of Muthu and his sister Meera.

Name: C.I.D
Description: The adventures of a private detective, Moosa, whose luck and wit help him to solve the cases.

Name: Swapnam Kondu Thulabharam
Description: Aniyankuttan falls in love with Ammu, who wishes to marry his elder brother, Vishnu. When Aniyankuttan learns the truth about Ammu's love, he is enraged.

Name: Vellithira
Description: Raj and his friends go to a remote village and start a touring talkie that shows scenes from Rajinikanth's movies. He falls in love with a local girl, but his past surfaces and changes their lives.

Name: Sadanandante Samayam
Description: Story of a man (Dileep) who depends on astrology for everything in his life.

Name: Kilichundan Mampazham
Description: A childless man marries for a third time in hopes of having a child. But his day-to-day life gets more complicated when a newcomer arrives in his town.

Name: Thilakkam
Description: Long-lost 'Unni' returns after a long span of time, though mentally challenged. Several attempts are made by his family and villagers, to recover his mental illness. But some unexpected incidents, form the plot.

Name: Ente Veedu Appuvinteyum
Description: Vasu is brought up with love and care by his stepmother.However, when his stepmother gives birth to a boy, he feels insecure as the baby gets more attention than him.

Name: Mr
Description: Ananthan Thampy (Mohanlal) is a middle aged who has decided never to marry because he thinks he will loose all his youthfulness and pleasing looks though marriage.

Name: Gramaphone
Description: Jennifer is the only hope of her family to reach Israel. But for her family she should sacrifice her own love and friendship.

Name: Chronic Bachelor
Description: Satyapratapan (Mammootty) and Kuruvila (Innocent) are chronic bachelors. Sp's sister Sandhya lives as a paying guest in their neighbourhood. Problems begin when Mukesh and Harishree Ashokan join Mammootty and Rambha joins Sandhya.

Name: Bamboo Boys
Description: Several members of a forest tribe head out to city to find a doctor when the village elder gets sick , which leads to many funny events as they leave their primitive habitat and experience civilized life for first time.

Name: Thandavam
Description: Brothers Kasinathan and Swaminathan strive for the good of their village. But after Swaminathan dies mysteriously, Kasi investigates and eventually take his place as the new patriarch.

Name: Phantom
Description: Phantom Pailey (Mammootty) is a very mysterious stranger with that seems a shady background that arrives in a village , and helps the people fight against local goons.

Name: Kaiyethum Doorath
Description: Sachin and Sushma meet at a hill resort. Sachin falls in love immediately but he is hesitated to tell his love to Sushma. Later he founds out that Sushma is engaged and her marriage is fixed with Kishore. But Sushma asks Sachin to act as her fiancee in front of her parents who are going to divorce after her marriage. The story takes a turn, when Advocate Gopinathan comes for the help of Sachin and Sushma.

Name: Kunjikkoonan
Description: Kunjan is unhappy with the fact that no woman is ready to marry him because of his hunchback. However, his life changes for the better when Chembakam, a woman with visual impairment, enters his life.

Name: Kuberan
Description: Sidharthan, a part-time actor who pretends to be a rich man in order to rent a house, faces several challenges when he tries to help Pooja deal with her tragic past.

Name: Dany
Description: Dany, who lives an isolated life, meets Bhargavi. They both develop a camaraderie. But when Dany dies, Bhargavi fights to perform his Christian funeral rites amidst orthodox Hindus.

Name: Mazhathullikkilukkam
Description: Solomon mysteriously shows up after many years and offers to take care of his teachers, Anna and Alice. Unfortunately, a sudden turn of events brings out the real reason behind his arrival.

Name: Oomappenninu Uriyadappayyan
Description: A poor mute man and a rich deaf-mute woman fall in love and they elope as their love is not supported by the woman's family.

Name: Chathurangam
Description: After learning about Jimmy's talents, a minister makes him the secretary of his political party. However, things turn upside down when his own party member tries to plot against him.

Name: Malayalimamanu Vanakkam
Description: Anandakuttan has to bring home his sister who had ran away with a Tamilian.

Name: Kalyanaraman
Description: An old man (Dileep) narrates his love story about the curse his family possesses to a bunch of teenagers.

Name: Nandanam
Description: A woman hires a fourth domestic helper despite having three of them already working in her house. The fourth helper, a devotee of Lord Guruvayoorappan has to look after the other three.

Name: Nammal
Description: Two youngsters, who are orphan. Grown up themselves,by their hardwork. Gets to know that their teacher is one of their mom.

Name: Yathrakarude Sradhakku
Description: Two strangers pretend to be husband and wife in order to use a pre-reserved ticket bought from a scalper to get on a train , because of last second plans ,find that their lives intersect and later fall in love.

Name: Stop Violence
Description: Saathan, a thug, rapes Angelina who later becomes pregnant. Over time he falls in love with her but his gang leader does not approve of their relationship.

Name: Nakshathrakkannulla Rajakumaran Avanundoru Rajakumari
Description: Two lovers seperated by fueding families.

Name: Nizhalkkuthu
Description: Kaliyappan, the last hangman of Travancore dynasty is dragging his remaining life by consuming alcohol and worshipping the Mother Goddess.

Name: Meesha Madhavan
Description: Although forced into a criminal life from a young age, Madhavan is good at heart. However, as his enmity with Bhageerathan Pillai exacerbates, it forces the entrance of Sub-Inspector Eapen Pappachi.

Name: Pakalpooram
Description: After the death of Gouridasan's father, he and his family are thrown out of their home. When he plans to steal the property papers, he realizes the house is really haunted by an evil spirit.

Name: Praja
Description: Ex-don Zakkir Ali Hussein is living peacefully in the suburbs of Kochi and trying to begin a new life. However, due to the evil deeds of two dons and a corrupt politician, he is unable to live peacefully. Zakkir has to take the law into his hands and ultimately finish them off.

Name: Megamalhar
Description: Nandita is happily married to Mukundan. One day, she happens to meet her childhood sweetheart Rajeevan and they become intimate friends. However they decide to part ways as they're already married.

Name: Dubai
Description: Major Ravi Mamman (Mammootty) arrests two LTTE terrorists in Bangalore, who are on a mission to assassinate the Indian prime minister on his visit to the city. On the run, he identifies the government minister K.K.Nair (Janardanan) as the main conspirator behind the assassination plot. Nair anticipates a political coup after the death of the prime minister, through which he hopes to seize power. However, Mamman's attempts foil his ambition. Nair tries to buy out Mamman, who refuses his offers. In an attempt to save himself, Nair shoots Ravi Mamman, but the bullet accidentally hits Susan, Mamman's girlfriend, who dies on the spot. Nair fabricates a criminal case against Ravi Mamman, of killing Susan. Ravi is court-marshalled and sent to jail. Upon release, Ravi leaves to Dubai, where he emerges as a successful businessman in a short time. His business empire is spread all over the Middle-East. He is assisted by Chandran Nair (N. F. Varghese), an over-enthusiastic NRI. Ravi's sudden acquisition of power and influence makes him an enemy of many who are eagerly waiting for a chance to finish him off. Swaminathan (Nedumudi Venu), an accountant and a fatherlike figure for Ravi, is in deep financial trouble. He wins a lawsuit and gains several million Dirhams, but Victor Sebastian (Cochin Haneefa), his cunning attorney, cheats him by conspiring with Kishan Narayan Bhatta (Nirmal Pandey), an underworld don from Mumbai. Victor kills Swaminathan and his wife (Urmila Unni), after forcefully transferring properties to his name. Ammu (Anjala Zaveri), Swaminathan's daughter reaches Dubai from Bangalore for the funeral. Ravi Mamman promises her that he will recover her property. Kishan Narayan Bhatta tries many ways to resist Ravi Mamman. Lieutenant Kiran Pothan Cheriyan (Biju Menon), once a subordinate of Ravi in the Army, is in love with Alice, the sister of Ravi. Ravi Mamman, while coming to know about this relationship, decides to make Kiran a responsible guy and hands over t

Name: One-Man Show
Description: The fate of Jayakrishnan's (Jayaram) life depends on a TV game show. During the show the host pries into Jayakrishnan's past.

Name: Rakshasa Rajavu
Description: Police officer Ramanathan exposes the criminal activities of the state's finance minister and faces his wrath. However, things get complicated when the state CM's daughter falls in love with Naidu.

Name: Dosth
Description: The film revolves around two college friends where one is a new student. The new student falls in love with his friend's sister without knowing she is his friend's sister. The plot forms when he realize the truth.

Name: Vakkalathu Narayanankutty
Description: Narayanankutty aspires to become a lawyer, but ends up being a clerk in a government office. Although Narayanankutty does not become a lawyer, he fights when the law is broken.

Name: Randam Bhavam
Description: The life of a ruthless gangster turns upside down when his twin brother, a college professor, is killed in a shootout. He is soon forced to take his brother's place his family he abandoned a long time ago.

Name: Onnaman
Description: Ravishankar (Mohanlal) takes over the underworld empire left by his boss/father figure , Bava when he gets killed and helps the poor and needy. He becomes their leader or the "Onnaman" but in the process creates a lot of enemies.

Name: Nariman
Description: A police officer (Suresh Gopi) tries a different strategy to help a man facing death sentence.

Name: Ishtam
Description: A tale that narrates the healthy relationship between a father and his son.

Name: Sundara Purushan
Description: A girl with intellectual disabilities falls in love with a married singer and marries him. Her father poisons his mind against his first wife so that the groom leaves her.

Name: Uthaman
Description: The story is about an orphan, who accepts the blame for a murder and lands into jeopardy.

Name: Ravanaprabhu
Description: The story begins with the fall of Mangalasserry Neelakandan's (Mohanlal) son Karthikeyan (Mohanlal), as he ventures out to make money which ultimately makes him a liquor baron. The relationship between Neelakandan and Karthikeyan deteriorates, as the father does not approve of his son's money-making methods. Mundakkal Shekharan (Napoleon) comes into the picture again after spending a term in prison for killing one of Neelakandan's friends. He decides to finish the Mangalasserry family by confiscating the house which was kept as collateral for Bhanumathi's (Revathi) treatment. Bhanumathi passes away and Karthikeyan is now bent on taking revenge. Neelakandan loses his home and Karthikeyan ventures out in an attempt to reclaim his ancestral home. In the meantime, Karthikeyan abducts Shekharan's daughter Janaki (Vasundhara Das) in an attempt to blackmail him, during which they fall in love with each other. The remainder of the movie is about how Karthikeyan manages to get his ancestral home back while Shekharan's nephew Mundakkal Rajendran (Vijayaraghavan) makes attempts to kill Karthikeyan, but instead Neelakandan gets killed and Karthikeyan ventures out to kill Mundakkal Shekharan.

Name: Narendran Makan Jayakanthan Vaka
Description: A man (K Boban) returns to his native village to claim his father's property. But his time in the village is complicated by his parents relatives and friends.

Name: Cover Story
Description: An engineer witnesses her neighbor, a judge, being murdered. Her poor eyesight, however, stands in the way of her identifying the killer, which makes her a prime suspect in the eyes of the police.

Name: Ee Parakkum Thalika
Description: Unni, a bus owner, and his friend Sundareshan ply a bus service. The pathetic condition of his bus creates concerns for Unni. Things take a turn when a girl happens to come into their lives.

Name: Sharja To Sharja
Description: Nandhan comes to Kapithan family as Sheikh Jasim Khalidh Mehbani, their relative from Sharjah in order to save his brother's life.

Name: Megasandesam
Description: A young singer fall in love with a ghost that is visible only to his eyes. The movie shows the aftereffects of this love.

Name: Kakkakuyil
Description: Kunjunni has a speciality. He has the body of one person and the voice of another person.

Name: Karumadikkuttan
Description: Kuttan, a thirty-year-old innocent man, has the mind of a ten-year-old, which enables him to enjoy the positives of life. He develops feelings for Nandini, but she makes fun of him.

Name: Soothradharan
Description: Shivani's only hope of escape from her home prison is Ramesan.

Name: Devadoothan
Description: Vishal Krishnamoorthy, a renowned music composer and singer, reminisces about his initial struggles and an unknown spirit that inspires him to compose songs.

Name: Thenkasipattanam
Description: Kannan is in love with his childhood friend Meenakshi but keeps it a secret from his beloved friend Dasan. However, the friendship between them is ruined as Dasan falls in love with the same girl.

Name: Life Is Beautiful
Description: Vinay and Sindhu are an ideal couple as they love each other a lot. Vinay takes up a job as a Malayalam teacher in a public school and teaches with a motive to instill values in his students.

Name: Valliettan
Description: After losing their ancestral home to Arackal Madhavanunni, Shivaraman Nair seeks the help of his trusted lieutenant, Nedungadi, in order to kill Arackal and get their house back.

Name: Kochu Kochu Santhoshangal
Description: Young Celin falls in love with Gopan who is bringing up his son single-handedly. Realizing her feelings, Gopan reveals his past about how he had eloped with a rich girl, Asha.

Name: Arayannangalude Veedu
Description: Teenage boy Ravindranath leaves his house after a quarrel. Eighteen years later, circumstances make him return home, but he finds that matters are not like what he had expected.

Name: Satyameva Jayate
Description: Chandrachoodan, a righteous police officer, gets into trouble with his seniors because of his values. Despite being surrounded by corrupt officials, he vows to bring an underworld gangster to justice.

Name: Madhuranombarakattu
Description: Vishnu, a teacher gets transferred to a distant village. Vishnu's son passes away in an accident. Vishnu decides to hide this news from his wife, who is in prison, till she's released.

Name: Priyam
Description: Though Benny, an orphan, shares a close bond with Annie, the two get separated at a very young age. Years later, when Annie decides to return to Benny, fate has other plans for them.

Name: Nadan Pennum Natupramaniyum
Description: Govindan, a rich businessman, goes to any extent to make money. However, his life takes a turn when Gayathri enters his life to take revenge against him for ruining her father's life.

Name: Darling Darling
Description: Kochu Kurup and Aniyankutty fall in love with the same girl. When Aniyankutty comes to know that she loves his friend, he plans to sabotage their relationship, resulting in hilarious events.

Name: Dada Sahib
Description: Abubacker, a former Subedar and the son of a freedom fighter, tries to curb terrorist activities taking place in his village. However, in a turn of events, he ends up getting arrested for espionage.

Name: Mr
Description: Gopalakrishnan, a chef, escapes from his village to a city when his marriage gets ruined. He falls in love with Radhika, but his happiness is short-lived as his past returns to haunt him.

Name: Joker
Description: Babu has learned and perfected the art of being a clown and is promised the hand of Kamala, the circus owner's daughter. He loves Kamala, but Sudheer Mishra's arrival in the troupe changes everything.

Name: Sradha
Description: Ganga Prasad, a daring IPS officer, is on the trail of a terrorist group led by Lucifer Munna and Janisha. He soon attracts the affections of Swapna despite being happily married with a son.

Name: Satyam, Shivam, Sundaram
Description: Vijayalakshmi, a pauper, struggles for a living with her two brothers, who are visually impaired. However, her life changes when she finds out that she is actually a princess.

Name: Narasimham
Description: Induchoodan is wrongly implicated in a murder case. Later, his father is imprisoned for murdering his daughter and Induchoodan vows to prove his innocence.

Name: Millennium Stars
Description: Shiva and Shankar are wrongfully sent to prison as children where they meet a bully, Karunan. They escape and grow up to become popular singers. When the singing duo separates due to petty misunderstandings, Karunan tries to unite them.

Name: Veendum Chila Veettukaryangal
Description: Conflicts between a father and son, when the unemployed son brings his love to the family without the consent of the parents.

Name: Deepasthambham Mahascharyam
Description: Ramanandan (Dileep), a classical dancer, goes to perform in a function for a week at a rich man's mansion. There, one of the girls, Priya (Rasika) falls obsessively in love with him. However, Ramanandan is already in love with another girl (Jomol) waiting for him back at home.

Name: Chandranudikkunna Dikhil
Description: Dileep comes to a rural town to start his job as the local bank field officer. Through a series of events he meets and falls in love with Kavya there and plans to get married. But fate changes the course and outcome of their life and love.

Name: Ustaad
Description: A businessman tries to secure his sister's life from his old friend who is now his enemy.

Name: Vazhunnor
Description: The youngest son of a wealthy family falls in love with a teacher. Later, as their wedding approaches, a few businessmen arrive in town to settle old scores with the family, creating complications.

Name: Vasanthiyum Lakshmiyum Pinne Njaanum
Description: Watch the full movie, Vasanthiyum Lakshmiyum Pinne Njaanum, only on Eros Now. Vakkil Vasudev is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Vinayan and produced by Kabeer, Latheef, Vindhyan. The film stars Kalabhavan Mani, Kaveri, Praveena and Saikumar in lead roles. The film had musical score by Mohan Sithara.

Name: Ezhupunna Tharakan
Description: Sunny faces many challenges while trying to protect his family from the malevolent Lasar.

Name: Prem Poojari
Description: Prem comes to Madras to become a singer. However, in the beginning, he pretends to be a priest of the Namboothiri caste to find a place to live.

Name: Pattabhishekam
Description: Vishnu decides to go to a palace as a fake veterinary doctor to earn money so as to clear his debts. But he finds several problems coming his way.

Name: Udayapuram Sulthan
Description: A man is persuaded to attend a ceremony at the king's court after impressing people at a contest. The princess falls for him at the ceremony; but his luck runs out when the man he has been impersonating lands up at the palace as well.

Name: Njangal Santhushtaranu
Description: Story of a newly married couple, and their hilarious journey through love, ego, jealousy and pride.

Name: Pallavur Devanarayanan
Description: Deva Narayan is a Chenda (a drum) artist who has got personal problems in his life and ultimately he gets appreciated by everyone.

Name: Niram
Description: Two childhood friends realize their love for each other after being betrothed to different people.

Name: Crime File
Description: A nun is found dead in the well of the convent that she was residing in. The police suspect the death to be a murder. Untimely death of major suspects thickens the plot, and unlikely individuals enter the list of suspects.

Name: Mazhavillu
Description: When Vijay Krishan comes to meet his friend, Mahesh, he falls in love with his wife, Veena. Things take an ugly turn when Veena does not reciprocate to his feelings.

Name: Olympiyan Anthony Adam
Description: A police officer goes undercover in a school to find a criminal via his kin.

Name: Kannezhuthi Pottum Thottu
Description: Bhadra wants to take revenge against Natesan who had murdered her parents 15 years before.

Name: James Bond
Description: Five friends in hiding after their local business goes bankrupt stumble upon a baby that changes their lives.

Name: Thachiledathu Chundan
Description: Kochu Kunju decides to restore his village's honour by challenging their rivals to a boat race. He however, must face innumerable challenges in order to accomplish his mission.

Name: Vanaprastham
Description: An illicit relationship between a Kathakali dancer and a young woman from an upper caste family results in an illegitimate child. He faces hardships when she refuses to let him see their child.

Name: Marana Simhasanam
Description: A satire on political corruption and class injustices in Indian village culture.

Name: Megham
Description: Col. Ravi Varma Thampuran enters a village and falls in love with Meenakshi. But when he comes to know that Meenakshi has another love interest, forgetting his sadness, he tries to unite them against the opposition from their families.

Name: My Dear Karady
Description: A bear escapes from a zoo and the zookeeper has to bring it back to save his job. So he disguises himself as a bear and ventures in search of it.

Name: Friends
Description: The story of three friends from childhood and how their lives changes when one of them falls in love.

Name: Chandamama
Description: Three friends who find there boss dead trick everyone else into thinking he is alive in order to find the murderers. Malayalam remake of English movie "Weekend at Bernie's".

Name: Pathram
Description: Nandagopal, a newly joined associate editor with Keralareshmi, one of the leading dailies, is aggressive and daring. His closeness to belligerent Sekharan, who runs Jagratha creates conflicts within Nandagopal.

Name: Aakasha Ganga
Description: A woman is possessed by a vengeful spirit out to destroy her family.

Name: F.I.R
Description: A young journalist gets killed upon following the illegal activities of a corrupt politician. Police officer Mohammed Sarkar and his team set out to find the dark secrets behind the murder. Watch the full movie, F.I.R online, only on Eros Now.

Name: Chinthavishtayaya Shyamala
Description: Story of a wife who has to deal with her lazy, immature and irresponsible husband.

Name: Sreekrishnapurathe Nakshathrathilakkam
Description: Three out of four brothers of a Malayali household are happily married while the fourth brother is engaged. When the beautiful Yamuna Rani becomes their new neighbor, she poses a threat to the wives.

Name: Ayal Kadha Ezhuthukayanu
Description: It tracks the travails of wasted pulp fiction writer Sagar Kottapuram and his friend Ramakrishnan, who are dragged into a lawsuit by a vengeful Tahsildar S.Priyadarshini.

Name: Sundarakilladi
Description: A man is called up on by the people of a damned village, which is a desert with no water, to dig a well. Little does he know that each one who tried to dig a well has died.

Name: Kottaram Veettile Apputtan
Description: A local aristocrat takes a young girl under his wings and becomes her financial sponsor, and eventually falls in love with her.

Name: Kaikudunna Nilavu
Description: Mahi and his family shelters Veni after her grandfather's death. He also tries to find Veni's boyfriend who is missing.

Name: Meenathil Thalikettu
Description: 22 year old Omanakuttan who is even unable to finish his school ends up marrying a girl whose wedding he went to attend.

Name: Amma Ammayiamma
Description: Prabhavathy, a poor girl, forgets her family relations after marrying a rich businessman, Shekharankutty. However, Shekharankutty decides to make her realize the importance of family relationships.

Name: Sidhartha
Description: Sidharthan, a young man, resents his father and is not on talking terms with him, which constantly worries his mother. Things take a turn after Hema, a college student, enters Sidharthan's life.

Name: Mattupetti Machan
Description: Two competing aristocrats wants to get their respective daughters married to a millionaire, while two con-men make use of the situation. Confusion and chaos ensue.

Name: Pranayavarnangal
Description: Aarathy is a shy girl, who is silent, day-dreamer and loves poetry whereas Maya is her roommate and best friend who is naughty and plays pranks on hostel mates. Victor loves Aarathy, but is afraid to express his love. In an event, Maya comes to meet Vinayachandran and he praises her on listening to her poetry. Meanwhile Maya realizes that Ararthy has a crush on Vinayan. Seeing this as an opportunity to make Arathy come out of her shell, Maya compels her friend to write letters to Arathy posing as Vinayan. Aarathy truly falls in love with Vinayan, whereas he doesn't have a clue about this. Meanwhile, Maya's parents arranges her marriage with Vinayan. Both of them is interested in the marriage. Soon Maya forces Aarathy to forget Vinayan as she feels guilty and both the friends break up. With the help of Victor, Aarathy comes to meet Vinayan, but realises that he is getting married to Maya. Aarathy has a mental breakdown. Victor takes care of her. Vinayan visits her and tells her the truth and both the friends reunite

Name: Rektha Sakshikal Zindabad
Description: The revolt of two communist childhood friends turned leaders against capitalism, slavery and caste systems.

Name: Daya
Description: The film is set in the middle-East in the pre-Islam period. Daya, a very intelligent and brave slave girl tries to help the son of her master, after he loses all his wealth due to his lavish life.

Name: Harikrishnans
Description: Hari and Krishnan, a criminal lawyer duo, investigate the murder of Guptan.

Name: Mailpeelikkavu
Description: Manu realizes that he is the reincarnation of Krishnanunni, who was framed and executed for the murder of his lover Kuttimani sixty years ago. He tries to find the truth, along with convincing Gayathri, who is the reincarnation of Kuttimani.

Name: Summer in Bethlehem
Description: Ravishankar pretends to own the farmhouse of his friend Dennis when his relative, Col. Menon, pays a visit along with his granddaughters. Dennis and Ravishankar try to find Ravishankar's secret admirer among the girls.

Name: Punjabi House
Description: A debt-ridden man tries to commit suicide by drowning in the sea but he is rescued by two fishermen and ultimately he ends up working for a Punjabi household.

Name: Kanmadam
Description: Responsible for the accidental death of a man he met on the streets of Mumbai, Vishwam returns to Kerala to give the news to the latter's debt- ridden family, but instead falls in love with his sister.

Name: Oru Maravathoor Kanavu
Description: Michael and his family buy a farm that is coveted by a rich man, who makes life hell for him. Thereafter, Michael's brother, Chandy, comes to support him.

Name: The Truth
Description: Bharat, an IRS officer, heads a team to investigate the assassinated of a chief minister. With the help of IPS Meena Nambiar, he uncovers the shocking truth and exposes the mastermind.

Name: Aaram Thamburan
Description: Jagannathan, a mafia don in Bombay moves to Kanimangalam village. He wins the love of the locals, but finds trouble with a feudal lord, Appan Thamburan, after he decided to resume a traditional festival banned by Appan.

Name: Oru Yathramozhi
Description: Govindankutty seeks revenge against his father, who had abandoned his mother to become a rich trader. He comes across a wealthy man and becomes close to him, unaware that he is his father.

Name: Superman
Description: A young man with a tragic past tries to exact revenge by framing the men responsible.

Name: Aniyathi Pravu
Description: Mini and Sudhi elope as their families oppose their relationship. Before getting married, they decide to convince their parents, but fate has other plans.

Name: Oral Mathram
Description: A selfish Hareendran rents a house adjacent to the owner's, who lives happily with his three daughters. Hareendran's behavior changes when the owner absconds, leaving his daughters on their own.

Name: Irattakuttikalude Achan
Description: Rajeevan, a young man, elopes with a rich woman and leads a happy life. However, tragedy strikes when he gives away one of his newborn babies to a stranger and lies to his wife about it.

Name: The Car
Description: Mahadevan wins a new car as a prize which brings him a lot of bad luck.

Name: Kadhanayakan
Description: Padmanabhan, a wealthy man, cares for his family but is unaware of the fact that they are only with him for his money. He encounters a difficult situation when his estranged son asks to accept him.

Name: Kaliyoonjal
Description: Nandagopal raises his epileptic sister, Ammu, after their parents' death. He gets her married to Venu without telling him about her illness but it comes to light soon and creates problems for them.

Name: Mannadiar Penninu Chenkotta Checkan
Description: Aarcha, an arrogant woman from a wealthy family uses her brothers to control everything around her. Her life takes a turn when a new lawyer arrives in her village.

Name: Lelam
Description: Rivalry between two liquor business groups led by Anakkattil family and Kadayadi family in Kerala. Chackochi must fight to retain Anakkattil family's control in the business.

Name: Junior Mandrake
Description: A cursed little statue of a criminal don, which on receiving merrily brings curse to the whole family of the receiver, creates trouble within a family who once possessed deep pockets.

Name: Guru
Description: Situations turn a man who believes in secularism into an extremist. He plots to bomb a monastery where the survivors of a riot take refuge.

Name: Krishnagudiyil Oru Pranayakalathu
Description: Meenakshi is confused between the word her father had given to Akhilachandran and her love.

Name: Chandralekha
Description: An unemployed man saves a rich woman and takes her to the hospital where her relatives mistake him as her husband. He plays along as he needs money to repay a loan.

Name: The Play of God
Description: An adaptation of "Othello" set in the south Indian state of Kerala.

Name: Kilukil Pambaram
Description: Anadapadmanabhan is hired by the government as the caretaker of the palace and assets because the legal heirs are murdered and there is a dispute regarding the tenure. He must fight to make sure that the property is safe.

Name: Bhoothakkannadi
Description: Vidyadharan (Mammootty) is in jail and while working finds a link/hole to the outside world. But his vision is distorted through the eye magnifying lens he uses to view because of his fateful past.

Name: Varnapakittu
Description: Sunny Palomattam, a successful businessman in Singapore, enjoy his life with his girlfriend Sandra Valookaran. However, he is unaware that Sandra is a spy hired by his business rival Mohammed Ali.

Name: Sallapam
Description: Radha and Sasikumar fall in love with each other. However, her life takes a turn when he refuses to marry her because of his family problems.

Name: Thooval Kottaram
Description: When Mohanachandran helps a depressed Devaprabha start life anew, problems arise between him and his fiancee, Sujatha.

Name: Kaliveedu
Description: Mahesh, a perfectionist, and his wife, a carefree woman, decide to live separately. Mahesh tries to start a new life with another woman, but he realizes his love towards his wife.

Name: Ee Puzhayum Kadannu
Description: Anjali hates Gopi but eventually falls in love with him. However, she is unable to marry him as she has two sisters who are still single.

Name: Kalyana Sougandhikam
Description: Jayadevan pretends to be a Swami with the help of his friends to get into the house where Athira lives, who he believes holds the key to find his missing friend.

Name: Swapna Lokathe Balabhaskaran
Description: A womanizer with sleep walking issues gets married to a young girl, who starts to hate him after knowing him more.

Name: Dilliwala Rajakumaran
Description: Maya, the king's relative, is chosen as the heir to the throne but her father is against the idea owing to her fiance who looks after them. However, her uncle devises a plot to send her to the palace.

Name: Aramana Veedum Anjoorekkarum
Description: Malayalam film, directed by Anil Babu. The film stars Jayaram and Shobhana in lead roles.

Name: Kathapurushan
Description: Against the history of Kerala, we see a young man grow up without a father, relate to the working class people employed in his feudal household, become an intellectual, land in prison, and find a cure for the stuttering that afflicts him.

Name: Indraprastham
Description: Paul, a phony politician commits a murder and leaks out the video by morphing a famous actor Kiran's face onto it. When Chitra, a journalist, finds out about it, she sets out to reveal the truth.

Name: The Prince
Description: Jeeva, the son of a don, falls in love with Swarna, daughter of a famous Carnatic singer. However, he chooses to hide the truth about his family background to win her love.

Name: Kaalapani
Description: Govardhan, a doctor by profession, is wrongly accused of bombing a train and is jailed by the British in Cellular Jail, also known as Kala Pani, in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands. He witnesses the sufferings of hundreds of Indian prisoners there.

Name: Hitler
Description: The story of a protective brother and his five sisters.

Name: Devaraagam
Description: Vishnu and Lakshmi fall in love. But Lakshmi's father accepts a wedding proposal against her wish.

Name: Azhakiya Ravanan
Description: A millionaire (Mammootty) returns to his village without disclosing who he was in the village.

Name: Desadanam
Description: The emotional pangs a child and his parents go through when his grandfather agrees to him being selected to be the head of a genuine and distinguished Matha.

Name: Thacholi Varghese Chekavar
Description: Varghese, a Kalaripayattu master, kidnaps Maya from her house for Shyam as he believes Shyam is in love with her. However, he realizes later that she is the sole witness to a murder involving Shyam.

Name: Puthukkottayile Puthumanavalan
Description: Two performers who turn up for a temple festival get involved in a fued between rival families in the village of Puthukotta.

Name: Mannar Mathai Speaking
Description: The hilarious trio from 'Ramji Rao Speaking' faces fresh trouble when the heroine of their drama group quits.

Name: Aadyathe Kanmani
Description: Balachandran Unnithan (Jayaram) is a singer who falls in love with Ambika, a singer from his own troupe. They both end up getting married. Balachandran's family has been longing for a male child to inherit the family's wealth, but his elder brothers were having only female children. Ambika gets pregnant. Balachandran realizes that his wife is carrying a daughter, and not a son. Later, he meets his old classmate and best friend, Padmarajan, whose wife Hema was also pregnant. She was bearing a male child. However, their babies were swapped by mistake by Balu's mother soon after delivery. Both Padmarajan and Balu must keep this as a secret to see their children. When Balu's cousins discover this, the babies get kidnapped by the antagonists.

Name: Nirnnayam
Description: A cardiac surgeon becomes a fugitive after he is accused of his wife's murder, and must find the real killer before the cops find him.

Name: Vrudhanmare Sookshikkuka
Description: Two thieves impersonate themselves into oldsters to run away from their issues and problems.

Name: Aniyan Bava Chetan Bava
Description: Two cousins fall in love with the same guy, who is now trapped between their respective fathers, and two weddings at the same time.

Name: Agnidevan
Description: Control over a newspaper, causes a family to split apart and have problems.

Name: Tom & Jerry
Description: A man's quest for his father is thwarted many times by criminals of various stamps.

Name: The King
Description: On learning that an elected representative in the parliament is corrupted and involved in many crimes, Joseph Alex, an IAS officer, decides to expose his misdeeds in front of the public.

Name: No: 1 Sneha Theeram Bangalore North
Description: Vijaya's children Sudhi and Anu meet Maya, who they mistakenly believe to be their mother. On Vijaya's insistence, she agrees to pretend. He also tells her that they are orphans and he is their uncle. Watch the full movie No.1 Snehatheeram Bangalore North online, only on Eros Now.

Name: Oru Abhibhashakante Case Diary
Description: A domestic help is found dead in a pond. Unni Thampuran is convicted on the basis of a forced confession. Aniyan Kuruvilla(Mammootty) reopens the case on the basis of his private investigation to bring justice to the wrongly accused.

Name: Mazhayethum Munpe
Description: A young woman falls in love with her college professor, while the professor wants to marry his sick childhood love.

Name: Spadikam
Description: A small-town criminal constantly clashes with his strict school headmaster father at the expense of their family lives.

Name: Maanthrikam
Description: A noted rocket scientist is kidnapped by terrorists. Two spys reach a small village in search of him.

Name: High Way
Description: Sreedhar Prasad, a RAW officer, disguises himself to investigate a bomb blast that killed 30 college students. Soon, he befriends a police officer and uncovers disturbing details.

Name: Pakshe
Description: Balachandran who had to sacrifice his childhood love (Shobhana), to marry into a rich family who only wanted his IAS Status, in order to save his poor family, lives a life of regret and despair for his decision.

Name: Minnaram
Description: Bobby leads a carefree life until his former lover arrives at his place with a baby girl claiming she is his daughter. However, Bobby must find the truth behind her claims.

Name: Pavithram
Description: A young man's relationship with his career, fiancee and brother is brought under stress by the birth of an unexpected sister.

Name: Commissioner
Description: Bharathchandran, a police commissioner committed to his duty, exposes the criminal links of a Delhi-based business tycoon, who has criminal activities running in the country with the help of certain politicians and police officers.

Name: CID Unnikrishnan B.A., B.Ed.
Description: Three trainee CID's (Unnikrishnan, Prem Shankar, Ommen Koshy) all compete against each other to solve the same case in order to get a job at a local detective agency (Secret Files Ltd.).

Name: Parinayam
Description: A 17-year-old widow, Unnimaya, who was married to an old man, is ostracized by the community. She falls in love with Madhavan, a Kathakali artist, but problems arise when she becomes pregnant.

Name: Kashmeeram
Description: A group of terrorists kills the Indian Home Secretary Rajan Varma's nephew. NSG Officer Shyam is appointed to protect Rajan's sister Usha and her daughter.

Name: Pingami
Description: Captain Vijay forms a bond with Kumaran, a severely injured man. However, when he dies, Vijay decides to investigate and ends up finding answers related to his life.

Name: Malappuram Haji Mahanaya Joji
Description: As Kunjalikutty's father disapproves of his Dubai job, he leaves without informing his family. He then persuades his friend Joji to impersonate him and take his job at a village school.

Name: Vadhu Doctoranu
Description: Unable to become a doctor, Sidharthan ends up becoming an electrician and later gets married to a doctor. However, after the wedding, he finds out that his wife is a veterinarian.

Name: Pidakkozhi Koovunna Noottandu
Description: A lady, who hates men due to a failed love affair, is running a paying guest accommodation center, where only those women who hate men can stay. But their lives change when they all fall in love.

Name: Sukrutham
Description: Ravishankar, a journalist suffering from blood cancer, falls into depression and loses all hopes of living. However, his life changes for the better when he meets a doctor friend.

Name: Manathe Vellitheru
Description: Shobhana plays a pop star who gets stalked by an obsessive fan (Vineeth).

Name: Sagaram Sakshi
Description: Balachandran, a business tycoon, marries Nirmala, who is from a rich family. However, when Balachandran loses his business, the couple must deal with bankruptcy and a poor lifestyle.

Name: Sainyam
Description: Indian Air Force officer Group Captain Eashwar and Wing Commander Zakir get engaged in a project called Red Alert. In the meantime, some terrorists try to steal the project's secrets.

Name: Swaham
Description: The owner of a little tea house in a remote Indian village dies in an accident. The family, wife, son and daughter, get into financial troubles. Their only hope, it seems, is getting the son into the army. But this is expensive...

Name: Kabooliwala
Description: Kannas and Kadalas are rag pickers who enjoy life to the fullest. Their lives take a turn when they meet Munna, who comes in search of his bugle that was stolen by them.

Name: Ponthan Mada
Description: Set in 1940s, the low-caste Ponthan Mada bonds with his colonial landlord Sheema Thampuran, who was expelled to British India from England during his youth for supporting the Irish Republican Army.

Name: Vidheyan
Description: Thommy is a loyal servant of Bhaskar Patel. But Patel is a ruthless tyrant. Thommy struggles between his moral sense and his professional sense. He is finally redeemed without compromising his duty as Patel's servant.

Name: Thenmavin Kombath
Description: Srikrishnan and his best friend, Manickam falls in love with the same girl, a village performer, Srikrishnan turns out more intent on having her for himself.

Name: Gandharvam
Description: Sam Alex falls in love with Sridevi, but her family will stop at nothing to make sure to keep the couples apart.

Name: Midhunam
Description: An enterprising entrepreneur wants to start a biscuit factory but the bureaucratic corruption and the problems in his dysfunctional family constantly pose hurdles in his plans.

Name: Meleparambil Aanveedu
Description: A young man marries a Tamil girl, and fearing his family, he brings her to the house as a servant. Problem starts when his elder brothers falls for her too.

Name: Chenkol
Description: The sequel to Kireedam (1989), Chenkol continues the story of Sethumadavan who hopes to regain his lost life after 8 years in prison.

Name: Paithrukam
Description: The ideological clash between a devout Brahmin priest and his atheist son wrecks their family.

Name: Sthalathe Pradhana Payyans
Description: Govinda Menon and Nambiar are the opposition leaders. Gopalakrishnan is selected as a party candidate for the slums but, then he comes to know that Nambiar is using him.

Name: Butterflies
Description: Two friends crosses path with a seemingly eccentric girl, who has a terrible past.

Name: Ekalavyan
Description: Swami Amoorthananda is involved in narcotics and is responsible for the death of few innocent people. The CBI hires police officer Madhavan to investigate the cases against Amoorthananda.

Name: Kalippattam
Description: A poor man gets a chance to turn his life when his wealthy employer's terminally ill daughter decides to marry him.

Name: Maya Mayuram
Description: Nanda happiness is short lived as her fiance dies in an accident. However, a ray of hope strikes through the gloom as she meets the twin brother of him.

Name: Manichitrathazhu
Description: When a forbidden room in an old bungalow is unbolted, the spirit of a vengeful dancer is unleashed.

Name: Golanthara Vartha
Description: The film revolves around an active social worker, Rameshan Nair. He was leading a happy family life but problems begin when a girl enters his life.

Name: Padheyam
Description: A poet reconnects with his long-estranged daughter.

Name: Mafia
Description: A journalist and aspiring policeman realises that his brother has been killed by conspirers. Later, he teams up with the rivals of his brother's culprits to bring them down and avenge his death.

Name: Akashadoothu
Description: On discovering she has terminal stage leukemia, a widow tries to find suitable foster homes for her four children.

Name: Jackpot
Description: Gowtham Krishna (Mammootty) and Sindhu (Aishwarya) get married opposing her rich parents' disapproval. Sindhu dies after giving birth to their son Rahul (Tejas Kapadia). The rich parents of Sindhu take custody of the child and Gowtham Krishna is left with the only option of winning a horse race to get back the custody of his child.

Name: Devasuram
Description: Neelakandan squanders away the inheritance left by his father. However, his life turns upside down when his mother reveals a terrible secret on her deathbed that changes the course of his life.

Name: Vatsalyam
Description: Raghavan, a farmer, devotes his life to ensure that his brother Vijayakumaran gets educated. But with time and under the influence of his rich wife, Vijayakumaran ends up destroying all relationships.

Name: Dhruvam
Description: Narasimha Mannadiar is a village lord famous for his thirst for justice and fearlessness. Hyder Marakkar, a notorious criminal awaiting capital punishment has means to prevent it. Mannadiar must battle to ensure that justice is prevailed.

Name: Kamaladalam
