Description: A man accepts a challenge to act as the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu for one day only, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

Name: Taj Mahal
Description: Maayan sees Machakanni on the day of her engagement and both fall for each other. Incidentally her engagement is broken off. But, the enmity between their villages and family threatens their romance.

Name: Unakkaga Ellam Unakkaga
Description: Sakthi tries to sabotage his marriage arranged by his father but gets a huge shock when the girl turns out to be the one he loves.

Name: Minsara Kanna
Description: Indira hates men and only employs women in her company and personal staff. Kaasi enters her life as a driver and soon, one by one, his entire family is employed in her house, with a desired motive.

Name: Jodi
Description: Kannan's father is against love marriage. Kannan loves Gayatri, whose father was once a great music critic. Both decide to win the hearts of each others family and only marry with their consent.

Name: Nee Varuvai Ena
Description: A man who has big dreams about his marriage is involved in an accident and loses his eye sight. But in a twist of fate, he gets an eye for transplant from another man who died in the crash.

Name: Poovellam Kettuppar
Description: A young couple needs to get the rivalry between their families sorted out so that they can get married with full consent of their parents.

Name: Sangamam
Description: After initial disagreements, a classical dancer and a rural folk artist charm each other and fall in love. However, they face issues when the girl's father disapproves of their relationship.

Name: Nenjinile
Description: Unable to find a job, Karunakaran decides to work as a henchman for a gangster. But he is forced to fight against his own gang when they hatch a plan to kill his lover Nisha and her parents.

Name: Anantha Poongattre
Description: Jeeva loves Meena, a widow with a son, and respects her even more when he learns about her past. However, Jeeva is forced to marry Divya as her father kidnaps Meena's son in order to threaten Jeeva.

Name: Vaalee
Description: A young bride finds an unusual antagonist in her husband's twin brother.

Name: Padaiyappa
Description: The death of Padaiyappa's father destroys his family. But his luck changes, and he is able to lead a prosperous life, until his nemesis plots to ruin his happiness once more.

Name: Endrendrum Kadhal
Description: On a business trip to Switzerland, Vijay meets Meenu and decides to get married to her. Meenu's brother Nagaraj asks Vijay to leave India and get settled in Switzerland with his family.

Name: En Swasa Katre
Description: Arun, a computer hacker and a thief, decides to change his ways when he falls in love. When his brother blackmails him into a life of crime, he is forced to choose between family and love.

Name: Amarkalam
Description: A crook is asked by an ex-gang leader to hold the commissioner's daughter captive for two days to ruin the family's honor. The girl while captive falls in love with the crook, but he rejects her.

Name: Unnai Thedi
Description: Raghu meets Malavika in New Zealand. While on a road trip to Christchurch, they get close. Upon arriving they don't reveal their feelings for each other. Will they ever meet again? Will they express their feelings?

Name: Thulladha Manamum Thullum
Description: Kutty is a good-hearted soul, but unfortunate incidents tend to portray his ruffian side whenever he encounters the girl he loves. A bizarre incident brings them closer and yet keeps them apart.

Name: House Full
Description: A story about a bomb placed in a theater in a slum and the lives of a small group of people living near it.

Name: Thodarum
Description: Family and personal life is messed up for a cool dude, when suddenly his possessive wife doubts/links up a relationship with a girl from his office.

Name: Periyanna
Description: A prisoner falls in love with the district collector's daughter while giving her music lessons. Fearing opposition, they elope to a village and befriend the village chief who vows to get them married.

Name: Uyirode Uyiraha
Description: A terminally ill young man spends his time ignoring girls. A girl, in order to win his affection, lies to him that she is terminally ill. When she learns the truth about him, she marries him anyway.

Name: Kannethirey Thondrinal
Description: Family opposition to a couple's coming together forms the basis for this standard love story.

Name: The Terrorist
Description: A young female terrorist goes on a suicide assassination mission, but her resolve to complete it is put to the test.

Name: Nilaave Vaa
Description: Siluvai, a Christian boy, falls in love with Sangeetha, a Hindu girl who is engaged to Raghuvaran. Her father doesn't want to accept the Hindu-Christian marriage, but Raghuvaran decides to unite them.

Name: Unnidathil Ennai Koduthen
Description: Selvam and Bhaskar, two thieves with good intentions, hide with the help of Radha who is an illegitimate child living with his father's family in the guise of a maid.

Name: Sandhippoma
Description: Two friends, who've known each other for a while, fall in love. But, their relationship is thrown in turmoil when the boy's father is in the news for a secret relationship.

Name: Natpukkaga
Description: A rich man's daughter accuses a loyal servant of attempting to rape her and sends him out of the house. However, she later reveals that she had falsely accused him as she had hated his father

Name: Priyamudan
Description: Vasanth, a wealthy businessman, falls in love with Priya during his visit to Rajasthan. To woo Priya, he impersonates a man named Vasanth Kumar who had saved her life before.

Name: Aval Varuvala
Description: Simran a widow lives with her mother in law, Ajith fell in love with Simran. When they are about to get married, her ex-husband who is very arrogant comes back alive. At last whether they married or not is the story line.

Name: Jeans
Description: The father of twin brothers wants to get them married to only twin sisters. But one of the brothers falls in love with a woman does not have a twin sister.

Name: Ninaithen Vandhai
Description: Gokulan sees an attractive girl in his dream and is determined to find her. However, his father gets him engaged to another girl. Complications arise when he meets the woman of his dream soon after.

Name: Kaathala Kaathala
Description: Two friends, both with the name of Lingam, create a comedy of errors and consequent chaos with their girlfriends and their families.

Name: Kadhal Mannan
Description: Shiva, a mechanic, is dared to go to Delhi by a woman to deliver a letter to her soon-to-be-engaged sister, Thilothama. But Shiva ends up falling in love with the latter woman.

Name: Kaadhale Nimmadhi
Description: An archaeologist gets involved in a situation where the brother of a girl holds him captive because he suspects him to be the girl's lover. Although he escapes, he is soon arrested for her kidnap.

Name: Kadhalukku Mariyadhai
Description: Jeeva loves Mini but her three brothers end up beating him every time he meets her. The couple decides to elope against their parents' wishes.

Name: Ratchakan
Description: Ajay, a short tempered young man falls in love with soniya daughter of a bigshot. Things take a turn for the worse when soniya's father puts a condition that Ajay has to control his temper for 3 months while working in his company.

Name: Aahaa
Description: Shriram is a fun-loving man while his elder brother Raghu is mature and responsible. However, after Shriram finds out a dark secret about his brother, he sacrifices himself to save Raghu.

Name: Nerukku Ner
Description: Shanti decides to divorce her husband, Raghu, when he confesses about his affair with another woman. This decision sparks a fight between Vijay, Raghu's brother, and Surya, Shanti's brother.

Name: Pagaivan
Description: Prabhu, the son of an honest police officer lands up a job but on the condition that would make him cough up 50,000 rupees. To get over the situation he kidnaps the daughter of a minister but falls in love.

Name: Suryavamsam
Description: Sakthivel is upset with his son Chinnarasu's careless attitude. He is further infuriated when Chinnarasu refuses to marry Gowri. Then he meets Nandini, who seems to turn around his life.

Name: Once More
Description: Vijay, a guy with a careless attitude, gets Selvam, a senior home inmate, to act as his dad for an important business deal. Gradually, both help each other through their own experiences and problems.

Name: Ullaasam
Description: Two boys grow up being influenced by each other's respective fathers. While one becomes a singer, the other becomes a local goon. Incidentally, both love the same girl in college.

Name: Love Today
Description: Ganesh is obsessively in love with Sandhya, but she is not interested in him. His relentless pursuit leads to a lot of problems. However, everything changes the day he loses his father in an accident.

Name: Pistha
Description: A spoiled young heiress marries a poor man in order to inherit her grandfather's property.

Name: Raasi
Description: Kumar is in love with his uncle's daughter Meena. Problems arise between the two families during a family function and the lovers end up parting ways as they are helpless.

Name: Arunachalam
Description: The movie revolves around Arunachalam (Rajini), who is the son of the VIP of a village who finds out about his past but destiny has its own play.

Name: Nesam
Description: When a bank manager refuses Nathan a loan for his business, Nathan starts romancing his daughter, hoping that might help. Although he really falls for her, Madhu dumps him when she learns the truth.

Name: Iruvar
Description: A struggling actor and a writer-politician become friends as young men and rise to great heights in cinema and politics respectively. But when both become contenders for the top political post in the state, a rift develops between them.

Name: Kaalamellam Kaathiruppen
Description: Rich boy Kannan hears Manimekalai sing in a temple and falls in love with her. But all his attempts to befriend her only earn her wrath. Now, he must try to win her back amidst her hatred.

Name: Minsaara Kanavu
Description: Thomas loves Priya from their high school days but is afraid to confess. So he resorts to his friend Deva, to convince Priya. However, a tricky situation arises when Priya falls in love with Deva.

Name: Ullathai Allitha
Description: A young man runs away from home when his strict father arranges for him to marry a girl he does not like. With the help of a friend, he hatches a scheme to kidnap a girl, who turns out to be the same one his father had chosen for him.

Name: Vaanmathi
Description: Krishna belongs to a middle-class family and his father does not have a very good reputation. Krishna falls in love with Vaanmathi, the daughter of a rich businesswoman who is against the alliance.

Name: Mettukudi
Description: A man pretends to be the son of a long-lost royal family to steal a precious sword. However, his plan runs into complications when Indhu, the sword's guardian's granddaughter, falls in love with him.

Name: Kalki
Description: Chellammaa,is a singer by profession. She gets married to a male chauvinist pig who insults and humiliates her, because she can't have a child. Will her fate change?

Name: Selva
Description: Selva befriends Kamini, daughter of a minister, who has just moved into his colony. When a terrorist group kidnaps her, Selva rescues her, but ends up paying a price for it.

Name: Avvai Shanmugi
Description: A man disguises himself as a nanny to be with his daughter after his divorce.

Name: Mr
Description: When Romeo threatens to expose a kidney scam, the perpetrator tries to kill him. He is saved by tribal people and returns to reveal the truth but finds that a lookalike has replaced him.

Name: Kadhal Kottai
Description: Kamali loses her bag in the railway station. Later, her bag is sent to her home, along with a letter from Surya, who found it. Kamali and Surya send letters to each other and soon fall in love.

Name: Minor Mappillai
Description: Govindaswamy enlists the help of two crooks in order to seek revenge from his rival who constantly humiliates him.

Name: Indian
Description: A veteran freedom fighter enraged with the rising crime and corruption in the society murders all the wrong doers one by one using an ancient martial arts technique.

Name: Maanbumigu Maanavan
Description: Shiva a happy-go-lucky guy helps two of his best friends get married, much to the dismay of their parents. When the girl gets raped by Madan, Shiva and his friends seek to bring him to justice.

Name: Vasantha Vaasal
Description: Vijay and Divya have different ambitions in life. While he aspires to become an actor, she hates acting career and wants to excel in academics. He also discovers that her uncle is forcing her to act.

Name: Kalloori Vaasal
Description: Sathya and Vasanth are two best pals since their childhood. An employee of Sathya's mother wants his daughter to get married to Sathya. He has selfish motives behind this desire.

Name: Poove Unakkaga
Description: When a man realizes that the Hindu woman he loves is in love with a Christian man, he decides to sacrifice his love and unite their families so as to make the love story a success.

Name: Coimbatore Mappillai
Description: Balu comes to the city and stays with his friend. He falls in love with Sumithra, his landlord. But her evil cousin Mahesh, who has an eye on her, creates a rift between them.

Name: Love Birds
Description: Mridula relocates abroad as she is devastated after her lover Arun's death. However, she accidentally meets a man who looks exactly like Arun and sets out to divulge his true identity.

Name: Raasaiyya
Description: A poor boy is a loyal servant in a rich household. But the granddaughter of the patriarch thinks that he is dishonest. The misunderstanding clears up and they fall in love only to face a new problem.

Name: Muthu
Description: The movie is about a loyal servant, Muthu (Rajni), working for Zamindar Malayasimman (Sarath Babu) and the cunning plans by the uncle of Malasimman to capture the whole wealth which uncovers some mystery about Muthu.

Name: Kuruthipunal
Description: Suave and scintillating, this fast-paced action thriller follows the adventures and investigations of a group of honest police officers, who go undercover to bring down a terror network.

Name: Chandralekha
Description: An orthodox Brahmin girl falls in love with a Muslim boy, Rahim, but their families don't accept it. Meanwhile, the lovers try to elope and are caught by militants in the forest.

Name: Aasai
Description: A young woman's brother-in-law is infatuated with her and pulls out all the stops to destroy her love affair with another young man.

Name: Rajavin Parvaiyile
Description: Gowri, daughter of a rich man, loves Raja. But, he keeps avoiding her. He stopped believing in love after his dear friend met with a tragic end due to a failed affair. Will Raja ever change his mind?

Name: Indira
Description: A village belle stands up for the rights of her neighbors in the rivalry between villages.

Name: Lucky Man
Description: A book that belongs to the Hindu god of death, Yamadharman, accidentally drops to earth. Getting Back the Book is the Story.

Name: Bombay
Description: A Hindu man and a Muslim woman fall in love in a small village and move to Mumbai, where they have two children. However, growing religious tensions and erupting riots threaten to tear the family apart.

Name: Deva
Description: Two lovers, Deva and Bharadhi, face a lot of opposition from the girl's father. But ultimately, they overcome these problems and get married.

Name: Sathi Leelavathi
Description: Arun (Ramesh Arvind), bored of his wife's (Leelavathi) looks and weighty appearance, meets Priya and develops an affair with her. But his wife has other plans.

Name: Baashha
Description: An auto driver, Manikam, desperately tries to hide his dark underworld side to keep his promise to his father.

Name: Sethupathi I.P.S
Description: Sethupathi I.P.S. catches terrorist Sivasubramaniam who reveals there is a planning of terrorist strike on Prime minister which leads danger to his own family.

Name: Nattamai
Description: A wealthy man is known and revered for his just nature all over the region. His brother is married to an arrogant girl while there are others who are continuously plotting against this family.

Name: Pudhiya Mannargal
Description: Sathyamurti, Vidya and four others are college friends. When one of their friends is killed by the CM, Vidya witnesses the murder. Later, she commits suicide after being raped for going to the police.

Name: Karuththamma
Description: In a village where female infanticide is widely practiced, a young woman fights for justice after her sister and her newborn child are both murdered.

Name: Nammavar
Description: A new professor cleans up a crime-ridden college

Name: Pavithra
Description: A young patient who is suffering from cancer is shown maternal love and affection by the nurse who tends to him. However trouble begins when her husband mistakes her affection for the patient to be something else.

Name: Kaadhalan
Description: Prabhu, a college student, falls in love with Shruthi, a governor's daughter. On knowing about their love affair, her father imprisons Prabhu and forbids him to meet Shruthi.

Name: May Madham
Description: A young girl, bored of her life being scheduled by her dad embarks on an adventurous trip to Madras to only find her life upside down.

Name: Rasigan
Description: Vijay and Anitha secretly love each other but are unable to confess their love for each other. Her father realises this and tries to separate the two. However, fate has other plans in store.

Name: Jai Hind
Description: Following the death of his brother in a terrorist attack, Bharath, a policeman, promises to his mother that he will resign. But spurred by patriotism, he sets out to capture the terrorists.

Name: Duet
Description: 2 brothers are part of a successful music band. When both the brothers fall in love with the same girl, the plot thickens.

Name: Magalir Mattum
Description: Three female employees are fed up with their lecherous boss, and they come up with a plan to get even. Unfortunately, he ends up in the hospital and they are stuck with the dead body of a terrorist.

Name: Paasamalargal
Description: In order to earn goodwill, a businessman adopts 6 orphan girls. After the initial friction, he does warm up to them. Meanwhile, a young girl falls in love with him. All goes well till tragedy strikes.

Name: Mahanadhi
Description: An innocent man is framed in a financial scam and imprisoned. After his release, he learns that his daughter was sold into prostitution and he struggles to free her.

Name: Amaidhi Padai
Description: An ambitious and unscrupulous man becomes a major politician using unethical means, but his illegitimate son is posted as police inspector in his constituency and vows to stop his father's illegal activities.

Name: Veera
Description: A talented musician from a village migrates to a city, becomes popular and marries the daughter of a music company owner. But then his first wife, whom he presumed dead, turns up and his life becomes complicated.

Name: Uzhaippaali
Description: A stage actor is hired by three cunning brothers of a wealthy woman to pretend to be her son in an attempt to usurp her wealth. Will they succeed in their vicious plan?

Name: Marupadiyam
Description: Marupadiyum is an emotional and psychological drama that focuses on the central female protagonist, a wife caught up in marital discord played by Revathi and her life henceforth. Revathi is married to Ravi, a movie director who has an extra marital affair with his star heroine, played by Rohini. Revathi discovers this intimacy between her husband and Rohini but is treated with indifference by her husband. Ravi moves on to get a divorce from Revathi. Revathi pleads with Ravi not to proceed with the divorce and asks Rohini to leave her husband but both disagree to do so. Arvind Swamy, a stranger, helps and befriends Revathi after she leaves her husband. Rohini faces mental anguish as she feels guilty with another woman's husband and becomes psychologically affected. Ravi ends up in dilemma between his wife and his lover. (Aravind Swamy) turns into a dependable friend and asks Revathi to marry him but Revathi has to choose her own path.[2]

Name: Walter Vetrivel
Description: The story of a police officer who punishes his younger brother for his involvement in malpractices and hands him over to the authorities.

Name: Sendhoorapandi
Description: Vijay falls in love with Meena. But Meena's brother opposes their marriage due to rivalry between both the families. Sendoorapandi returns from jail and tries to help his brother to win his love.

Name: Thiruda Thiruda
Description: An Inspector is assigned to track down a large sum of stolen money. His investigations lead him to a couple of small time crooks, a village belle, a murder, an absconding suspect, and an international drug dealer.

Name: Kizhakku Seemayile
Description: A brother and sister share a close bond with each other. When the sister gets married, her husband dislikes the bond, due to which problems arise between the couple.

Name: Valli
Description: Velu is not educated; he falls in love with Valli who is educated. She does not love him and falls for Saker-a boy who comes from the city. He uses her then leaves. Will Valli accept Velu's love now?

Name: Gentleman
Description: Due to a past tragedy , a small business owner by day becomes modern day Robin Hood by night takes from the rich to provide education for the poor.

Name: Amaravathi
Description: Amravathi is a naive girl who runs away from home. She finds shelter in a kind-hearted man's house where she is well taken care of. Her life takes a turn when Arjun falls in love with her.

Name: Pudhiya Mugam
Description: A man's heroic acts land him in the Indian army. He gets married and eventually reaches a high-ranking post. Unbeknownst to his wife and son, he was once an assassin linked to Sri Lankan terrorists.

Name: Kalaignan
Description: A popular pop star gets stalked by a serial killer and gets framed up.

Name: Maharasan
Description: Selvi falls in love with Vadivelu, a butcher. Realising that Vadivelu has to get his sister married first, Selvi helps him to find an ideal life partner for his sister.

Name: Ejamaan
Description: Movie revolves around Vanavarayan (Rajni), a feudal chieftain of a village, his rivalry with Vallavarayan (Nepolean) and his love with Vaitheeswari (Meena).

Name: Vaaname Ellai
Description: Vaaname Ellai is a 1992 Indian Tamil language drama film directed by K. Balachander starring Anand Babu, Ramya Krishnan, Madhoo, Vishali Kannadasan, Rajesh and Babloo Prithviraj.

Name: Naalaiya Theerpu
Description: Srividya is molested by her husband Radharavi. Radharavi has affairs with many other women. Srividya has a son, whom she raises on her own. However, things change when her son grows up.

Name: Thevar Magan
Description: The urbane son of a village chieftain struggles between his personal aspirations and those of his family.

Name: Pandian
Description: Pandiyan is a police officer whose sister's husband goes missing. In order to find him and catch the culprits, he goes undercover.

Name: Roja
Description: A woman from a village in Tamil Nadu marries a sophisticated city dweller and moves with him to Kashmir, where all is rosy - until he gets kidnapped by militants.

Name: Annamalai
Description: A class-divided friendship goes through highs and lows through several decades.

Name: Singaaravelan
Description: Singaaravelan (Kamal Hassan) living in a village with his mother who was accused of the demise of her brother and sister-in-law. Now, he sets on course to remove the stains on his mother's name.

Name: Mannan
Description: Mannan is a 1992 Indian Tamil-language film directed by P. Vasu. The film stars Rajinikanth, Vijayashanti, Kushboo, Manorama, Pandari Bai, Goundamani, and Visu. It is a remake of the 1986 Kannada film Anuraga Aralithu.

Name: Gopura Vasalile
Description: Manohar, a schoolteacher, leads a dull and unexciting life after the death of his lover. Fortunately, his life takes a new turn when his friends give him a reason to live and love once again.

Name: Chinna Gounder
Description: The village head is a man who sticks to honesty while making judgements. However, when he falls prey to a conspiracy, he bravely fights to ensure that justice prevails in his village.

Name: Dharma Durai
Description: A man has to negotiate his brother's antagonism before he can become a doctor.

Name: Azhakan
Description: Three women, four children, and many more people besides have deep love for a hotel owner, yet choosing the right partner for this man takes some doing.

Name: Guna
Description: A neurodivergent individual escapes the family he despises and the asylum he is kept in by creating fantasies.

Name: Idhayam
Description: A village boy who comes to town to study Medicine, falls in love with a city girl, but never discloses his love.

Name: Captain Prabhakaran
Description: Prabhakaran, a sincere police officer, is assigned to find Veerabhadran, a sandalwood smuggler around Tamilnadu-Karnataka border. On his mission he unfolds the mystery of Veerabhadran and finds the true culprits behind his actions.

Name: Chinna Thambi
Description: A rich girl is guarded by her possessive brothers due to an astrologer's prediction, that she will marry a man from a lower caste, against their wishes. Can they stop the wheels of fate?

Name: Chatriyan
Description: When his daughter's life is endangered by a local gang, Joseph Kuruvilla will do whatever it takes to stop them. However, at the same time, his dangerous past slowly resurfaces

Name: Adisaya Piravi
Description: Kaalayan is killed by goons. In heaven, he opposes and gets sent back in the body of Balu, who has enemies in the form of greedy relatives. Now, he has to fix Balu's life as well as his own.

Name: Pulan Visaaranai
Description: Dharma, an auto driver, works for RR, an influential politician, and kidnaps young women. Investigating officer DCP Raj, who was earlier suspended due to political pressure, must bring him to justice.

Name: Nadigan
Description: A man in desperate need of money decides to disguise himself as an old man to teach two young women. He falls in love with one of the them and simultaneously romances their guardian.

Name: Michael Madana Kama Rajan
Description: A comedy of errors with identical quadruplets, separated at birth, coming together as adults.

Name: My Dear Marthandan
Description: Marthandan lives with his parents in a palace. He sets out to Chennai to find a girl. There he meets "Idea Mani" (Goundamani), who is very cunning and tries to make money from the innocent Marthandan in comical ways. He meets a girl (Kushboo) in a bakery and befriends her. The rest of the story is about how he tries to win her over and how he understands the value of money.

Name: Keladi Kanmani
Description: The movie begins with the love-hate relationship between Anu (Anju) and Sasi (Ramesh Aravind). We also see that Anu is a motherless child, reared by an understanding father, A.R.R (S.P. Balasubrahmanyam). As the relationship between Anu and Sasi gradually blossoms into love, Anu's intuition tells her that something is going to go wrong. True to her feelings, she is diagnosed with a terminal disease. After coming to terms with the fact that death is at her doorstep, Anu expresses her last wish to Sasi. She wants to find Sharada (Radhika), who once wanted to marry her father A.R.R (S.P. Balasubrahmanyam), but had to part ways because of Anu's stubbornness. Sasi leaves no stone unturned in finding Sharada. Secretly everyone hopes that Anu will survive. But will she?

Name: Anjali
Description: After a few years, Chitra learns that her child, who was believed to be dead, is alive but is suffering from a mental illness. However, her family faces many challenges while looking after her child.

Name: Mounam Sammadham
Description: Sundaram is charged with the murder of his brother's wife. But everyone believes he is innocent. His lawyer asks Raja, an eminent lawyer from Delhi, to take his case and Raja accepts it.

Name: En Veedu En Kanavar
Description: When Gayathri kills her husband after a troubled married life, her best friend Radha also decides to test whether or not her husband loves her.

Name: Arangetra Velai
Description: Three unemployed people - two men and one woman - find the answer to their money problems when they receive a call from a kidnapper through a cross connection.

Name: Panakkaran
Description: The illegitimate son of a rich man and a singer is raised by a poor drunkard. Before he can commit to the girl he loves, he wants to find out who his parents really are. Will the drunkard help him?

Name: Karagattakaran
Description: Two folk dancers fall in love in rural Tamil Nadu.

Name: Pudhu Pudhu Arthangal
Description: A singer (Bharathi) who is tricked into marriage by his mother-in-law, his wife (Gowri )is enormously possessive about his fame and his female fans. One day they encounter into a fight and he decides escape from home. On the way he meets someone in the bus who is also running from her life as a dancer because her husband forcefully lets her to prostitution. They both experience some random incidents together and meet an one old couple, who are still very much enjoying love and life. Eventually the old couple dies, and by watching the couple they fall in love themselves. Then Bharathi get a prank call from his PA that Gowri is ill so he returns back to home town with Jyothi. Gowri finds him with another woman and gets furious. She files for a divorce, informs media about Jyothi. Jyothi's husband gets this news comes to find Jyothi. One thing led to another Gowri finally become mentally unstable because of her own decisions. Bharathi visits her in the mental hospital with Jyothi. Jyothi then understands that Gowri really needs Bharathi and they belong to each other, Jyothi leaves Bharathi with her. Jyothi's husband becomes a cripple and understands his mistakes, reunites with jyothi in the end.

Name: Mappilai
Description: After a poor man marries a rich woman, he has to contend with his rich, arrogant mother-in-law.

Name: Vetri Vizha
Description: An amnesiac trying to put his life back together is increasingly suspicious of his own past.

Name: Raja Chinna Roja
Description: An aspiring young wannabe actor Raja (Rajinikanth) from a village get into a fast city which is full of crooks and drug dealers. As he searching for a place in the dream factory, he falls for the daughter of the house owner (Jaiganesh). Charmed by his looks and character, the girl (Gowthami) also falls for him. One day he accidentally meet his childhood friend Raghu (Raghuvaran) who is a spoiled rich guy. He offers Raja an acting job, then takes him to his uncle's house. Raja is to be in charge of the administration of the household and take care of five children (Raghu's nieces and nephews) each of whom have issues (such as being lazy, not studying etc.). Raja finds out that Raghu is cheating his uncle out of funds and using him to do the same. How he tackles these problems and helps the children become better is the rest of the movie.

Name: Apoorva Sagodharargal
Description: Appu and Raja are twins who were separated at birth, grow up in different localities. Appu's quest for revenge begins upon learning that his father was killed by four criminals.

Name: Rajathi Raja
Description: Rajini plays a double role. One returns after living outside the country.

Name: Varusham Padhinaaru
Description: Kannan, a teenager, falls in love with his uncle's daughter, Radhika, but things turn upside down when her grandmother disapproves of their relationship.

Name: Agni Natchathiram
Description: Two men having the same father , but different mothers hate each other and often get into fights. But they are forced to join hands when their father's life is endangered.

Name: Dharmathin Thalaivan
Description: Dharmathin Thalaivan is a 1988 Indian Tamil film, directed by S. P. Muthuraman and produced by C. Dhandayuthapani. The film stars Rajinikanth,Prabhu,Suhasini,Nasaar and Khushboo in lead roles. The film had musical score by Ilaiyaraaja.

Name: Idu Namma Alu
Description: A poor graduate marries a priest's daughter, but their differing social background causes strife between them.

Name: Veedu
Description: A dramatic-story depicting the difficulties of a lower middle class family trying to build a new house.

Name: Unnal Mudiyum Thambi
Description: Udhayamoorthi (Kamal Haasan), son of an orthodox Carnatic Musician, Marthandam Pillai, voices for social causes against his father's will and in a way gains the trust of local people and brings self-awareness in neighboring villages.

Name: Soora Samhaaram
Description: An honest cop tries to exact revenge on the drug lord responsible for killing his partner.

Name: Sathyaa
Description: Sathya (Kamal Hassan) is a young man who wants to make a difference and ends up becoming a henchman to a political leader who has his own agenda.

Name: Velaikkaaran
Description: Young Ragupathy (Rajinikanth) is brought up by his paternal grandfather Valayapathy (V.K.Ramasamy). He decides for him to go to the city in search of a new job and life. While in the city he meets up with Senthil who guides him into an interview in a 5-star hotel owned by Rajkumar (Sarath Babu). While in the hotel, Ragupathy meets Kowsalya (Amala) and falls in love with her. During this time, many attempts are made to kill Rajkumar by his uncle and son Nassar. The blame for this murders goes to Rajkumar's mother (K. R. Vijaya), who is actually Ragupathy's mother. Realising all this Ragupathy takes an oath no matter what happens he will not let any harm come to Rajkumar. As these attempts are being made, can Ragupathy thwart them all?

Name: Chinna Thambi Periya Thambi
Description: Two mischievous brothers fall for the same girl.

Name: Irattaival Kuruvi
Description: A romantically comedy where a married man falls in love with another lady. He eventually marries her and neither of them know about their husband's second relationship. Soon things go haywire. How long will he escape the inevitable?

Name: Manathil Uruthi Vendum
Description: A divorced nurse is the sole breadwinner for her six siblings and unemployed parents. After meeting an enthusiastic novelist, she edges towards a new start, but complications arise in her family.

Name: Poovizhi Vasalile
Description: A man, depressed by the death of his family, adopts a boy with hearing and speech difficulty and names him after his dead son. The boy, who has seen the killers of his widowed mother, is in danger.

Name: Vedam Puthithu
Description: Rules are broken in the traditional village society where an upper- caste orphaned boy is brought up by the village Chieftain.

Name: Nayakan
Description: A common man's struggles against a corrupt police force put him on the wrong side of the law. He becomes a don, who is loved and respected by many, but his growing power and influence exact a heavy toll.

Name: Per Sollum Pillai
Description: Per Sollum Pillai has Kamal Haasan, Ramu as an orphan, who is adopted by a wealthy family. He gets adopted into the family when he saves the entire family from being deliberately poisoned by a miscreant. Rajalakshmi, the mother of the family, raises him as one of the family even though others outside the family see him as a servant. Ramu helps to run the family smoothly and looks after his step-parents, brothers and sisters like his own. Kamal intervenes whenever his step-brothers attempt to commit mischief in the family and thwarts all their plans. He tries to advise them to be resourceful but they hate him for that. A smuggler becomes an enemy to the family when Ramu intervenes and stop in getting his step sister married to the smugglers son. The smuggler kills Rajalakshmi in a climax scene and Kamal tries to save the others. Years later, Rau believes his daughter is a reincarnation of his step mother and lives happily ever after. Watch the full movie Per Sollum Pillai online, only on Eros Now.

Name: Kaadhal Parisu
Description: Two wealthy sisters have an uncle who is out to steal their wealth. When the younger sister introduces her lover to her sister, the latter reveals a shocking truth and forbids her from meeting him.

Name: Manithan
Description: After returning from prison, Raja works as a social worker. But he makes many enemies who constantly try to plot against him.

Name: Naan Adimai Illai
Description: Vijay and Priya fall in love and get married against her father's wishes. However, when they get separated after a fight, Priya's father plots to keep them away from each other.

Name: Kadolara Kavithaigal
Description: A schoolteacher falls in love with an uneducated rowdy villager in order to prove that love can change the heart of even the most despicable person alive.

Name: Punnagai Mannan
Description: After a failed suicide attempt that ultimately leaves his lover dead, a dancer changes his life.

Name: Raakshasudu
Description: The film opens with a widowed woman giving birth to a baby boy. The landlord does not approve of this and has the baby disposed of. A drunkard finds the baby and keeps him for a couple of years until he sells the boy to a labour camp, in exchange for money. 20 years later, that boy Pursha (Chiranjeevi) and his friend Simham (Nagendra Babu) escape from the labour camp, to see Pursha's mother. But when Pursha goes to the landlord's house, the landlord says that Pursha's mother left a long time and for Pursha to get the details, the landlord must be bribed with Rs. 10,000 /-. Pursha and Simham sneak into somebody's house and steal the necessary Rs. 10,000. At the moment, they are caught by JK (Rao Gopal Rao). He tells them that it is alright for them to take the money for their use. By the time Pursha and Simham get to the landlord, the landlord sold the information of Pursha's mother to JK for Rs. 50,000. Pursha, angered, goes to JK for an explanation. JK wants to use Pursha to stop his rival, who sells drugs. Pursha reluctantly refuses at first but later is convinced. While Pursha, Simham, and Inspector Vijay (Rajendra Prasad) fight some bad guys, Pursha gets injured and jumps into a river. He is saved by a school teacher Sumatri ( Suhasini) who is an orphan. Sumatri is the sister of Vijay. Pursha comes up with a plan to raid important documents to imprison Shailaja's ( Radha) father, who is JK's rival but in the process, Vijay is killed. How Pursha gets his revenge and meets his mother forms the rest of the story.

Name: Oomai Vizhigal
Description: A resort 'Picnic Village' used to abduct young girls and serve them to satisfy powerful politicians .When a newspaper media gets hook of it , they were attacked.By then honest police officer steps in to collect evidence.By braving the odds he and Media colleagues finally solve the Mystery .

Name: Mouna Ragam
Description: Divya, a woman grieving over the death of her lover, is convinced into an arranged marriage with Chandra Kumar. Over a year the couple attempt to adjust to each other's presence and live with each other.

Name: Samsaram Athu Minsaram
Description: Ammaiyappan Mudaliar manages to fullfil the needs of his three sons and a daughter. However, things change after his eldest son leaves them after a heated argument with him.

Name: Vikram
Description: Vikram, a cop who is mourning the death of his wife, is assigned to retrieve a missile. He is aided by a highly educated engineer Preethi, who holds the knowledge to disarm the nuke, in his mission.

Name: Amman Koil Kizhakkaalae
Description: Kanmani, a wealthy girl, decides to teach Chinnamani a lesson by pretending to be in love with him. Things, however, take an ugly turn when Chinnamani marries her in a fit of rage.

Name: Mr
Description: Bharath, born out of wedlock, seeks revenge for his mother by making his father publicly accept him as a son. His father, now an industrialist, soon finds competition in the form of Bharath.

Name: Muthal Mariyathai
Description: A friendship between a middle-aged upper-caste man in a village and a boatman's daughter raises eyebrows.

Name: Aan Paavam
Description: An error during an arranged marriage pre-meeting triggers a socially-unaccepted romance.

Name: Sindhu Bhairavi
Description: A Carnatic singe at the peak of his career loses his credibility as he gets addicted to alcohol due to the loss of an intimate companion. Singer's wife tries to help him get rid of the addiction and fails.

Name: Idaya Kovil
Description: Shankar, a budding singer loses his love, Gowri, who commits suicide. When Shankar turns famous, he eventually develops friendship with Surya, a college girl, who falls in love with him.

Name: Poove Poochudava
Description: An elderly woman who is rich lives alone in a town. However, her life changes for the better when her granddaughter comes to live with her.

Name: House of the Concubine
Description: A young man dreams of marrying a beautiful girl. But, due to pressure from his father, he ends up with a Plain Jane. Then, he meets a gorgeous woman who, unbeknownst to him, is only behind his money.

Name: Sri Raghavendra
Description: This film is the life of Sri Raghavendra. From Birth till his Mahasamadhi has been portrayed by Rajinikanth. The film highlights some of the miracles Sri Raghavendra performed.

Name: Uyarntha Ullam
Description: Anand, a wealthy man, spends his time in drinking, gambling and entertaining his friends. When he meets Geetha, a young woman, he is smitten by her and decides to mend his ways.

Name: Pagal Nilavu
Description: Intrigue and melodrama as village overlord's crony falls in love with policeman's sister.

Name: Kaakki Sattai
Description: Murali is a young man obsessed with joining the police force. After being rejected several times, he is disillusioned and joins a smugglers' gang instead.

Name: Oru Kaidhiyin Diary
Description: Though David is loyal to Suryaprakash, a politician, he rapes and kills David's wife and sends him to jail. He comes back from jail, after serving life imprisonment to exact his revenge.

Name: Vaidehi Kaathirundaal
Description: A homeless man and a young widow develop an affectionate bond for each other due to similarly tragic past. They then take it upon themselves to save a young couple in love from the wrath of the villagers.

Name: Nooravathu Naal
Description: A young woman has visions of her sister's murder and investigates.

Name: Enakkul Oruvan
Description: Enakkul Oruvan is a 1984 Indian Tamil film, directed by Sp. Muthuraman and produced by Rajam Balachander, Pushpa Kandaswamy. The film stars Kamal Haasan, Sripriya, Shobhana and Pandari Bai in lead roles. The film had musical score by Ilaiyaraaja. Watch the full movie, Enakkul Oruvan, only on Eros Now.

Name: Nallavanukku Nallavan
Description: Gangadharan, a kind man reforms Manickam, a youngster and appoints him as in-charge in his factory. But Gangadharan becomes bankrupt and his son vows to avenge Manickam, believing that his father's business was swindled by Manickam.

Name: Dhavani Kannavukal
Description: An unemployed gold medalist tries to become rich for his big family.

Name: Thambikku Entha Ooru
Description: An arrogant spoiled brat learns the value of hard work and discipline after spending a year in his father's friend's village.

Name: Vetri
Description: Vijay loves challenges and goes to any limit to win them. But one such challenge lands him in prison on a murder charge, as he was used as a pawn to kill his professor.

Name: Naan Mahaan Alla
Description: An honest lawyer seeks revenge against a powerful don and decides to break the law after learning that his revenge cannot be fulfilled through due process of law. Whether he succeeds in his attempt ?

Name: Anbulla Rajanikant
Description: A disabled child in a group home starts corresponding with a matinee idol

Name: Munthanai Mudichu
Description: A woman finds a husband and tries to win his love through unconventional means.

Name: Thoongathey Tambi Thoongathey
Description: Gopi is an unemployed graduate from a middle class society and Vinod is a rich graduate from high society returning from abroad after his father's death. In order to claim the property of Vinod, the estate manager with his mob guys assaults him and make him a drug addict by repeated injections administered by a fake doctor. Gopi's lover Padmini's father, a family friend of Vinod's father, together with Padmini, come to the estate on an excursion. Due to her curiosity, she sees Vinod and finds out that he is in a dangerous state of health due to the drug addiction. Padmini later learns that Gopi and Vinod are twins separated at birth. With the help of the house's servant, Padmini replaces Vinod with Gopi and sends him to his mother's house to save him. Gopi takes it upon himself to save the estate and properties from the hands of Vinuchakravarthy and his accomplice.

Name: Thanga Magan
Description: Thanga Magan is a man's search for his roots. It is his search for the truth about his lineage.

Name: Sagara Sangamam
Description: A classical dancer, Balakrishna, faces many struggles, but is eventually redeemed.

Name: Paayum Puli
Description: A young man learns martial arts to seek vengeance from a gang of criminals who murdered his sister. Will he succeed in his attempt.

Name: Nireekshana
Description: A forest officer sentenced for 20years who loved a tribal girl in forest.

Name: Moondru Mugham
Description: A sincere police officer is killed by a liquor dealer. Years later, his twin sons set out to avenge their father's death.

Name: Sakalakala Vallavan
Description: A young agriculturist Velu (Kamal Hassan) goes to extremes to attain revenge against his devious landlord and her family. He is an upright young man, but when his family gets cheated out of money, he decides it's time to take a stand. Donning various disguises, he-with help from his sister Valli (Thulasi)-sets out seeking justice against the landlord and her confrontational daughter Geetha (Ambika) and son Pazhani (Raveendran).

Name: Pudhu Kavithai
Description: A man and woman in love are separated due to the machinations of the woman's mother. But years later, their paths cross once again.

Name: Thooral ninnu pochhu
Description: Two people are committed to an arranged marriage by their families. The two fall in love, but when the families disagree on the dowry, both sides are incensed, and the lovers' marriage is forbidden.

Name: Ranga
Description: Ranga comes to live with a family to kidnap their young son while Raju is there to protect him. What no one knows is that Ranga, once a good guy, and Raju, a previous crook, share an interesting past.

Name: Simla Special
Description: Two friends, Gopu and Babu, own a troupe that performs comedic plays. When Babu faces a financial crisis, the two friends decide to accept a commission and perform for the Tamilians in Shimla.

Name: Thanikkattu Raja
Description: A young mechanic falls in love with a rich girl. But their lives get shattered after a series of unexpected events. Whether they return back to their normal life ?

Name: Moondram Pirai
Description: A young woman regresses to childhood after suffering a head injury in a car crash. Lost, she ends up trapped at a brothel before being rescued by a lonely school teacher who falls in love with her.

Name: Vazhve Mayam
Description: A trainee pilot attempts to woo a pretty Air Hostess.

Name: Pokkiri Raja
Description: Ramesh was framed for an industrialist's murder, where his look-alike helps him in finding the true killer. Can Ramesh save himself from the murder plot ?

Name: Alaigal Ooivathilai
Description: Two teenagers fall in love in rural Tamil Nadu but their families are against the match due to their differing religions.

Name: Antha Ezhu Natkal
Description: A poor musician enters the city dreaming to become a music director finds his lady- love as the wife of his producer.

Name: Thaneer Thaneer
Description: A small village in Tamil Nadu faces water scarcity. The film highlights the plight of the villagers and the sufferings they endure at the hands of bureaucrats when they try to resolve their problem.

Name: Ranuva Veeran
Description: A young military man returns to his village, which is often terrorized by criminal gangs. Will he be able to save the village ?

Name: Netri Kann
Description: A God- fearing son finds a way to teach a lesson to his sex- addict father.

Name: Thillu Mullu
Description: Chandran , a young man fools his boss and attempts to woo his boss' daughter.

Name: Raaja Paarvai
Description: The story is about a blind violinist who falls in love with a rich girl and ends up facing many difficulties.

Name: Indru Poyi Naalai Vaa
Description: The film is all about three friends who fall for the same girl, narrated as a comedy. Palanisamy and his two friends have no job other than going behind girls. A pretty girl (Radhika) gets relocated with family to the opposite house of Palanisamy (Bhagyaraj). They three fall for the girls beauty and makes a gentleman agreement leaving the decision of the girls choice to choose her lover. To impress her, the three attempts three different methods. Palanisamy helps Radhika's mother in kitchen works, one of the other friends joins her fathers tuition to learn Hindi and the third one comes to learn martial arts from her grandfather.. the rest is all about who won the girls heart.

Name: Kazhugu
Description: A man gets into problem after he witness a murder at a sacrificial ground. What happens next ?

Name: Thee
Description: Two brothers choose different career paths. The one becomes a smuggler and the other a policeman.

Name: Meendum Kokila
Description: Subramaniam, a lawyer is married to Kokila and has a daughter. Things go well until he meets Kamini, a movie star in a party. He gets attracted towards Kamini and becomes ready to sacrifice his own family for her. Kokila's efforts in bringing back her husband forms the rest of the story.

Name: Moodupani
Description: A successful businessman develops a hatred towards women as a result of his troubled childhood, which involved the separation of his parents owing to his father's affection towards a prostitute.

Name: Nizhalgal
Description: The travails of three unemployed young men trying to make ends meet and chasing their aspirations.

Name: Polladhavan
Description: A woman travelling on a train witnesses a murder. Later she confronts the murderer. What happens next ?

Name: Murattu Kaalai
Description: Kaaliyan and Jaishankar are like dictators in neighboring villages separately, but in contrast to Kaaliyan, Jaishankar is selfish and bad. Engagement of Jaishankar's sister with Kaaliyan triggers rivalry between the two villages.

Name: Varumayin Niram Sigappu
Description: Poetical forces play in the life of an unemployed yet well educated young man.He finds the depth and the beauty of his principles yet fate leaves him in destitution

Name: Guru
Description: A rich philanthropist has a secret occupation as a master thief.

Name: Ullasa Paravaigal
Description: Ullasa Paravaigal is a Tamil language film starring Kamal Haasan in the lead role. The movie has evergreen songs that are murmured even today. The movie was a hit at the box office. This film has been dubbed into Telugu as Prema Pichi and in Hindi as Do Dil Deewane.

Name: Billa
Description: A village bumpkin poses as a Mafia don to uncover the gang.

Name: Calling Sahasra
Description: Cyber expert Ajay joins new job but past tragedy motivates avenging crimes on women using RESQ app anonymously. Mass calls draw him into murder case amidst rescuing women.

Name: Atharva
Description: A policeman from the clues department tries to unravel murder mystery. When the investigation becomes more complex, it leads to a twisted path. Will he be able to unravel the chain of mystery?

Name: Upendra Gadi Adda
Description: A group of youngsters who decide to become popular on social media by hook or crook.

Name: Kota Bommali PS
Description: A police officer finds himself on the run after being framed by a politician for a crime.

Name: The Trial
Description: SI Rajeev is assigned to interrogate Roopa regarding her husband Ajay's accidental death. Discovering that Roopa is also an SI, Rajeev investigates further and uncovers unexpected revelations in the case.

Name: Perfume
Description: Vedha has innate natural smelling capacity called Hyperosmia. When his quality turns into a psychological disorder, he ends up kidnapping the girl he is attracted to. Is there a cure for his disorder? Can she escape or will she fall in ?

Name: Sound Party
Description: A father-son duo embarks on a quest for wealth, launching a family-run restaurant. But their dreams fall off when their eatery is shut due to illegalities, leading to a series of events, yielding control of their lives to a local criminal.

Name: Jorugaa Husharugaa
Description: The love story of Santosh and Nitya, taking an unexpected turn when Nitya joins Santosh's workplace, sparking feelings from his boss Anand.

Name: Aadikeshava
Description: A turn of events takes an urban-bred guy into the heart of Rayalaseema, where there are scores to settle.

Name: Mangalavaram
Description: Fear engulfs a village as murders pile up mysteriously. Shailu, a young woman is the heart of the story and the enigmatic tale unravels with a suspenseful cinematic journey.

Name: My Name Is Shruthi
Description: It is an intriguing thriller based on Organ Mafia. My Name Is Shruthi stands apart as it deals with skin mafia, which is first of its kind movie which gives audience a new experience with a gripping thriller.

Name: Janam
Description: The film's portrayal of the reality in society, the challenges faced by mothers in guiding their children to make the right political choices. It seems to highlight the interplay between values, societal pressures and corruption.

Name: Ala Ninnu Cheri
Description: A girl born into a wealthy family, falls for a boy who is driven towards his goal. On proposing marriage to him, he chooses his goal. Will she marry someone else? Will he achieve his goal?

Name: Krishna Ghattam
Description: "Krishna Ghattam" is a tale of morality and reform. Amidst turmoil, Prasad decides to stand tall. A casanova's pursuits meet his nemesis. A self-righteous boy is tested. Will there be reform? See the battle between wisdom and intelligence.

Name: Maa Oori Polimera 2
Description: Revolves around a policeman who sets out to seek justice for his brother's death in a village plagued by black magic.

Name: Vidhi
Description: Surya, an innocent young man is burdened by financial struggles and injustice, discovers a mysterious pen with a secret. He must carefully navigate through the blurred lines between revenge and righteousness.

Name: Plot
Description: A failed businessman, finally, tastes success in real estate. This turns into an obsession and now he would go to any extent to do business and not fail.An anonymous person threatens him to stop his successful business.

Name: Anukunnavanni Jaragavu Konni
Description: "Karthik , Madhu who are striving for a financial gain, collide in a hilarious yet bewildering hotel crime, embarking on a roller coaster journey to clear their names and how to solve crime case in this uproarious, crime comedy thriller."

Name: Keedaa Cola
Description: A hilarious group takes on a challenge of a lifetime when they decide to make quick money by planting a cockroach into a soft drink bottle. Will they hit the jackpot?

Name: Martin Luther King
Description: A man without a name or identity is suddenly wooed by two warring groups when he gets a Voter ID. Will he reap the benefits of his privilege or use it as a tool for social change?

Name: Dhimahi
Description: Dhimahi gets kidnapped and killed, the family goes through a trauma. Her uncle Kartik blames himself for her death and makes it his mission to know the cause of her death and also deep dives into the concept of Necromancy.

Name: Lingoccha
Description: Shiva and Noorjahan's childhood affection is disrupted when she unexpectedly goes to Dubai, putting their love to the test.

Name: Case 30
Description: CASE 30 tells the story of a murder case which has been assigned to Crime Branch Officer Arjun bharadwaj. How Arjun investigates and unthreads the case is the rest of the story.

Name: Tiger Nageswara Rao
Description: A legendary real-life robber of Stuartpuram, Andhra Pradesh called Tiger Nageswara Rao in the 1970s, who was noted for his ingenious ways of evading the police and prison.

Name: Bhagavanth Kesari
Description: Nelakonda Bhagavanth Kesari is adamant about getting even with a powerful businessman who cost him money. He is prepared to square off against the formidable foe and resolve their issues amicably.

Name: Raakshasa Kaavyam
Description: Mythological characters Jaya-Vijaya are born as Ajay-Vijay in the outskirts of Hyderabad city. One night, Chaitanya, an engineering student, gets trapped between these two extremists and becomes a part of their criminal activities

Name: Sagiletikatha
Description: While organising its annual ritual, Sagileru witnesses unexpected obstacles due to the rift between families impacting a young couple's union and a poor man's desire to eat chicken

Name: Neethone Nenu
Description: Ayesha a physical training teacher and makes a good bond with her fellow teacher and falls for his kindness. Soon She Finds Out that Ram has a psychological disorder caused by past. What Ayesha did to make ram a better person is the rest

Name: Madhurapudi Gramam Ane Nenu
Description: Soori is a rude, rugged and obstinate person who can stand up for his friend Babji at all costs. Soori experiences a blossoming affection for Girija, who arrives in the village with the intent of promoting digital banking awareness.

Name: Mystery
Description: The scenes of the murder in a farm house are important to the movie on three aspects: how did it happen, who did it and why did it happen.

Name: Maa Oori Cinema
Description: Mahesh wishes to become a film director and wants to make the movie in his village. Determined to prove himself, Mahesh sets out on his journey, armed with unwavering passion and an unyielding spirit.

Name: Prema Vimanam
Description: Two kids with a dream to board a flight cross paths with a young couple who must urgently catch the flight to start a new life.

Name: Mad
Description: Set in an engineering college and revolves around the antics of the students there, primarily the boys, who get a kick out of torturing the hostel warden.

Name: Month of Madhu
Description: It follows the life of couple, Who is on the brink of divorce- and traces the entry of an outsider who changes their lives forever.

Name: Yendira Ee Panchayithi
Description: A young man from Ramapuram who spends most of his time with friends and aspires to become a police officer. However, he gets involved in petty thefts in his town. Later, Abhi and his gang become watchmen in the village.

Name: The Great Indian Suicide
Description: Hemanth falls in love with Chaitra. But she can't reciprocate as her family wants to commit mass suicide so that one of their deceased members can return to life.

Name: Nene Saroja
Description: Discrimination and unequal treatment towards girl children is ongoing in our society even to this day. If a girl falls in love, her father takes her life; if she doesn't fall in love, a psycho would take her life.

Name: Guns Trance Action
Description: Four sociopaths get into a brutal face off with a college student Rishi. Their characters are designed as per GTA game.

Name: Rules Ranjann
Description: Mano Ranjan is a software employee who lives by a strict set of rules. His life takes an unexpected turn when he renews his friendship with Sana, a classmate from their school days.

Name: Peda Kapu-1
Description: A common man enters a village's political arena, which has been dominated by two political parties.

Name: Skanda
Description: The prodigal son of a respected leader takes on two political rivals and forms bonds with their daughters in this Telugu-language action drama.

Name: Nelluri Nerajana
Description: A traditional family who not intrest on love marriages and in his family his daughter loves Surya and how there family makes them separate and how they make there love success

Name: Ashtadigbandhanam
Description: Gautham is a software engineer, Chakri is a corrupt police officer, Shankar is a bar owner, Sri Ramulu is a politician. These four who are not related to each other meet on one occasion. After that what happened in their lives.

Name: Matti Katha
Description: Set in a rustic village near Hyderabad, this evocative story follows three college-bound friends, their youthful joys, and the loss of cherished ancestral land. A gripping family drama unfolds, unveiling a village leader's sinister conspiracy.

Name: Cheater
Description: The film is self revolving around 3 characters prashanth,kavya,karthik Kavya working as an executive director reputed new channel and mother wants kavya get to married at the earliest immediatlry.

Name: Rudramkota
Description: Rudra, witnesses something unusual happening to his mother, and decides to kill. How far will he go?

Name: Sodara Sodarimanulara
Description: A struggling cab driver is falsely accused of a major crime by the police, and is forced to prove his innocence to both, a brutal police force and a divided society. A single night leaves a family of three stranded in the middle of a fight

Name: Govindaa Bhaja Govindaa
Description: Everyone goes around in life, father, babai, thatha, they are all turned around Some are set for 25 years, and some are set for 30 years and Some people are set for 35 years. Who has spent a lifetime without working

Name: Tantiram
Description: The Trick follows Balachandran, a man with a bad past, who marries Alagini,turning him into a jovial and loving person.The Jinn, a supernatural entity, takes control of Balachandran,causing him to lose trust and face horrific consequences.

Name: Naa Nee Prema Katha
Description: Naa nee Prema Katha is a beautiful love story set in a village setting. Nandini, the daughter of the zamindar of that village, loves a boy named Nani, who is a paper boy from the same village.Guna from the same village also loves the same girl. A triangle love story between these three.

Name: Gandeevadhari Arjuna
Description: A combat officer is tasked with the security of an environmental minister attending a UN summit; there is also a personal reason to fight against climate change and biohazard waste

Name: Nene Naa
Description: Divya is a talented archaeologist, and the Nalgonda police department seeks her help to proceed with a murder case that occurred in a dense forest under suspicious circumstances. A shocking truth is uncovered during the investigation.

Name: Daksha
Description: Six friends are having a party in a guest house where they play a game called Chaucer. The next morning, David is found dead. they find out that whoever loses the game, will die. Will they find the real killer?

Name: Rent
Description: Three girls rent out a flat and are suspiciously killed. While the police are investigating the deaths, Vikram and his family rent out the same house. Will they figure out what is going on and why? Do Vikram and his family survive?

Name: Mahanatulu
Description: The narrative orbits around four distinct characters and their journey to becoming a cohesive team, culminating in the creation of the uproarious YouTube channel named 'Mahaanatulu.'

Name: Bedurulanka 2012
Description: Set in Yedurulanka, explores the morality of people during the paranoia about the end of the world on December 21, 2012, as some represent hope and passion while others represent the calculated types who want to profit from fear.

Name: Mr
Description: Follows Gautham, who marries Mahi and decides to carry her child himself and deliver the baby. The couple must face the ire of society as a result of their choice, including dealing with the reaction from everyone and their families.

Name: Jilebi
Description: Light-hearted Fun & frolic rollercoaster.

Name: Prem Kumar
Description: A story of an unfortunate groom whose dream of getting married remains distant for long which makes him become a detective with specialization in weddings.

Name: Ado Deyyam Katha
Description: The films revolves Around three main characters, out of which one character is a groovily ghost, with deathly emotions, wanting and waiting to bleed the victim, but the other characters are not aware. The soul is embalmed around the farm house and the tamarind grove. The lead character is curious about this presence and is interested to know her past. As time progresses the soul believes the human and reveals her past seeking his help, but the twist and turns in the movie makes the lead the victim.

Name: Madhilo Madhi
Description: Should a couple part ways when they run into arguments?

Name: Ustaad
Description: Surya, a young aimless man navigates through his life, learning lessons from his 'Ustaad' as he comes of age and becomes a pilot.

Name: Bholaa Shankar
Description: A doting brother tries to hunt down notorious criminals who had harmed his sister.

Name: Krishna Gadu Ante Oka Range
Description: While pursuing his father's dream, Krishna, a shepherd, embarks on a poignant journey through adversity, forbidden love, personal loss and ends up finding his true purpose.

Name: Dilse
Description: It is a love story of an orphan, named Kalyan, for two times in his life one with house owner's daughter Geetha and the another in past at college days with one of his classmate named Jaanu. While Priya stays his friend at the same period

Name: Rajugari Kodipulao
Description: A group of friends ended up hopelessly in a deep forest during their reunion trip. Were they spookily haunted by a monstrous animal with a mischievous sense of humor, or was the monster just one of them, trying to scare the rest silly?

Name: Mistake
Description: Three easygoing friends who shares a single flat in Jubilee Hills Basthi. The mistakes they make brings them life threats of being killed, therefore these three young men plan to abscond along with their girlfriends.

Name: Okkaroju..
Description: Okka Roju is a Telugu movie starring Aaditya Reddy Badveli and Rekha Nirosha in the lead.

Name: Stopwatch
Description: A businessman Jay's wife mysteriously goes missing. Based on the evidence found by the Forensic Department, their lawyer Yogi suspects Jay and interrogates him to untangle the truth. Who is the real culprit?

Name: Bro
Description: An arrogant man is given a second chance to fix his mistakes after death.

Name: Her: Chapter 1
Description: Archana ,a uniformed police officer returns to duty after a six month suspension to solve a high-stakes case.

Name: Detective Karthik
Description: A former detective solves a high school murder case and searches for his crush, leading to unexpected discoveries.

Name: Aneethi
Description: A food delivery guy, finds himself captivated by Subbu's (Dushara) charm. However, their lives take a tumultuous turn when a series of unexpected events unfold, plunging them into a chaotic world

Name: Slum Dog Husband
Description: An ordinary mans extraordinary struggles to get divorce from his first wife who happens to be a dog.

Name: Annapurna Photo Studio
Description: Chanti leads a simple yet comfortable life. Chanti's father is a renowned astrologer. He opens a photo studio and names it after his mother. One day Chanti and his friend Prasad notice a goon chasing a girl and attempt to save her.

Name: Natho Nenu
Description: Unmarried, 60 year old man, who lives his life in real estate in Hyderabad. He keeps rising step by step and building apartments with modern facilities.

Name: Hidimbha
Description: In Hyderabad two police officers begin the inquiry and crack the case, but in the process, more people go missing. A noteworthy aspect is that all the victims are girls with one other interesting commonality.

Name: Maaveeran
Description: A cowardly cartoonist starts being 'controlled' by a cartoon action figure, and takes on a corrupt politician.

Name: Baby
Description: Two high-school sweethearts face challenges in their relationship when they take different directions in life.

Name: Revenge
Description: A drug addicted Serial killer Kali kills women without any clues. He saves the lead character Siri, who met with severe accident and admits her into hospital, surprisingly. Police also tries to pursue the killer Kali, But in vain. What's the reason for Kali's killings is the main subject of the film.

Name: Bharateeyans
Description: Six strangers meet at an unknown place and start their journey without knowing what dangers await them.

Name: 7:11 PM
Description: The incident that takes place at 7:11 PM changes the fate of a town called Hamsala Deevi and a planet called Proxima-EV12. Ravi travels beyond imagination through time to stop a criminal mastermind, save his loved ones and his beloved town

Name: O Saathiya
Description: The evolving love story of Arjun and Keerthi and the trials and tribulations they face as they mature from adolescence to adulthood.

Name: Rudrangi
Description: The post-colonial powers in India decided to take advantage of the situation and continue to oppress the downtrodden.

Name: Circle
Description: The letters "Circle of Death," "Circle of Love," and "Circle of Fate" are inscribed on the camera lens, creating curiosity. It indicates the involvement of love and destiny amidst the conflicts in the path of love.

Name: Bhaag Saale
Description: A smart and young chap knots into a big trouble: he must defy a big time goon, to retrieve something priceless and gain back his love.

Name: Rangabali
Description: A carefree young man gets caught up in a local dispute after falling for a medical student.

Name: Rudramambapuram
Description: Two rival fishermen clash on the burning issue of using ring nets. With politics adding fuel to the fire, how will the fisher folk resolve their conflict?

Name: Mayapetika
Description: The journey of a mobile through various hands, revealing glimpses of life stories impacted and motivated by the mobile, sometimes for the better or for the worse.

Name: Love You Ram
Description: Imagine the heartbreak when someone you loved from childhood turns out to be a crook. Will Divya be old-fashioned and be with Ram or will she leave him?

Name: Spy
Description: After receiving the news of the death of his elder brother Subash, who worked for R&AW, Jay sets out on a mission to find out what happened leading him into a bigger conspiracy of a possible nuclear attack threat to the country.

Name: Samajavaragamana
Description: A lifelong university student struggling to pass his exams enlists the help of his son and his lovestruck friend. Hijinks ensue amidst blossoming love and comic bust-ups.

Name: Suryasthamayam 2018
Description: This film revolves around the rivalry between the cop cheguevara and the gangster Mr X. Intercuts to the flash back friendship story of Apparao and Surya.

Name: Manucharitra
Description: Manu, a genius at academic level, eventually turns into a thug. Things change when he falls in love. Can he get his life back on the right track before it's too late?

Name: Bheemadevarapally Branchi
Description: Jampanna, a Villager from Native Telangana of Mallapur spends all the money that gets credited in his account thinking it as one of governments freebies. This welcomes new problems in his life, how he gets back up is the story.

Name: Maa Awara Zindagi
Description: Four friends after their B-Tech roaming like aawara are being scolded by their parents daily. One fine day they had fallen into a problem and how come they will face the problem, were they able to solve it is the story of maa awara zindagi

Name: Kutra
Description: It's Crime n Horror movie like hollywood story. Two girls will became online friends.one invites another to his house n pick-ups her at Airport.Two friends with her family moves one Rural place.In said house Horror incidents will accure.Every movement will be Terrific.Case will be investigate by 2 Pvt Detectives.Fun in Detective office will be humorous. Suspence will Continue up to end Middle of the story many miracles happence Infact it's trap,Kidnap n Murder for gaining money it reveals at the end of movie.

Name: Karna
Description: Karna Movie is based on Friendship, Love

Name: Jagrattha Bidda
Description: Jagartha Bidda is a Telugu movie starring Priyanka Rewri and B Krishna Mohan in prominent roles. It is directed by B Krishna Mohan.

Name: Bhari Taraganam
Description: "Bhari Taraganam" is a Telugu film that showcases the importance of acting. The movie narrates four stories that revolve around a father and daughter, husband and wife, a boss and his personnel secretary, and the main male and female leads. Throughout all four stories, the female lead is shown to be naturally helpful and risks everything to help those in need. The female lead takes advantage of her boyfriend's weakness to make their plans more believable.

Name: Love You Too
Description: Love You Too is an extramarital love story. Surya (a dance choreographer) struggles to justify his loyalty in love relationship with Sushma (a dancer), yet wanting to continue to stay loyal in his marital relationship with Poorna.

Name: Koushika Varma Dhamayanthi
Description: Koushik, Kavya Manjari, and Damayanthi are stuck in a love triangle since the previous life. Will Koushik succumb to Damayanthi's charm and break Kavya Manjari's promise or will true love prevail?

Name: Vimanam
Description: A father's endless pursuit to make his son's biggest dream of traveling in a flight come true.

Name: Anantha
Description: Prof. Radesh's farewell party becomes a mysterious interrogation after he reveals that he has a longer and way stranger past.

Name: Bairan Palli
Description: Watch this complex tapestry of murder, intrigue, and deception unravel. Are the four upstarts behind it all or are they being framed? Does evil really walk among them or is it the fear and paranoia gripping the minds of the villagers.

Name: Unstoppable
Description: Childhood buddies Kohinoor Kalyan and Jilani Ramdas are easy-going guys. One day, the two friends lose money on cricket betting. In the process of regaining the lost money, they unintentionally obtain traps in the villains.

Name: Chakravyuham: The Trap
Description: Siri, a business partner and a housewife, was found with her throat slit. The investigation officer tries to solve the case. Can he figure out who killed her and why?

Name: Pareshan
Description: Set up in the backdrop of Singareni and Coalaries, the movie sheds light on troubles that arise between friends, family and lovers.

Name: Abhilasha
Description: SRIRAM WHO IS A BTECH GRADUATE GROWN UP UNDER HIS UNCLE AND AUNTY WORKS AS A MECHANIC WILL GOES TO VIZAG FOR AN INTERVIEW. ACCIDENTALLY HE MEETS VYDEHI WHO IS AN IAS ASPIRANT AND LOVES HER FOR HER OPEN AND FRANKNESS HE SUDDENLY KNOWS

Name: Nenu Student Sir!
Description: Subbu, a college student, buys an iPhone and gets entangled in a murder case linked to the device. He receives a large sum of money in his bank account and faces challenges proving his innocence.

Name: IQ (Power of student)
Description: This is a movie related to a brain.lead actress is a very intelligent middle class girl with high IQ antagonist tries to threaten her and try to misuse her memory power and protagonist tries to saves her from them.

Name: Boo
Description: Four friends gather to celebrate Halloween. They begin reading an horror novel. Things take a strange turn as they begin to experience bizarre events while reading the book. Will they be able to escape the spirit that haunts them?

Name: Malli Pelli
Description: Narendra, the famous actor, who hails from a big family, falls in love with Parvathi, his co actor and a married woman. Can he face the complexities to pursue her?

Name: Mem Famous
Description: A high energy youthful journey filled with amazing moments of friendship, love, family all set up in a beautiful and colorful village.

Name: MenToo
Description: A group of men from different sections of society faces discrimination from Pseudo feminists. They decide to fight with #MenToo because they believe men are victims too.

Name: Grey: The Spy Who Loved Me
Description: Grey: The Spy Who Loved Me Officer Nayak investigates the death of Professor Sudarshan Reddy and meets Arushi, Nayak discovers that Dr.Raghu, the professor's psychiatrist, is also involved in the murder.

Name: Haseena
Description: Five orphanages after getting well settled in life, gets involved into a mysterious event. They don't know how many more twists and turns are upcoming in their lifes.

Name: Hosh
Description: Five orphanages after getting well settled in life, gets involved into a mysterious event. They don't know how many more twists and turns are upcoming in their lifes.

Name: Custody
Description: Constable Siva is assigned to escort a witness from police custody to the courtroom. As a twist in the plot, Siva learns that the entire police department wants the witness dead and starts the real run.

Name: The Story of a Beautiful Girl
Description: Lovable girl with big dreams vanishes, triggering media frenzy and investigation. What happened to her? Mystery unfolds as search for answers begins. After her disappearance, the girl's loved ones and the public are left to wonder.

Name: Bhuvana Vijayam
Description: Eight strangers with different backgrounds and problems compete in a high-stakes challenge for a chance to win life-changing rewards, but they soon discover that one of them will pay the ultimate price.

Name: Katha Venuka Katha
Description: Ashwin wants to become a director. He meets a producer and narrates his story. They begin shooting for the movie but suddenly all five artists from the movie go missing. Can he find them or will he be too late?

Name: Rama Banam
Description: Two siblings, who despite their difference in ideologies come together to fight for their common goal.

Name: Ugram
Description: K. Shiva Kumar, a CI is assigned to investigate recent disappearances. An accident leaves him injured, and upon recovery, he finds his wife and daughter missing. Determined to reunite with his family, he embarks on a relentless search.

Name: Heat Is On
Description: When his childhood best friend Cyril and his lover Aradhya are kidnapped, Abhi tries to figure out the truth behind it

Name: Arangetram
Description: Ajay, a psychotic killer, sneak into girl's home to kill her. Unexpectedly, a few intruders enter the same home, thwarting his plan. What happens next?

Name: English Manju
Description: The protagonist of the film has a keen interest in crime stories. So much so that he comes in contact with some rowdies in college and drifts towards a life of crime and rowdyism. What happens next forms the crux of the story.

Name: Vidyarthi
Description: Chaitanya joins late in an agricultural college where upper caste domination rules are valued. Bhoopathi, Maha Lakshmi's father, is the head of that area. What will happen when Bhoopathi's rival Satyam attacks him and his daughter?

Name: Agent
